GSP33bbdip11u:25: jñeyaṃ gamyaṃ gurūṃścāpi natvā sūtrārtha ucyate //
GSP33bbdip11u:33_1: brahmasūtrāṇi cakāra bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ / tāni ca paṭalapihitanayanavat yathāvadarthāvettṛbhiḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:34_2: maṅgalamācaran śiṣyaśikṣārthaṃ grathayati cikīrṣitaṃ ca pratijānīte - 'nārāyaṇam';
GSP33bbdip11u:39: prāpyam / ubhayatra sadbhiriti śeṣaḥ / nārāyaṇaṃ 'natvā gurūṃśca';
GSP33bbdip11u:40: iti cakārārthassamuccayaḥ / tathā ca gurūṃśca natvā sāṣṭāṅgaṃ namaskṛtya 'sūtrārthaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:46: gamyam ityanena caturthādhyāyasya arthaḥ śiṣyahitatayā ādau saṅgṛhīta iti jñātavyam / anenaiva viśeṣaṇacatuṣṭayena viśeṣyavācakanārāyaṇaśabdaḥ na ḍitthādiśabdavatsāṅketikaḥ;
GSP33bbdip11u:47: kintu arāḥ doṣāḥ tadviruddhāḥ nārāḥ guṇāḥ teṣāmāśraya iti vā,
GSP33bbdip11u:50_0: aravidhuramuktāśraya iti vā yogenotkṛṣṭaguṇavācaka ityuktaṃ bhavati / tena nārāyaṇa
GSP33bbdip11u:50_1: eva śāstrārtha iti pradarśitam / anenaiva viśeṣaṇacatuṣṭayena vandyatāprayojakāni
GSP33bbdip11u:52: tāsāmetacchāstrādhyāyapādeṣu pratipipādayiṣitatvāt / tathā ca 'nārāyaṇaṃ natvā guṇairudīrṇaṃ natvā doṣavarjitaṃ natvā';
GSP33bbdip11u:55: iti vacanād gurornāma nāgrahīdācāryaḥ / na ca 'gurūn nārāyaṇaśabdavācyān nārāyaṇapadenaiva gurunāma covāca,
GSP33bbdip11u:58_2: gauravādvā bahumānārthaṃ vā bahuvacanaprayogaḥ / yadyapi gururvyāsaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:60: tathāpi viśeṣānugrahārthaṃ pṛthaṅnatiriti / evaṃ svasya gurudevatayoḥ bhede arucisūcanārtho 'piśabdaḥ / tathā ca - 'api';
GSP33bbdip11u:64: anenaiva ślokena śrotṛpravṛttyaṅgabhūtāḥ śāstrādhikāriviṣayaprayojanasambandhāśca śiṣyaśikṣārthaṃ sūcitā bhavanti/
GSP33bbdip11u:67: dvāpare sarvatra jñāne ākulībhūte tannirṇayāya brahmarudrendrādibhirarthito bhagavānnārāyaṇo vyāsatvenāvatatāra /
GSP33bbdip11u:70_0: prāyo 'sya prāmāṇyaprayojyatvāt / satyeva tasmin prātītikārthanirāsena yathāvadvyākhyeyatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:71: ityādinā / dvāveva dharmapādau parāvavaśiṣṭau yasmin yuge,
GSP33bbdip11u:72: dvābhyāṃ yugābhyāṃ parasminnuttarasmin yuge iti vā,
GSP33bbdip11u:73: vaivasvatamanvantare mahāyugeṣu prathamadvāparāpekṣayāṣṭāviṃśe dharmapādadvayayutatvāt dvāparākhye yuge / 'sarvatra';
GSP33bbdip11u:78: samyagjñānaṃ saguṇatvādijñānaṃ uta nirguṇatvādijñānamiti vipratipattijanyasandehaviṣayatāṃ nirguṇatvādijñānameva na tvanyaditi mithyājñānaviṣayatāṃ ca prāpte sati,
GSP33bbdip11u:79: tajjñānaviṣayībhūtaṃ saguṇatvādikaṃ tattvamanyadveti sandehe tādṛgviparyaye ca satīti yāvat / 'tannirṇayāya';
GSP33bbdip11u:81: idameva tattvaṃ nānyaditi viṣaye samyaktvaniścayārthamiti yāvat / 'brahmarudrendrādibhiḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:83: upayācitaḥ / anyapadārthānāṃ devānāṃ brahmarudrendrādibhiriti yadviśeṣaṇaṃ tat prasiddhaprabhāvānāmapi bhagavaditareṣāmaśakyamidaṃ kāryamiti pradarśanārtham / 'bhagavān';
GSP33bbdip11u:88_1: brahmā ca tataḥ taiḥ sarvairupagamyottamādhikāribhiḥ arthito bhagavāniti buddhyā vivekenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:91: atheṣṭāniṣṭaprāptiparihārecchūnāṃ tadyogamavijānatāṃ tajjñāpanārthaṃ vedamutsannaṃ vyañjayaṃścaturdhā vyabhajat,
GSP33bbdip11u:94: tataḥ kiṃ prakṛte ityata āha - atheti / 'atha';
GSP33bbdip11u:106_0: iti ca śeṣaḥ / tathā ca avāntaravedavibhāgāt prāgeva tataḥ svata eva caturdhā vibhaktāt
GSP33bbdip11u:106_1: ṛgādirūpāt mūlavedāt caturdhā vibhaktaṃ vedaṃ ṛṅnigadādirūpamupavedaṃ vyañjayan adhyāpanenābhivyajya
GSP33bbdip11u:106_2: tatastasmādekaikasmādekaiko bhāga iti caturdhā vyabhajat / ṛco ṛca uddhṛtyābhivyajya tato ṛgvedaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:109: ātharvaṇādatharvaṇavedaṃ kṛtavānityarthaḥ / punarekaikaṃ ca vedam ṛgvedādirūpāvāntarabhedaṃ vedam
GSP33bbdip11u:110: adhyetṛṇāmalpaśaktiṃ vīkṣya caturviṃśatidhā ekaśatadhā ekottaraśatākhyaprakāreṇa sahasradhā dvādaśadhā ca vyabhajadityarthaḥ / taduktam ṛgbhāṣye -
GSP33bbdip11u:111: ṛcaḥ sa ṛca uddhṛtya ṛgvedaṃ kṛtavān prabhuḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:113_0: ityādinā svata eva caturdhā vibhaktāt mūlavedāt ṛgādirūpopavedamuddhṛtyābhivyajya
GSP33bbdip11u:113_1: tasmādavāntaram ṛgvedādi kṛtavānityarthaḥ / atra pūrvaṃ dvāparagrahaṇaṃ mahāvedāt
GSP33bbdip11u:113_2: uddhṛtasya upavedasya avāntaravedatvena avāntaravedasya ca caturviṃśatyāditvena vibhāgakathanaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:116: eko vedaḥ kṛte hyāsīt tretāyāṃ sa tridhābhavat /
GSP33bbdip11u:117: sa eva pañcadhā jāto dvāparaṃ prāpya vai yugam //
GSP33bbdip11u:118: utsannassa kaliṃ prāpya vedaḥ prāyeṇa sarvaśaḥ //
GSP33bbdip11u:119: ityatharvaṇabhāṣyodāhṛtasmṛtau kṛtayuge vedaikatvasya tretāyāṃ traividhyamātrasya dvāpare pañcavidhatvasya cokteḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:122: ityanena tretāyuge caturdhā vibhāgasya dvāpara evotsādasya coktervirodho bhāti / tathāpi avyaktamūlarāśyapekṣayā vedaikyokteḥ sambhavāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:123: tretāyuge prācuryeṇa bhagavadijyāsādhanatvavivakṣayā traividhyoktāvapi vastuta atharvaṇākhyaprakārāntarasattvasya aniṣedhena vidhāntarasyāpi sattvasambhavāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:124: dvāpare apauruṣeyasya vedasya caturvidhatve 'pi pauruṣeyairitihāsapurāṇādibhiḥ saha pañcavidhatvasyāpi sambhavāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:125: bāhulyena sarvaiḥ prakārairvedasya kalāvutsāde 'pi vyāsāvatārātpūrvaṃ dvāpare 'pyapapāṭhādirūpotsādasya sambhavāt avirodhaḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:131: iti / teṣāṃ sarveṣām arthaḥ tam upakramādiyuktibhirnirṇetumityarthaḥ / 'brahmasūtrāṇi'; brahma vedaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:133: tasya sūtrāṇi tatsvarūpanirṇāyakānītyarthaḥ/ gītābhāṣye tu 'brahmasūtrāṇi cakāra';
GSP33bbdip11u:135: brahmādīnāmarthitvoktyā ca śrotṛdoṣābhāvasya vaktari tannimittavipralambhābhāvasya coktatvāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:137: ityanena ajñānanirharaṇasya prasaktatvena prasaṅgadoṣābhāvasya tata evānapahāsasya coktatvādāptimūlatā darśitā bhavati/ 'brahmasūtrāṇi';
GSP33bbdip11u:139: nyāyavyutpādakatvādyuktimūlatvaṃ ca sūcitam / tathā ca siddhaṃ brahmasūtrāṇāṃ prāmāṇyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:149: ityādinoktaṃ tat skāndapurāṇoktameveti bhāvaḥ / na kevalamasmābhiḥ kintu skānde coktamiti samuccaye vā 'ca';
GSP33bbdip11u:150: śabdaḥ / tathoktaṃ tattvapradīpe - 'yadyapyācāryaḥ svoktārthe svayameva pramāṇaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:151: sarvajñatvādavipralambhakatvācca / tathāpi skānde coktamiti prauḍhavādaṃ karoti';
GSP33bbdip11u:155: iti śeṣaḥ / yadvā - utpattyādyaṣṭake jñānasya praviṣṭatvāt tasya nārāyaṇajanyatvopapattiḥ / 'niṣpannam';
GSP33bbdip11u:160: iti śeṣaḥ / jñānaviṣaye saṃśayādikaṃ nābhūditi phalitārthaḥ / 'tretāyāṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:164_0: idamado veti pūrvoktasaṃśayaviṣayatām anyadeveti mithyājñānaviṣayatāṃ ca prāptamityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:164_1: atra dvāparavat tretādirapyaṣṭāviṃśo grāhyaḥ / dvāpare yuge akhilaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:171: nanu kālaprayuktamanyathātvaṃ cet dvāparayuge bhāgadvayasyaivānyathātvaṃ yuktaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:174_0: śabdaścārthaḥ śāpe viśeṣakāraṇatvasya jñāne vā samyaktvasya dyotakaḥ / tathā ca gautamasya
GSP33bbdip11u:174_1: ṛṣeḥ śāpācca jñāne guṇapūrṇatvādisamyagjñāne ajñānatāṃ nedaṃ tattvajñānamiti tattvajñānabhinnatvaprakārakapratītiviṣayatāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:178: ajñānādimiśrajñāninaḥ yadviṣaye jñānaṃ jātaṃ punastadviṣayagataprakāreṣu ajñānasaṃśayādimantaḥ santaḥ 'śaraṇyaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:180: pramāṇalakṣaṇaṭīkoktarītyā atra āmayapadaṃ rogavācakaṃ doṣāntaropalakṣakam / tathā ca nirdeṣaṃ 'nārāyaṇaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:182: śaraṇaṃ gatā ityarthaḥ / taṃ prārthayan svakāryaṃ ca vyajñāpayanniti ca draṣṭavyam / atra brahmādibuddhīnāṃ saṅkīrṇatvaṃ nāma saṅkīrṇabuddhiṣu sajjaneṣu dayāyuktatvameva,
GSP33bbdip11u:184_2: kālataścājñānaprāptiriti draṣṭavyam / gautamaśāpāgamaprakārastu ittham - pūrvaṃ hi
GSP33bbdip11u:184_3: dvādaśavārṣikyāṃ anāvṛṣṭau satyāṃ tayā pīḍitā ṛṣayo gautamāśramaṃ annavantam adhyūṣuḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:184_4: tatraiva bahukālaṃ tenādṛtāḥ svasvavihitakarmāṇaḥ samavartanta / atha anāvṛṣṭau śāntāyāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:184_5: teṣāṃ svasvāśramagamanecchā samajani / tadarthaṃ gautamamanujñāṃ yayācire / tathāpi
GSP33bbdip11u:185: haraśirassthasurasaritaṃ sapatnīṃ matvā tāṃ niścikāsayiṣantyā pārvatyā preṣito vināyako brahmacāriveṣeṇa pracchannastānṛṣīnupasasāra,
GSP33bbdip11u:188_0: cirakālamekaparānnāśanena yuṣmattapo vinaṅkṣyati / tasmāt svaṃsvamāśramaṃ vrajata /
GSP33bbdip11u:188_1: tatra ca mayocyamānamupāyamākarṇayata / yūyaṃ jñānatapobalāt kāñcana māyāmayīṃ māheyīṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:188_3: praveśayata / atha sasyagrāsinīṃ tāṃ apakrāmayituṃ prayatiṣyate gautamaḥ / tataḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:188_4: sahasā tatkamaṇḍalūdakasaṃsparśamātreṇa sā nipatiṣyati / tadā brāhmaṇāstaṃ pratibrūta
GSP33bbdip11u:188_5: yāvadimāmaśeṣamātaraṃ gāṃ notthāpayiṣyati bhavān tāvanna bhojyānnaḥ / tato haraśirassthadyusaritamavatārya
GSP33bbdip11u:188_6: tadvāriṇā abhiṣicya tāmujjīvayatu bhavān ityevamanutāpinaṃ tamabhilapyāpasaratetyuktvā
GSP33bbdip11u:188_7: herambo 'mbikāṃ jagāma / atha te vināyakena praṇigaditaṃ prayāṇopāyamupasṛtya anvatiṣṭhan /
GSP33bbdip11u:188_8: tenaivopāyena prātiṣṭhanta / tatastāvadgautamaḥ tapasā tryambakamārādhya mandākinīṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:188_9: anusamānīya tadvāriṇā surabhimabhiṣiṣeca / tataḥ sottasthau munistaddhatyāghāt vimuktaśca /
GSP33bbdip11u:188_10: ata eva godāvarīti tasyāḥ saṃjñā samajani / atha vināyakaceṣṭitaṃ pratibudhya ṛṣibhyaścukrodha,
GSP33bbdip11u:189: aśapacca gautamaḥ yadasmadannanimittajñānabalādete gāṃ niramaṃsta tat jñānamapaitviti /
GSP33bbdip11u:196: śatadhā caikadhā caiva tathaiva ca sahasradhā /
GSP33bbdip11u:206: san vijñāpitaṃ pratipāditam avatārādirūpaṃ kāryaṃ yasya saḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:217: uccāraṇena vyaktīcakāra / tāṃśca prāgeva caturdhā vibhaktān vedān punaḥ 'caturdhā vyabhajat';
GSP33bbdip11u:232: iti / pūrveṇaivāsyānvayaḥ / yadvā - uttareṇāpyanvayaḥ / vedavibhāgānantaraṃ ityarthaḥ / 'tasya';
GSP33bbdip11u:234: arthajñānāya / vedānāṃ bahutve 'pi arthasyaikatvāttadvivakṣayā tān vedāniti bahuvacananirdiṣṭānāmapi vedānāṃ tasyetyekavacanena nirdeśo nānupapannaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:238: ityatra punaḥ nidrāpagamānantaramiti sudhoktyā 'tṛtīye punareva ca';
GSP33bbdip11u:241: ityanuṣajyate / nanu sūtrāntaraireva vedārthanirṇayasambhavātkiṃ brahmasūtrairiti gatārthatāśaṅkāparihārāyāha - 'yeṣām';
GSP33bbdip11u:252: kiṃ tat sūtratvaṃ yadāñjasyaṃ brahmasūtrāṇāmityata āha - 'alpa';
GSP33bbdip11u:253: iti / yāvadakṣaratāṃ vinā śrutyarthābhyāṃ vivakṣitārthasiddhirnāsti tadarthapratipādanāya tāvanmātrākṣaramasati niyāmake tato 'dhikākṣararahitam 'alpākṣaram';
GSP33bbdip11u:254: / kecittu - alpākṣarabahvakṣarayuktaparyāyapadayormadhye alpākṣarapadopetatvaṃ alpākṣaratvamityāhuḥ / taṭṭīkānanuguṇam / evaṃ ca bhavitumarhatītyanucyamānārtham 'asandigdham';
GSP33bbdip11u:258: / tattvapradīpe tu ekaṃ prayojanaṃ pratyapekṣitārthasya kṛtsnasya pratipādikaṃ 'viśvatomukham';
GSP33bbdip11u:264: abhyupayantītyarthaḥ / atra bhāṣyanirṇayahetuśūnyavākyaṃ kuśalapuruṣoktalaukikavārtādikaṃ bhagavannāmamantrādikam arthāpratipādakatve 'pi
GSP33bbdip11u:265_2: atra sarvatra dharmikathane 'pi taddvārā sūtrapadapravṛttinimittamapyuktamiti nāsaṅgatiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:273: iti samudāyaikavacanam / co 'vadhāraṇe yata ityarthe ca / 'api';
GSP33bbdip11u:274: śabdo mukhyasūtratvasamuccaye / tathā ca yato brahmasūtrāṇāṃ mukhyasūtratvamasti ata eva hi 'nirviśeṣitasūtratvaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:275: nirgatā viśeṣā yasmāttannirviśeṣaṃ tathākhyātaṃ nirviśeṣitaṃ tādṛśaṃ sūtrapadaṃ yasya tasya bhāvaḥ / yadvā - viśeṣo viśeṣaṇaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:276: tasyābhāvo 'sya sañjātaḥ tādṛśaḥ sūtraśabdo yasya tasya bhāvo nirviśeṣitasūtratvam / viśeṣaṇarahitakevalasūtrapadavācyatvamasti purāṇādāvuktam / anyathā tanna syāt, vyāpakābhāve
GSP33bbdip11u:279_0: iti vivekaḥ / anena brahmasūtrāṇāṃ mukhyasūtratve nirviśeṣitaśabdavācyatvāditi heturukto
GSP33bbdip11u:279_1: bhavati / atra hetoraprayojakatvamāśaṅkya vyāptivacanena tāṃ parihartuṃ tatra prathamaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:281_0: ityanuvartate / tenaikaśabdārthasya mukhyatvasya vyāpakatā labhyate / tathā ca yathā
GSP33bbdip11u:281_1: ekasyaiva sataḥ kṛṣṇasya vedavyāsasya vyāsatvaṃ nirviśeṣitavyāsapadavācyatvamastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:281_2: tathā ca nirviśeṣitatvānmukhyasūtratvaṃ brahmasūtrāṇāmiti vākyaśeṣaḥ / idānīṃ ye
GSP33bbdip11u:281_3: amukhyāḥ na te nirviśeṣapadavācyāḥ kintu saviśeṣapadavācyāḥ iti vyatirekavyāptimabhipretya
GSP33bbdip11u:284: iti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca - yathā kṛṣṇāt 'anye';
GSP33bbdip11u:286: eva viśeṣaṇamapekṣyaiva vyāsāḥ na tannairapekṣyeṇa / tṛtīyārthe vā pañcamī,
GSP33bbdip11u:305: upajānantītyarthaḥ / tathā ca anyasūtrāṇāṃ saviśeṣaṇasūtratvāt amukhyatvameva,
GSP33bbdip11u:313: ityapi / tena mukhyatvāmukhyatvayorvyāpakatāsiddhiḥ / vācakatvaṃ ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ / tathā ca yato mukhyasyaiva 'nirviśeṣeṇa';
GSP33bbdip11u:330: iti kvacitpāṭhaḥ / viśeṣaṇaṃ prāpta iti tasyārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:331: tathā ca mukhyāmukhyayornirviśeṣaṇasaviśeṣaṇaśabdavācyatve vedo vṛddhavyavahāraśca pramāṇamityuktatvānna tayoḥ kāraṇāntaraṃ śaṅkyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:336: astvetatsūtratvamañjasā brahmasūtrāṇām / tathāpi vedārthanirṇayasya sūtrāntaraireva sambhavāt kiṃ brahmasūtrairiti codyasya kathaṃ 'yeṣām';
GSP33bbdip11u:338_0: iti / nimittasaptamī iyam / apiḥ abhivyāptau saṅkocanivartakaḥ / nirṇayasya sarvatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:338_1: viṣayadvārā tasya ca śabdadvārā bodhyam / tathā ca yebhyaḥ sūtrebhyaḥ sarve nirṇayāḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:340: pramāṇa ityarthaḥ / yadvā nirṇīyanta iti nirṇayāḥ nirṇetavyārthāḥ / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - 'yeṣām';
GSP33bbdip11u:341_0: iti vākye tāvat brahmasūtrāṇāmevāñjasā sūtratvamityuktam / sati caivaṃ tadantargataṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:341_1: sūtradharmatayoktaṃ viśvatoṇukhatvamapi teṣāmevāñjasā bhavati / yadā caivaṃ tadā
GSP33bbdip11u:343: iti / tacchabdaghaṭitaṃ tadvacanaṃ tādarthyena sūtrakaraṇavacanamiti bhavati tena śaṅkāparihāra iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:349: anyathā tadvaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt / tathā ca aṃśe gatārthatetyāśaṅkāparihārāyāñjasyoktyā sūcitamanyaccāha - 'śabdajātasya';
GSP33bbdip11u:350_0: iti / pūrvamīmāṃsādirūpasyetyarthaḥ / ata evoktaṃ sudhāyām “etanmīmāṃsopajīvinī khalu
GSP33bbdip11u:350_1: seti purāṇe paṭhyate śabdajātasyeti“iti / kartari ṣaṣṭhīyaṃ na karmaṇi / ata eva
GSP33bbdip11u:350_2: ṭīkāyāṃ śabdasamūhairiti tṛtīyā / kartṛtvaṃ ca karaṇībhūtavedetikartavyatayā / itikartavyatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:350_3: ca mīmāṃsādvārā upakārakatvāt bhavati / śabdajātapadaṃ śabdapramāṇamātraparamityāśayena sambandhaṣaṣṭhīyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:351: sambandhaśca janyajanakabhāvaḥ iti kecit / yatpramāṇaṃ mūlaṃ yasya sa tathoktaḥ / 'ca'; śabdassamuccaye,
GSP33bbdip11u:353: ityasyānukarṣakaśca / itiśabdo 'dhyāhāryaḥ / tathā ca anyeṣāṃ dvitraśākhānirṇāyakatve 'pi bhavatyeva brahmasūtrāṇāmevānanyāpekṣāsaṅkucitasarvaśākhānirṇāyakatvam,
GSP33bbdip11u:367: ityanena karmajājānajadevadevagandharvā api saṅgṛhītāḥ / manuṣyapadaṃ “nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ“(tai. saṃ. 2-5-11)
GSP33bbdip11u:368: ityādāviva mananaśīlarṣiparam / pāntīti pāḥ cakravartinaḥ / kṣīti kṣayārthasya kṣeḥ rūpaṃ manuṣyottamavācakam,
GSP33bbdip11u:369: teṣāmitarāpekṣayā atyalpāyuṣṭvāt / manuṣyagandharvāṇāmapyupalakṣakametat / manuṣyāśca pitaraśca pāśca kṣayaśceti vigrahaḥ / anena 'devarṣipitṛpanarāḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:370: ityuktāḥ pañcavidhā api muktiyogyāḥ saṅgṛhītā bhavanti / pakṣītyasyākhaṇḍatve pakṣiśabdo jaritāryādiyogyatiryakparaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:373: jñānaṃ saṃsthāpya bhagavān krīḍate puruṣottamaḥ / ityādi /
GSP33bbdip11u:377: utpādya dṛḍhīkṛtveti vā / dṛḍhīkaraṇaṃ nāma jñānaviṣaye saṃśayaviparyayanirāsaḥ / tathā ca puruṣottamo mahāyaśāḥ uttamaśloko bhagavān vyāso yeṣu sūtreṣu sarve nirṇayāḥ samudīritāḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:379_2: tadupajīvī - taṃ vinā avāntaratātparyajñānamātreṇa muktiphalāsiddheriti coktaṃ 'yeṣāṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:380: iti pūrvavākye pramāṇe ca - evaṃvidhāni etādṛkprakārāṇi sūtrāṇi kṛtvā brahmarudrādideveṣu manuṣyapitṛpakṣiṣu jñānaṃ saṃsthāpya krīḍata iti mahāvākyayojanā / 'krīḍate parameśvaraḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:381_0: iti pāṭhe aiśvaryam evaṃvidhasūtrakaraṇe asāmarthyaśaṅkānirāsakatayoktamiti dhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:381_1: atra brahmādiṣu jñānasaṃsthāpanaṃ nāma pūrvaṃ sthitasyaiva jñānasya viśeṣayuktyādibhiḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:383: iti gītātātparyodāhṛtavacanāt / na ca 'evaṃ jñānaṃ punaḥ prāpurdevāśca ṛṣayastathā';
GSP33bbdip11u:396_0: tathā ca viṣayābhāvāt pratyagrūpe brahmaṇyahamiti pratīyamāne 'pi mokṣānuphalambhena
GSP33bbdip11u:396_1: prayojanābhāvāt tata eva tatpratibaddhādhikāryabhāvācca na brahmajijñāsā kartavyeti
GSP33bbdip11u:400_2: jijñāsā viṣayaḥ / kartavyā na veti sandehaḥ / na kartavyeti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ / asmin
GSP33bbdip11u:400_3: pakṣe ca śāstrasyānārambhaṇīyatvaniścayaḥ phalam / kartavyeti siddhāntaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:408_0: antarbhāvarūpā ānantaryalakṣaṇā ceti / tatra śāstrādhyāyapādairantarbhāvarūpā saṅgatiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:408_1: pūrvādhikaraṇatadviṣayavākyābhyāṃ tu ānantaryarūpā / sāpi ākṣepikī ātideśikī aupodghātikī
GSP33bbdip11u:408_2: āpavādikī prāsaṅgikī ityādirūpeṇa bahuvidhā / tatra pañcādhikaraṇīparyantaṃ śāstrasaṅgatimātraṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:409_1: pañcādhikaraṇīsādhāraṇaḥ / tathā pūrvādhikaraṇatadviṣayasaṅgatī api naitadadhikaraṇasya bhavataḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:411_0: atra sūtre ādyantayoroṅkāraḥ uccāraṇīyaḥ tatrādya eka eva dṛṣṭādṛṣṭobhayārthaḥ ata
GSP33bbdip11u:411_1: eva sūtrāvayavaḥ sarvasūtreṣu anuvṛttyarthamasaṃhitatayoccāryate / athavā - ādau
GSP33bbdip11u:411_2: oṃkāradvayaṃ adṛṣṭārtho dṛṣṭārthaśceti / ante tu pakṣadvaye 'pi adṛṣṭārtha eka evoṅkāraḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:412: ityetat avyayaṃ brahmaśabdaviśeṣaṇaṃ guṇapūrṇatvavāci / brahmaśabdo 'pi vidvadrūḍhyā mahāyogena ca viṣṇuvācī / 'atha';
GSP33bbdip11u:414: iti sambadhyate / kartavyeti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca 'atha';
GSP33bbdip11u:419: śravaṇādirūpo vicāraḥ kartavya iti sūtrārthaḥ / viṣṇoḥ prasādāditi 'ataḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:420_0: śabdasyārthāntaram / asya jijñāsādikāryaṃ bhavediti vākyaśeṣeṇānvayaḥ / oṃ brahmaśabdayorubhayoryaugikatve
GSP33bbdip11u:426: granthādau maṅgalācaraṇasyāvaśyaṃ kartavyatvena maṅgalaprayojakatayā athaśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe - 'atha';
GSP33bbdip11u:428: tathā praśastarūpānuṣṭheyamaṅgalātmako viṣṇuḥ tadguṇo vābhidheyo yasya sa tathoktaḥ / athaśabdasya maṅgalaphalakatvaṃ tu -
GSP33bbdip11u:431: iti manusmṛtisiddham / muktyarthimātrasya brahmajijñāsāyāṃ pravṛttinirasanatātparyeṇāpi prayuktasyākhaṇḍāthaśabdasya vācyamarthamāha - 'adhikāra';
GSP33bbdip11u:433: na kevalaṃ maṅgalaprayojakaḥ kintvānantaryābhidhāyakaśceti viṣayasamuccaye vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:434_1: tatprakārastu candrikāyāmuktaḥ / tathā cādhikārānantaryamartho 'bhidheyo yasya sa
GSP33bbdip11u:434_3: evamuktiḥ / anenānadhikāriṇo muktyarthimātrasya brahmavicāre pravṛttirnirastā bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:437: hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ prasādākhyamartho yasyeti vā, sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:442_0: nanvathātaḥ śabdapūrvakatvaṃ sūtrāṇāṃ kiṃ nimittaṃ vighnanivartakaśabdoccāraṇādeḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:443: iti / yadetat “athaśabdaḥ“ityādinoktaṃ tadgāruḍapurāṇe uktamevetyarthaḥ / na kevalamasmābhiḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:444: kintu gāruḍe ceti samuccaye vā ca śabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:455: ityasya saṅkocavārakaṃ viśeṣaṇam / apirabhivyāptau / evakāro 'niyamavyavṛttyarthaḥ / bhinnakramo vā / tathā ca - he 'vidvan';
GSP33bbdip11u:468: nanvavaśyavaktavyārthatvaṃ svarūpottamattvam arthata ādhikyaṃ vā niyāmakaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāśaṅkyādyapakṣe pṛcchati - 'kaśca';
GSP33bbdip11u:470: avadhāraṇe vā / dvitīyastuśabdārthaḥ arthasyāvaśyavaktavyatvarūpaviśeṣamāha / tuśabdapāṭhastu svarasaḥ / tathā ca - 'tayoḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:473_0: svarūpataścādhikyam / na kathamapītyarthaḥ / evaṃ kathaṃśabdasya praśnaparatvamaṅgīkṛtya
GSP33bbdip11u:473_1: tṛtīyapakṣapraśnaparatvenāpi kathamityetadyojanīyam / arthata iti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca
GSP33bbdip11u:474_1: loke śabdāntareṣu darśanāt athātaśśabdayostatsandehāt praśna eva na tvākṣepaḥ / dvitīyapakṣe
GSP33bbdip11u:474_2: tu svarūpādhikyasya śabdāntareṣvadarśanāt ākṣepa eveti dhyeyam / atroṅkārasya praśnādyaviṣayatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:480: etadākhyāhi me brahman yathā jñāsyāmi tattvataḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:498: iti / parasparasamuccaye tathā caśabdau / evakāro bhinnakramaḥ;
GSP33bbdip11u:501_1: iti bhāvenāthaśabdo maṅgalārtha iti svoktārthe pramāṇaṃ darśayati - 'maṅgalārthe';
GSP33bbdip11u:503_0: avyayaṃ vā / arthaśabdaḥ prayojanavācī / tathā ca - maṅgalarūpaprayojanārthaṃ ca
GSP33bbdip11u:505: iti vacanaṃ tadvaiṣamyasūcanārtham / svavākye pramāṇakramātikramastu maṅgalasya prathamamanuṣṭheyatvāt kṛtaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:510: evamathaśabdasya avasyavaktavyārthatvarūpaṃ prathamaprayoganiyāmakaṃ pradarśya ataḥśabdasyāpi taddarśayati - 'ataḥśabdastu hetvarthe';
GSP33bbdip11u:511: iti / tuśabdo viśeṣārthaḥ / heturliṅgaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca sa cāsāvartho 'bhidheyaśca tasmin tadviṣaye tadvācakatayā sūtrakṛdbhiḥ 'samudīritaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:512: ityarthaḥ / gurvarthadīpikāyāntu “hetvarthe iti svavākye pramāṇe ca 'taddhetutvaṃ vadan';
GSP33bbdip11u:513_0: ityuttaravākyānusārāt bhāvapradhāno nirdeśaḥ“ityuktam / tanniṣphalam / tathā ca vyākhyāsyāmaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:513_2: pratyayasya tu hetutvamartha iti prakṛtipratyayobhayārthakathanārtham / yadvā - arthaśabdasyobhayatra
GSP33bbdip11u:517: parasya brahmaṇo viṣṇoḥ prasādāditi vā bhavet /
GSP33bbdip11u:520: iti / vāśabdaḥ samuccaye / uktaṃ hi prameyadīpe “vāśabdaścārthaḥ“iti / uktaṃ hi “yadi vā bhedabhinnayoḥ“iti viṣṇutattvanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:528_0: iti śrutiṃ sūcayati parabrahmagrahaṇena / tatsthabrahmaśabdavyākhyānāya parasya brahmaṇa
GSP33bbdip11u:528_1: ityanuvādena viṣṇorityuktam / prasādādityanantaraṃ tajjijñāsādirūpaṃ kāryamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:528_2: bhavedityasya ityarthe 'pi ataḥśabdaḥ ityanvayaḥ / ataḥśabdaprakṛtyarthasya phalasya
GSP33bbdip11u:530: kintu kartavyajijñāsāyāṃ jñānamokṣayorathaśabdārthādhyayanādau ca kāraṇatvenānvaya ityāśayena pṛthaguktiḥ / yadyapi hetvarthe ityanenaivāyamartho labhyeta,
GSP33bbdip11u:537: nanu jijñāsādyarthaṃ kiṃ bhagavatprasādena yenāsāvavaśyavaktavyārthaḥ syādityata āha - 'sa hi';
GSP33bbdip11u:541: sarveṣāṃ adhikāriṇāṃ sarvasmin pūrṇe viṣṇau manovṛtteḥ prerakaḥ prāvaṇyahetuḥ 'samudāhṛtaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:542: prāmāṇikairityarthaḥ / jijñāsāpi sākṣātpramāṇadvārā vā manovṛtteḥ prāvaṇyameva,
GSP33bbdip11u:543_0: “jijñāsāpi saiva“iti sudhokteḥ / evaṃ sarvāsāṃ manovṛttīnāṃ tatprabhedānāṃ ṭīkāsthādipadagṛhītānāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:543_1: jñānādhyayanādīnāṃ manovṛttisādhyamokṣādeśca prerakaḥ sampādakaḥ ityapi vyākhyeyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:550_1: kṛtacodyasya kaḥ parihāra ityato na kevalamavaśyavaktavyārthatvādathātaḥśabdayoḥ prathamaprayogaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:553: iti / śabdayoṛ samuccaye ādyaḥ caśabdaḥ / nimittasamuccaye dvitīyaḥ / 'svarūpottamau';
GSP33bbdip11u:559: svasamānajātīyaśabdāntarotpatteḥ pūrvaṃ oṅkāro 'tha śabdaścetyetau kaṇṭhaṃ bhittvā 'vinissṛtau'; viniryātau,
GSP33bbdip11u:562: prathamaṃ prayojyāviti yojanā / atrākṣepāviṣayasyāpyoṅkārasya svarūpādhikyoktirbrahmamīmāṃsāśāstramātramukhyāmukhyāditvavivakṣayā pravṛttaṃ 'sarva ete';
GSP33bbdip11u:563: iti vakṣyamāṇamanusṛtyeti draṣṭavyam / nanu dvayorekavidhaṃ prāthamikatvaṃ viruddhamityata uktaṃ 'kramāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:570: athaśabdasya oṅkāreṇa saha svarūpādhikayamabhidhāya ataḥśabdasyāpi tadāha - 'tat';
GSP33bbdip11u:573_0: ityasyānuvādaḥ / sa coddeśyasamarpakasya ata ityasya śabdaparatvajñāpanadvārā tṛtīyatayoktatvādividhānārthaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:573_1: anyathā svarūpādhikyakathanadaśāsaṅgatiḥ syāt / yadyapi purovādānusārāt 'taddhetutvaṃ vadan';
GSP33bbdip11u:575: tathāpi hetuśabdasya liṅgārthatvapakṣe tatsvarūpaṃ vivarituṃ kāraṇārthatvapakṣe tatkāryaṃ tasipratyayārthaṃ ca pradarśayituṃ 'taddhetutvaṃ vadan';
GSP33bbdip11u:578: aparo viṣṇuparaḥ / atra śabdaparasyātaśśabdasya samuccayārthena apiśabdenānvayaḥ / co yata ityarthe / 'tṛtīyaḥ udāhṛtaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:583: tasya prasannasyākāravācyasya viṣṇostatra jijñāsādau kāraṇatvaṃ tasipratyayena vadanprakṛtyaiva tasya jijñāsādermokṣahetutvarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ vā vadan 'ataḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:587_0: yata evamato 'taśśabdo 'pi tṛtīyatayā prāthamika udāhṛta iti yojanā / tathā ca -
GSP33bbdip11u:587_1: maṅgalaśabdena maṅgaloktāvapi tasya svarūpādhikyānukteḥ athātaḥśabdābhyāmivādhikāraprayojanayoranukteśca na tena gatārthatā,
GSP33bbdip11u:588_1: tataśśabdena hetvānantaryapratiyogyadhikārasūcane 'pi na tasyādisūtre niveśā yuktaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:594: na kevalamavaśyavaktavyārthatvāt nāpi svarūpādhikyāt athātaśśabdayoḥ prathamaprayogaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:595: kintvavayavārthataśca / ato 'pi prathamaprayoga iti bhāvena kathamiti tṛtīyapraśnasya prākarāntareṇottaramāha - 'akāraḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:606: evaṃ tayoḥ 'tathau'; taśca thaśca varṇau 'prāṇātmakau'; prāṇau,
GSP33bbdip11u:607: doṣātmakaḥ doṣa itivat / viśeṣaṇayoḥ pratyekamanvayaḥ / prāṇaśabdo vāyuviṣṇūbhayavācī / “mahataścaturmukhāt“itivat abhimānyabhimanyamānayoḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:610: śabdaḥ / proktāviti vācyatvābhimānitvayoḥ prāmāṇikatvamāha / kramabhaṅgastu vargakramānusārāt uccāraṇalāghavācca kṛtaḥ / paramātmavācitvaṃ ca tadguṇadvāretyāha - 'vyāpti';
GSP33bbdip11u:611: iti / tasyeti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca - tasya akāravācyasya parabrahmaṇo vyāptisthityabhidāyakau ityarthaḥ / tathayoretatkrameṇa yojanīyam / atrākārārtho guṇavyāptiḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:613: thakārasya tu avikāreṇa avasthitirartha ityarthabhedo jñātavyaḥ / tattvapradīpe tu - 'tathau prāṇātmakaṃ prāptau';
GSP33bbdip11u:614_0: iti pāṭhabhedamaṅgīkṛtya prāṇātmakaṃ prāṇapraṇetāraṃ viṣṇuṃ vācakatvena prāptāviti
GSP33bbdip11u:614_1: vyākhyātam / yadyapi sūtre praviṣṭasya sarvanāmaprakṛtikasya ataśśabdasya naivamavayavārthakathanaṃ yujyate,
GSP33bbdip11u:616_0: ityanenaiva arthata ādhikyaṃ coktam / tathāpi athaśabdasya arthata ādhikyānukteḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:619: ataśca pūrvamuccāryāḥ sarva ete satāṃ matāḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:623: iti / co 'vadhāraṇe samuccaye ca / tatra athātaśśabdaviṣaye samuccayaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:631: mukhyānāṃ brahmasūtrāṇāṃ pūrvaṃ ādisūtre ityarthaḥ / na cātra “sakalasūtrakārairevameva prayuktatvāt“iti sudhāvirodhaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:649: ityanena sūtrakṛtāṃ śabdamārātmyatattvajñāne asāmarthyaṃ nivārayati / evakāraḥ sarvaśāstrādisūtravivakṣayoṅkāravyavacchedakaḥ / ata eva 'ataśca';
GSP33bbdip11u:650: iti trayāṇāṃ prakṛtatvepi oṅkāravaiṣamyajñāpanāya athātaśśabdayorevoktiḥ / ata eva athātaśśabdaviṣaye upakramopasaṃhārayoḥ 'nikhilāni sūtrāṇi';
GSP33bbdip11u:653: oṅkāraviṣaye tu tadanuktiḥ / athaśabdasyoṅkāreṇa saha pāṭhe 'pi na sārvatrikatvaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:661_0: iti / caśabdo na kevalamadhikāraḥ kintu tadvibhāgaśca bhāgavatatantrākhyagranthe
GSP33bbdip11u:661_1: 'bhihita iti samuccaye / atra pramāṇe adhikārikathane 'pi tadviśeṣaṇatayā devatvādirūpo
GSP33bbdip11u:667: iti / tvaḥ pratyekaṃ sambadhyate / itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇe tṛtīyā / hiśabdaḥ prasiddhau /
GSP33bbdip11u:670: tatra mandā manuṣyeṣu ya uttamagaṇā matāḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:673_0: trividheṣu madhye manuṣyeṣu ye uttamagaṇāḥ te mokṣayogyeṣu mandādhikāriṇa ityuddeśyavidheyabhāvo
GSP33bbdip11u:673_1: draṣṭavyaḥ / evaṃ uttaratrāpi / gaṇaśabdena puruṣārthanayoktatrividhamanuṣyottamā gṛhītāḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:683: ityasya brahmajijñāsāyāmityarthaḥ / ata evoktaṃ ṭīkāyāṃ “brahmajijñāsāyāṃ“iti / tathā ca - 'tatra';
GSP33bbdip11u:695_0: avāntaravibhāgaḥ anyonyābhāvo vā jñeya ityarthaḥ / anena mokṣayogyatvaṃ vaidikabrahmavidyādhikārisāmānyalakṣaṇamabhipretam /
GSP33bbdip11u:695_1: nanvidaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sacchūdrādau ativyāptam / na ca sacchūdrāderviprādidehāntare brahmavidyādhikāritvānnātivyāptiriti vācyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:697: taddehāvacchedena tu anutpannabrahmāparokṣajñānitvenāsyābhāvaniścayāt / tathā ca sacchūdrādāvasyādhikārasya prāyikatvādbāhulakatvāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:699: asya ca mokṣayogyatvasya svarūpatvenānadhikāraḥ daśāyāmapi sattvādvyāpterdhrauvyādityataḥ prakārāntareṇa adhikāriṇaḥ svarūpamāha - 'tathā';
GSP33bbdip11u:713: “pramāṇāni“ityuddeśavākye bahuvacananirdeśe 'pi “pramākaraṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ“ityekavacanena lakṣaṇoktivat / atra - avaiṣṇavasya vede 'pi hyadhikāro na vidyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:715_1: pṛthamuktam / ādiśabdena “śānto dāntaḥ“ityuktānāṃ grahaṇam / sāranityasamuccaye cāpiśabdau / 'iti';
GSP33bbdip11u:717_0: bhaktajanaḥ / asya sarvatra sambandhaḥ / tathā ca - yo naraḥ parame viṣṇau bhaktimān
GSP33bbdip11u:717_1: adhyayanavāṃśca so 'dhamo 'dhikārīti prāmāṇikaiḥ samudāhṛtaḥ / yaḥ śamādisaṃyukto
GSP33bbdip11u:724: anityaṃ brahmādijīvānāṃ dehanāśe 'pi svarūpanāśābhāvāt kapratyayaḥ / parabrahma tu sarvasāraṃ sarvathā nityaṃ ceti /
GSP33bbdip11u:730: jñānavān san sārāsāranityānityavastuvivekavāniti yāvat / yaśca tato vivekāt 'jātavairāgyaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:731: iti vijñāya janitavairāgya iti vā / yaśca 'viṣṇupādaikasaṃśrayaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:732: viṣṇupāda eva eko mukhyaḥ saṃśrayo mama śaraṇamiti jñānaṃ yasya saḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:738: sannyastaṃ bhagavati samarpitaṃ akhilaṃ yadakāmyaṃ karma tadvān 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:740_0: syāditi yojanā / atra sannyāso nāma bhagavān sarvāṇi karmāṇi karoti sarvakarmāṇi
GSP33bbdip11u:740_1: bhagavatpūjārūpāṇīti ca jñātvā bhrāntyā jīvakartṛkatvena jñātānāṃ karmaṇāṃ bhagavati
GSP33bbdip11u:740_2: visargaḥ / yathoktaṃ gītābhāṣye - “bhagavāneva sarvāṇi karmāṇi karoti“ityādinā /
GSP33bbdip11u:742: ityantavākyena yānyadhikāritrayaviśeṣaṇānyuktāni tānyeva sarvāṇi militvādhikārisāmānyalakṣaṇabhūtānītyuktaṃ bhavati/ na ca militānāṃ trayāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ triṣvabhāvādasambhavaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:744_0: uttaravākye pūrvasya pūrvavākye cottarasyānukarṣeṇa sarvatra sarvasya satvābhyupagamenāsambhavābhāvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:746_4: madhye yaḥ pracurādhyayanavān - itare tvapracure - so 'dhamo 'dhikārī / yaḥ pracurādhyayanaśamādimān
GSP33bbdip11u:746_6: itare tvapracure - sa uttamādhikārīti tallakṣaṇamedāt traividhyopapattiriti uktam / 'iti';
GSP33bbdip11u:754: udāhṛtapramāṇe brahmavidyāyāmiti kaṇṭhato 'nukteḥ kutaśca tatrādhikāratraividhyamityata āha - 'adhyayana';
GSP33bbdip11u:755: iti / mātraśabdaḥ kārtsnyārthaḥ / tathā ca - yathāśaktisarvavedādhyayanavato brahmavidyādhikāriteti sūtrārthaḥ / 'nāviśeṣāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:763: “śānto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ samāhito bhūtvā ātmanyevātmānaṃ paśyet“(bṛ-u. 6-4-23)
GSP33bbdip11u:770: bhagavanniṣṭhabuddhiḥ “śamo manniṣṭhatā buddheḥ“iti bhāgavatokteḥ / tattvapradīpe tu - vaiṣṇavasiddhāntādacalanaṃ śama iti paryavasitamuktam / 'dānto'; nigṛhītamadaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:772: viṣayālambuddhimān / bṛhadbhāṣyarītyā - upa samīpe svahṛdayesthe viṣṇau santoṣavāniti vā / 'titikṣuḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:774: same sendire harau cittavṛttimān / yadvā - 'yathāvastu tathā jñānaṃ tatsāmyātsamamīritam';
GSP33bbdip11u:775_0: iti vacanāt samaṃ yathārthamāhitamādhānaṃ manovṛttirūpaṃ jñānaṃ icchā ca yasya sa
GSP33bbdip11u:775_1: tathoktaḥ / tathāca yathāvastujñānādimānityarthaḥ / bhūtvetyasya pratyekaṃ sambandhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:780_0: vicārayediti lākṣaṇikārthaḥ / śāntādirbhūtvātmānaṃ vidyādityanena upanayanasya adhyayanārthatvavat
GSP33bbdip11u:780_1: śāntyāderbrahmavidyārthatvamuktaṃ bhavati / yadyapi paśyatīti śrutipāṭhaḥ tathāpi
GSP33bbdip11u:780_2: viṣṇutattvanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ “sa tathā cakāreti kvacitpāṭhaḥ sa sadṛśaśākhāntaragato jñātavyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:781: evamanyatrāpi“ityuktatvāt tannyāyenāyamapi sadṛśaśākhāntaragato vā paśyatītyasyārthānuvādo vetyadoṣaḥ//
GSP33bbdip11u:810: samidyuktau pāṇī yasya / yadvā - samprāptau sampuṭīkṛtau ariktau vā pāṇī yasya / sa evaṃbhūtassan 'śrotriyaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:812: upasīdedityarthaḥ / gurumeva na tvanyamiti vā evaśabdānvayaḥ / tattvapradīpe tu - 'karmacitān';
GSP33bbdip11u:814: parito vīkṣya pāralaukikatvena tadviparītānapi karmabhiścitān svargādilokān vināśina eva parīkṣya tebhyo 'nirvedamāyāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:820: iti śrutyartha uktaḥ / atrāpi vijñānapadena brahmajñāniparabrāhmaṇapadena ca uttamādhikārī sūcitaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:821: 'devādīnāṃ tu tajjñānaṃ vijñānamiti kīrtitam'; iti gītābhāṣyokteḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:846: prakāśayatītyarthaḥ/ atra 'bhaktameva ca vṛṇuta iti prasiddhaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:847: iti prameyadīpoktarītyā vṛṇuta ityanena bhaktatvaṃ sūcitam / tattvapradīpe tu - 'yamevaiṣaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:854: yasya deve parā bhaktiryathā deve tathā gurau /
GSP33bbdip11u:856: sā ca bhaktiḥ viṣṇau sarvādhikā anyeṣvapi yathāyogyā brahmavidyopayoginītyarthe śvetāśvatarāṇāṃ śrutiṃ (śve. 6-23)
GSP33bbdip11u:862: iti dvedhā vicchedaḥ / pūrvavedādibhirguruṇeti ca śeṣaḥ / tathāca - 'yasya';
GSP33bbdip11u:870: 'tathā gurau'; anyeṣu svottameṣu ca yathā yogyā bhaktirasti /
GSP33bbdip11u:877: mahātmanaḥ kartari ṣaṣṭhīyam / tenādhikāriṇā pūrvaṃ vedādibhirguruṇā vā 'kathitāḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:895: kintu “bhaktyā tvananyayā śakya ahamevaṃ vidhorjuna jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ“(bha.gī. 11-54)
GSP33bbdip11u:897_0: caśabdārthaḥ / nanu yadyadhyayanavatāmeva brahmavidyādhikāraḥ tarhi trivarṇetareṣāmadhyayanābhāvenādhikāro
GSP33bbdip11u:897_1: na syāt / tataśca teṣāṃ brahmajñānābhāvena mokṣābhāvassyādityāśaṅkāṃ smṛtyā pariharati
GSP33bbdip11u:898: iti / prakṛtaśaṅkānirāsapūrvakamiti śeṣaḥ / pūrvagranthasamuccaye caśabdaḥ / asyāpi 'adhikāra uktaḥ'; / ityanenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:904: trivarṇabāhyāḥ / ayaṃ cārtho “viṣṇunāmasvādhyāyo 'ntyānāṃ“ityetadavatārikārūpatayā “nāgnirna yajñaḥ śūdrasyetyādestrivarṇabāhyānāṃ“iti nyāyadīpikayā sūcitaḥ / 'bhaktāḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:906: ityapi/ etaccobhayanvayi / tathā ca - na kevalaṃ traivarṇikāḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:907: kintu ye antyajāḥ trivarṇabāhyāḥ śūdrādayaḥ pulkasāntāḥ te yadyapi vaidikabrahmajñānānadhikāriṇaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:908: tathāpi yato bhaktāḥ ato nāmajñānādhikāriṇaḥ viṣṇunāmajñānatatsvādhyāyādhikāriṇaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:917: iti / striyaśca śūdrāśca brahmabandhavo brāhmaṇābhāsāśca teṣāmiti vigrahaḥ / tantraṃ pañcarātrādi,
GSP33bbdip11u:919: tantrotpannabrahmavidyāyāmiti yāvat / apiśabdo 'trāpi sambadhyate / tathāca teṣāṃ tadjñānadvārāpi mokṣopapattiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:922: ekadeśe parokte tu na tu granthapurassare /
GSP33bbdip11u:925: kintu ekadeśe eva / tatrāpi 'na granthapurassare'; na svaprādhānyena granthārambhe 'dhikāraḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:929_1: anena strīśūdrādimātraṃ puraskṛtya purāṇādigranthapravacanamapi na kāryamityuktaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:935: pariśeṣāt traivarṇikānāṃ cet - teṣāmapi kiṃ sarveṣāmadhikāraḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:941: uktetarabrahmakṣatriyavaiśyānāṃ adhikāritetyarthaḥ / na kevalaṃ nāmādijñānādhikāra ityarthepi tuśabdaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:947: ityādau strīṇāmapi vedādhikāradarśanāt kathaṃ tāsāmanadhikāra ityata uktasyāpavādamāha - 'āhuḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:950_0: iti tatpuruṣakarmadhārayau / tathāca - na kevalamuttamānāṃ devānāṃ strīṇāṃ nāmādijñāne
GSP33bbdip11u:950_1: 'dhikāraḥ kintu vaidike 'pi jñāne vedotpannabrahmavidyāyāmapi vaidikāḥ adhikāramāhuriti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:953: yathorvaśī yamī caiva śacyādyāśca tathāparāḥ // iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:958: yamasya bhāryā śyāmalā / caśabda uktasamuccaye / ādyaśabdena umāratyādi gṛhyate / anuktasamuccaye dvitīyaścaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:959: tena manuṣyādikulotpannadevastriyo gṛhyante / tathāśabdaḥ upamāyāṃ uktasamuccaye vā / aparāḥ uttamastrībhyo anyāḥ ṛṇipatnyaḥ / avarā iti vā,
GSP33bbdip11u:963: yato nārāyaṇaprasādamṛte na mokṣaḥ,na ca jñānaṃ vinātyarthaprasādaḥ/
GSP33bbdip11u:972: ityāvartate / tathāca - yatassukhameva me syāt duḥkhamīṣadapi mābhūditi sarvābhimato 'mokṣaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:977_0: ityarthaḥ / uktaṃ hi śabdādhikaraṇe tattvapradīpe “mokṣasyaiva paramapuruṣārthatvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:977_1: tasya ca samīco vinā viṣṇuprasādāt alabhyatvāt tasya ca atimātrasya aparokṣajñānaprasādhyatvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:977_2: tasya cāparokṣasya jijñāsāsamāyattattvādviṣṇureva jijñāsya ityuktam“iti / sāvadhāraṇānvayasyāpyupalakṣakametat /
GSP33bbdip11u:977_3: tasyātaśśabdena parāmarśānnānupapattiḥ / anena sūtre yato nārāyaṇaprasādamṛte na mokṣaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:983_1: heturartha ityetadvivṛtaṃ bhavati / evaṃ yato nārāyaṇaprasādamṛte na jñānaṃ na jijñāsā
GSP33bbdip11u:983_2: kintu prasādenaiva iti yojanāyāṃ ataḥśabdasyārthāntaramapi vivṛtaṃ bhavati / nārāyaṇaśabdaprayogeṇa
GSP33bbdip11u:988: vākyaṃ veti satāṃ nītiḥ sāvakāśe na tadbhavatet //
GSP33bbdip11u:992: iti padasyaiva adhyāhāraḥ kutaḥ adhyāhārasya niraṅkuśatvena 'na kartavyā';
GSP33bbdip11u:993: iti vākyasyaivādhyāhāraḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha - 'yatra';
GSP33bbdip11u:994: iti / atra yatreti tatreti padamiti cāvartate,
GSP33bbdip11u:1004_0: yatra vākye yasmin vākye sāvakāśe arthāntare ghaṭanāvati sati tadeva padaṃ niyamena
GSP33bbdip11u:1004_1: pratiṣṭhitaṃ prāptaṃ na bhavet / evaṃ yatra mahāvākye yadavāntaravākyaṃ vinānyatrānavasaraḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:1005_0: yatra yasmin mahāvākye sāvakāśe sati tadavāntaravākyaṃ niyamena pratiṣṭhitaṃ na bhavedityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1005_1: yatra vākye yatpadaṃ vākyaṃ vāpekṣitaṃ anyatrānyasyānavasara iti vā / iti bṛhatsaṃhitāyāmuktatvāt 'kartavyā';
GSP33bbdip11u:1012: “tamevaṃ vidvānamṛta iha bhavati, nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyate“
GSP33bbdip11u:1016: ityanena prasādasya mokṣasādhanatvaṃ tatkuta ityatastatra śrutiṃ pramāṇayati - 'taṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1026_0: nāsti ata ityarthaḥ / atra jñānasya mokṣasādhanatvaṃ sākṣāt jñāyate / prasādasya
GSP33bbdip11u:1026_1: mokṣasādhanatvaṃ tu ṭīkāsudhoktarītyā prasādaṃ vinā vidvatpadalakṣyāparokṣajñānamātreṇa
GSP33bbdip11u:1030: “priyo hi jñāninotyarthamahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ“/
GSP33bbdip11u:1034: iti yadaparokṣajñānasya prasādasādhanatvamuktaṃ tatkuta ityatastatra gītāsmṛtimāha 'priyo hi';
GSP33bbdip11u:1043: “ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ“
GSP33bbdip11u:1054: na tvanyena karmaṇetyarthaḥ / ata eva viṣṇutattvanirṇayaṭīkāyām “eṣa paramātmā yaṃ vṛṇute yasya prasīdati tenaiva labhyaḥ / kathaṃ?
GSP33bbdip11u:1056_0: tataścāsya svāṃ tanuṃ avidyāvṛtasvarūpāṃ vivṛṇute āvirbhāvayati“iti prakṛtānukūlatayā
GSP33bbdip11u:1062: darśanena viṣayīkartavya ityarthaḥ / darśanaṃ kena syādityākāṅkṣāyāmāha - 'śrotavyaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1073: iti / śrutayaśca smṛtiśca tābhya iti vigrahaḥ / asya 'yato nārāyaṇa';
GSP33bbdip11u:1081: prasādasya mokṣasādhanatābodhake “tamevaṃ vidvān“yamevaiṣa vṛṇute“ityādāviva “priyo hi“iti vākye 'nyaniṣedhābhāvādityāśṅkāṃ smṛtyā pariharati - 'karmaṇā';
GSP33bbdip11u:1096: utkṛṣṭatayā pramita ityarthaḥ / avadhāraṇārthakatuśabdasya dvirgrahaṇaṃ triṣvapyanvayasūcanārtham /
GSP33bbdip11u:1106_0: iti śruteḥ kāmyakarmaṇāṃ vairāgyajananadvārā mokṣe 'pyupayogo 'stīti jñātavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1106_1: evaṃ akāmyakarmasādhyāt adhamaprasādāt antaḥkaraṇaśuddhyādidvārā mokṣo bhavatītyapi
GSP33bbdip11u:1106_2: jñātavyam / na ca adhamaprasādaśūnyānāṃ atidveṣiṇāṃ duryodhanādīnāṃ kathaṃ svargaprāptiriti vācyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:1107: bhāgavatācāryarahitānāṃ tadabhāvoktāvapi tadvatāṃ tatsambhavāt / yathoktaṃ gītātātparye -
GSP33bbdip11u:1109: yānti svargaṃ tataḥ kṣipraṃ tamondhaṃ prāpnuvanti ca //
GSP33bbdip11u:1111_0: iti / svargaloka ityuktyā tatraiva “mokṣaḥ sāṅkalpikaḥ svargaḥ bhūtāditvaṃ phalaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:1111_1: kramāt“iti vacanokto yo nityasaṃsāribhī rājasarājasai rājasatāmasaiśca prāpya svargapratinidhitvena
GSP33bbdip11u:1111_2: kalpito daityendralokaḥ sāṅkalpikaḥ svargaḥ sa iha na vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1112: kintu saptalokāntargato rājasasāttvikaiḥ prāpyaḥ svargaloka eveti sūcitam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1118_0: ityatra tu janatyāgena janākhyalokasyaiva pratipattayarthaṃ lokaśabdaprayoga iti
GSP33bbdip11u:1118_1: jñeyam / janalokādirityatra tatpuruṣo bahuvrīhiśca vivakṣitaḥ / tuśabdo viśeṣārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1119: viṣṇoḥ prasādāt janalokasyādirmaharlokaḥ janatapolokādireva vā bhavati na muktiḥ / 'muktidastu';
GSP33bbdip11u:1121_0: na tvanyāviti yojanā / tathā ca karmādinā bhagavatprasādasiddhāvapi tasyānuttamatvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:1121_2: jñānamapekṣitamiti bhāvaḥ / na cātra “īyustrīn karmaṇā lokān jñānenaiva taduttarān“iti
GSP33bbdip11u:1126: tasya ca śravaṇādibhirityatra hyādipadena grahaṇādvā; nyāyāmṛtoktarītyā jñānadvāreti śeṣakaraṇādvā;
GSP33bbdip11u:1130: śravaṇaṃ mananaṃ caiva dhyānaṃ bhaktistathaiva ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:1133_0: tathāpi “karmaṇā jñānamātanoti“ityādeḥ karmādināpi jñānaṃ bhavatīti na tadarthaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:1134: iti / atra evakārasya dvirgrahaṇaṃ sarvatra sambandhajñāpanāya / te ca śravaṇādīnāṃ kāryasādhane anyasāhityanirāsaktāḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1138: iti nipātasamudāyo vā / bhaktigrahaṇaṃ prasaṅgāt dṛṣṭāntārthaṃ vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1143: tathā ca 'jñānasampattau'; aparokṣajñānaprāptau yathā bhaktistathā śravaṇādyeva sādhanaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1148: na tvanyat sādhanameva neti yojanā / apradhānasādhanaviṣayaṃ karmādivacanamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1151: na caitāni vinā kaścit jñānamāpa kutaścana // iti nāradīye //
GSP33bbdip11u:1153: viparītaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha - 'na ca';
GSP33bbdip11u:1158: evametāni śravaṇādīni santicet kutaśca karmādervinā jñānaṃ nāpeti neti yojanā / tathā ca nirapekṣānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ śravaṇādyeva jñāne pradhānaṃ sākṣātsādhanaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1159: karmādi tu tadabhāvāt pāramparyeṇa sādhanamiti na vaiparītyamiti bhāvaḥ / 'nāradīye';
GSP33bbdip11u:1163: ityanena jijñāsāyāḥ nirviṣayatvaśaṅkānirāsāya prayuktaḥ sautro brahmaśabdo nārāyaṇapara iti vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1168: nanu nārāyaṇaprasādamṛte na mokṣaścet tarhi tajjijñāsaiva kartavyā na brahmajijñāsā / na ca vācyaṃ nārāyaṇa eva brahmapadena vivakṣitaḥ sūtrakṛteti,
GSP33bbdip11u:1170: iti / mukhya iti śeṣaḥ / caḥ 'anekārtho 'pi brahmaśabdaḥ'; iti apyarthe,
GSP33bbdip11u:1171_0: yata ityarthe ca / tathā ca brahmaśabdasyānekārthatve 'pi yataḥ saḥ viṣṇāveva mukhyaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:1171_1: ato mukhyāmukhyayormukhyasyaiva grāhyatvāt sa eva sūtrakāravivakṣito jñāyata iti
GSP33bbdip11u:1171_2: yojanā / atra śabdāntaraṃ vihāya viṣṇuśabdaprayogeṇa tacchabdagatānāṃ vargapañcamaṣaṣṭhacaturthānāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:1171_3: ṇaṣavānāṃ saṅkhyārekhālekhanena sūtrāṇāṃ catuṣṣaṣṭyuttarapañcaśatasaṅkhyoktā bhavati / yadvā -
GSP33bbdip11u:1174_1: tādṛśaviṣṇuśabdaprayogaḥ / ṭīkāyāṃ tu - atra viṣṇugrahaṇena “saviṣṇurāha hi / taṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:1174_5: “viṣṇureva hi tat śrutestaṃ brahmetyācakṣate“iti sarvadevottamatvena pratijñāto brahmatvena coktaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1175: sa eva brahmaśabdenottaramīmāṃsāyāṃ vicāryatvenocyate'; iti pāṭhabhedenoktam/
GSP33bbdip11u:1180: brahmaśabdasyānyatrāpi rūḍhatvādrūḍhereva mukhyavṛttitvātkuto 'sau viṣṇāveva mukhya ityata āha - 'yaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1182: ityādi atrāpi sambadhyate / co yadyapītyādyarthe / hiśabdo yata ityarthe / śrutirāheti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca yadyapi brahmaśabdo 'nyatra rūḍhaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1186: ato brahmaśabdo viṣṇāveva paramamukhya ityarthaḥ / anyatrājñarūḍheḥ vidvadrūḍheratimukhyatvāditi bhāvaḥ / yamantassamudre iti vākyam -
GSP33bbdip11u:1187: yadoṣadhībhiḥ puruṣān paśūṃśca viveśa bhūtāni carācarāṇi /
GSP33bbdip11u:1188: ataḥ paraṃ nānyadaṇīyasaṃ hi parātparaṃ yanmahato mahāntam //
GSP33bbdip11u:1190: iti vākyena saha vyākhyātaṃ viṣṇutattvanirṇayaṭīkāyām / tathā hi - 'yamantassamudre';
GSP33bbdip11u:1198: yataḥ prasūtā jagataḥ prasūtī toyena jīvānvyasasarja bhūmyām //
GSP33bbdip11u:1200: 'jagataḥ prasūtī'; prasūtirjanayitrī mūlaprakṛtirlakṣmīḥ 'yato'; yasmāt prasūtā utpannā,
GSP33bbdip11u:1207: ityādyuktvā “tadevartaṃ tadu satyamāhustadeva brahma paramaṃ kavīnām“
GSP33bbdip11u:1214: ityanenaiva siddhe yajñāṅgatvādinā viśiṣṭānāṃ vrīhyoṣadhīnāṃ grahaṇāya punarvacanam / 'ataḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1233_0: ityapi kvacitpaṭhanti / atra sakārasya cakārādeśaḥ chāndasaḥ / ādyapakṣe 'pi vi ā
GSP33bbdip11u:1233_1: sasarjetyavayavavibhāgaḥ tatrāṅgo hrasvatvaṃ chāndasaṃ bahulagrahaṇāt / “indrā varuṇa
GSP33bbdip11u:1233_2: vāmaham“iti śrutau ṇakārātparasyākārasya yathā hrasvatvaṃ tadvaditi nārāyaṇapaṇḍitācāryoktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1233_4: kecittu liṭyaḍāgamaḥ chāndaso bahulagrahaṇāditi prameyadīpārthamāhuḥ / tadāryoktātpakṣāntaram /
GSP33bbdip11u:1236: “yaṃ puruṣaṃ samudre 'ntaḥ kavayo vayanti vāñchanti tadakṣare yasmin tasmin akṣare nāśavarjite parame prajāstadādhārāḥ tiṣṭhanti,
GSP33bbdip11u:1237_0: jagataḥ prasūtī jagajjanayitrī prakṛtiḥ yataḥ prasūtā prādurbhūtā satī toyena itaramiśritena
GSP33bbdip11u:1237_2: tadevābādhitarūpatvātsatyaṃ tadeva kavīnāmabhimataṃ paraṃ brahma“ityartha uktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1238_0: iti paṭhitvā “yamavayanti avagacchanti yasmiṃstasmin akṣare prajāḥ santi yataḥ prasūtā
GSP33bbdip11u:1238_1: parādhīnaviśeṣaṃ prāptā śrīḥ toyena karmaṇā jīvān bhūmyāṃ prakṛtyāṃ vyasasarja“ityanvayena
GSP33bbdip11u:1246: nanu 'tadeva'; iti vākye tacchabdena kuto viṣṇuniścayaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:1252: iti niśicīyata ityarthaḥ / hiśabdaḥ prasiddhau / atra 'tannaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1254: tanno viṣṇuḥ pracodayāt“iti samagravākyaṃ gṛhyate / dvitīyārthe caturthyau / tathā ca yasmāt vayaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ 'vidmahe';
GSP33bbdip11u:1267: ityādītaraśabdaśravaṇāt rudrāderapi mukhyabrahmatā prāptetyata āha - 'na ca';
GSP33bbdip11u:1272: nāmani viśvābhi na santi loke yadāvirāsīdanṛtasya sarvam /
GSP33bbdip11u:1274: kuta ityatastatprāpakaśabdānāṃ viṣṇāveva mukhyatvāditi hetūpaskārabhipretya tasyāsiddhiparihārāya viṣṇormukhyataḥ sarvanāmavācyatve śrutimāha - 'nāmāni';
GSP33bbdip11u:1276: iti kvacitpañcamyantapāṭhaḥ / prathamāntapāṭhe yato 'ta iti śeṣaḥ / asya 'na ca';
GSP33bbdip11u:1288: nāmāni sarvāṇi yamāviśanti taṃ vai viṣṇuṃ paramamudāharanti //
GSP33bbdip11u:1301: mukhyato na santi mukhyato na lokavācakāni 'yat'; yasmāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:1302: yataḥ puruṣāt 'anṛtasya'; viṣṇvanyasya jagato janmalayādikaṃ sarvaṃ 'āvirāsīt',
GSP33bbdip11u:1306: uttamaṃ vadantītyartha uktaḥ / etatpakṣe yacchabdasyāvṛttiḥ / dvitīyādipādatrayasya hetusamarpakatvam / pakṣadvaye 'pi viṣṇuśabdo bhinnakramaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1310: “yo devānāṃ nāmadhā eva eva taṃ sampraśnaṃ bhuvanā yantyanyā“
GSP33bbdip11u:1314: nanu yathā viṣṇoḥ śrutyantarasiddhasarvanāmatvenātroktaṃ brahmatvaṃ siddhyati tathā rudrādīnāmapi viṣṇvādiśabdavācyatvena atroktaṃ brahmatvaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha - 'yaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1318: viṣṇvādisarvaśabdavācyatvaṃ netyarthaḥ / sarvanāmatetyanantaraṃ - yata evamataḥ 'tanno viṣṇuḥ'; (mahānā.3-16)
GSP33bbdip11u:1319: ityādau nānyeṣāṃ prāptiḥ ata eva na brahmatvaṃ teṣāmiti vākyaśeṣaḥ / 'yo';
GSP33bbdip11u:1322: - viśvapāśabdavadayaṃ śabdaḥ - nāmadhārakaḥ na tvanye 'pi 'taṃ praśnaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1334: viśvakarmeti śrutibalādasya sūktākhyaprakaraṇasya viśvakarmādyanyaparatayā tadgatayacchabdasyāpi tatparatvaucityādityata āha - 'ajasya';
GSP33bbdip11u:1338: utsargato liṅgāt śruteḥ prābalye 'pi sāvakāśāyā viśvakarmaśruteḥ niravakāśaliṅgena bādhopapatteriti bhāvaḥ / śrutyarthastu - 'ajasya';
GSP33bbdip11u:1347: nābhyarpitaṃ padmādanyatkiṃ na syādityata āha - 'na ca';
GSP33bbdip11u:1348: iti / caḥ samuccaye / prasiddhaṃ viṣṇunābhisthatvena prasiddhaṃ padmākhyārthaṃ 'vinānyo 'rtho'; na yujyate,
GSP33bbdip11u:1349: prasiddhibādhādityarthaḥ / viśvakarmaśrutivatpadmanābhatvaliṅgamapyanyasya kiṃ na syādityato vādmaha - 'na ca';
GSP33bbdip11u:1354: ajasya nābhāviti yasya nābherabhūt śruteḥ puṣkaraṃ lokasāram /
GSP33bbdip11u:1356: na kevalaṃ prasiddhibalādevaitacchrutyuktaṃ padmaṃ padmanābhaśca harirityavasīyate,
GSP33bbdip11u:1359: iti / iti śruterityanvayaḥ / tathā ca 'ajasya nābhāviti śruteḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1365: tasmai namo vyastasamastaviśvavibhūtaye viṣṇave lokakartre // iti ca skānde /
GSP33bbdip11u:1368: viśvasya jagato vibhūtayaḥ sṛṣṭyādyaṣṭakaṃ jīvādau vyastāḥ vistṛtāḥ jaḍādau samastāḥ saṃkṣiptāḥ viśvavibhūtayo yenāsau vyastasamastaviśvavibhūtistasmai 'lokakartre';
GSP33bbdip11u:1370_0: ityarthaḥ / tattvapradīpe tu - samastaviśvavibhūtayo yena vyastā sa vyastasamastaviśvavibhūtiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1370_1: atha vā vyastāḥ samastā viśvavibhūtayo yeneti dvedhā vyākhyātam / tatra divitīyaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:1370_2: ṭīkāyāṃ vivṛtam / pūrvārdhe viṣṇuvācakaśabdābhāvāduttarārdhodāharaṇam / 'iti ca skānde';
GSP33bbdip11u:1374: padmanābhaśca harireveti vākyaśeṣaḥ / na kevalaṃ prasiddhibādhāditi cārthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1381: yadā niravakāśaliṅgamātraṃ śrutibādhakaṃ tadā kimu vācyaṃ samākhyāyuktaṃ taditi bhāvenāha - 'para';
GSP33bbdip11u:1384: ityādikamatrāpi sambadhyate / tathā ca yataḥ viśvakarmasūkte “paro divā para enā pṛthivyā paro devebhirasurairyadasti“iti yā ākhyā uktiḥ tasyāḥ samā samānā 'paro divā';
GSP33bbdip11u:1390: “yaṃ kāmaye taṃ tamugraṃ kṛṇomi taṃ brahmāṇaṃ tamṛṣiṃ taṃ sumedhām“
GSP33bbdip11u:1393: nanu samākhyāśrutāvapi viṣṇuḥ kuto vācya ityata āha - 'yaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1395: ityetatsamastamanenāpi yojyam / atra samākhyāśrutāvityekaṃ padam/ tathā ca yasmāt 'paro divā';
GSP33bbdip11u:1396: iti samākhyāśrutau metyākhyā mākhyā tayā sahitā samākhyā “prakṛtirvāva samāsamā“(mādhyandinaśrutiḥ)
GSP33bbdip11u:1397: iti śrutau samāsamatvokteḥ 'nāmaikadeśe'; iti nyāyena samābhidhāvā,
GSP33bbdip11u:1398: ahamiti prakṛtā lakṣmīḥ “yaṃ“ityādivākyena brahmādīnāṃ svādhīnatvamuktvā “mama yonirapsvantaḥ samudre” iti vākyena “paro divā“ityuktaṃ viṣṇuṃ svakāraṇatvena samudrasthatvena cāha,
GSP33bbdip11u:1399: tasmādviṣṇureva samākhyāśrutipratipādya ityarthaḥ/ uktvetyanena lakṣmīkāraṇaṃ brahmādyanyatamaṃ kiṃ na syāditi śaṅkā vāritā / śrutau 'divā';
GSP33bbdip11u:1410: tasmātsarvasmādapi paraḥ / sa viṣṇuḥ dyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ paraḥ / ahaṃ tu 'mahinā';
GSP33bbdip11u:1412: parimitā babhūva / ahametāvatī yathoktaprakārā mahimnā nāto 'dhiketi vā śrutyarthaḥ / ahamiti labdhapadena lakṣmīrucyate,
GSP33bbdip11u:1413: etatsūktapravartikāyāḥ āmbhṛṇyāḥ lakṣmīrūpatvāt / tathā ca - ahaṃ 'yaṃ yaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1417: ugraṃ kṛṇomi karomi / evaṃ tattatpadayogyaṃ yaṃ yaṃ 'brahmāṇaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1420: sumedhasaṃ vā kartuṃ kāmaye taṃ taṃ tathā karomītyarthaḥ / śiṣṭavākyārthaḥ “patyurasāmañjasyāt“(bra.sū. 2-2-37)
GSP33bbdip11u:1432: tiṣṭhati / tasyādhikyaṃ kampasvarārthaḥ / patināma na grāhyamiti bhāvena nārāyaṇa ityanuktvā tadarthabodhanāyaivamuktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1438: nanvatra samudrastho rudraḥ kiṃ na syāt 'tapyamānāya salile';
GSP33bbdip11u:1441: iti / bhavedityubhayatra śeṣaḥ / tathā ca atrogra ityukto rudra eva bhavet,
GSP33bbdip11u:1447_0: ugraśabdena rudraśabdārthasya krauryasya jñāpitatvāccetyarthaḥ / rudro raudra ugra
GSP33bbdip11u:1453: nanu prasiddhyādisadbhāve 'pi tatparityāgenānyasvīkāre kiṃ bādhakamityata āha - 'na ca';
GSP33bbdip11u:1454: iti/ arthasyetyetadvipariṇāmenātra sambadhyate / tathā ca co yato 'yamarthaḥ 'prasiddhaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1463: yato 'tra yadi rudro lakṣmyadhīnatayograpadenocyate tarhi “viśvādhiko rudraḥ“ityādiśrutivirodhaḥ syāt ato 'tra tatparityāgo yukta ityata āha - 'ukta';
GSP33bbdip11u:1464: iti / karaṇavyutpattyā nyāyaḥ pramāṇam / tathā ca - yato “nāmāni viśvā“(bhāllaveyaśrutiḥ)
GSP33bbdip11u:1470: viśvo vāyuḥ adhiko yasmādviśvādhika ityarthāśrayaṇena vā 'etameva';
GSP33bbdip11u:1472: tātparyataḥ prādhānyena bodhayanti ityavagamyate / ato na “viśvādhikaḥ“ityādiśrutivirodha iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1475: vede rāmāyaṇe caiva purāṇe bhārate tathā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1478: iti / viṣṇureva 'vede rāmāyaṇe ca purāṇe tathā bhārate'; /
GSP33bbdip11u:1481: ādāvante ca madhye ca viṣṇussarvatra gīyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:1483: kiṃ bahunā 'sarvatra'; sarvagrantheṣu 'gīyate'; pratipādyate / teṣvapi na bhāge,
GSP33bbdip11u:1487: sarvatra prativākyaṃ pratipadaṃ pratyakṣaraṃ ca mukhyataḥ pratipādyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1496: harivaṃśeṣūktanyāyena uktarītyā iti vānvayaḥ / nanu pramāṇavirodhābhāvo 'siddhaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1498: tatra rudrādīnāṃ sarvottamatvasya sarvakāraṇatvasya cokteḥ ityata āha - 'na ca';
GSP33bbdip11u:1505: kuta ityata teṣāṃ mohārthaṃ kṛtatvāditi hetvadhyāhāramabhipretya tasyāsiddhiṃ pramāṇodāharaṇena nirāha - 'eṣa';
GSP33bbdip11u:1506: iti / rudraṃ prati viṣṇuvākyametat / muhyate 'nena jana iti 'moho';
GSP33bbdip11u:1509: mohakaśāstramiti vyāsatīrthīyokteḥ / na ca asya 'na mohaśāstrasya vaktā viṣṇurāśaṅkyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1511: iti hi śrutiḥ'; iti tattvapradīpavirodhaḥ śaṅkyaḥ asatāmityabhiprāyāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:1513: iti nyāyadīpokteḥ ya eṣa iti yojanā / tathā ca ahaṃ 'mohaṃ sṛjāmi';
GSP33bbdip11u:1519: tvaṃ ca rudra mahābāho mohaśāstrāṇi kāraya /
GSP33bbdip11u:1527: dadhīcyādibhiśca kāraya/ he 'mahābhuja'; mahābhakṣaka mahākuṭileti vā he rudra /
GSP33bbdip11u:1535: vyadhikaraṇatvena vidyamānāni viṣṇuniṣṭhāni vāyuniṣṭhāni vā rudrādiniṣṭhatayocyamānāni sarvottamatvasarvasvātantryaviṣabhakṣaṇādīni 'darśayasva';
GSP33bbdip11u:1539: prakāśaṃ kuru cātmānamaprakāśaṃ ca māṃ kuru /
GSP33bbdip11u:1542: ityuddeśyadvitīyāntam / parasparasamuccaye caśabdau / tathā ca lokeṣu 'ātmānaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1548: aprasiddhiṃ ca kurvītyarthaḥ / kecittu - prakāśo 'syāstīti prakāśamiti arśaādyajantatvamāśritya uddeśyadvitīyānāśrayaṇena prakāśaṃ prasiddhamiti vyācakṣate /
GSP33bbdip11u:1555_0: iti pratijñāvākyenānvayaḥ / liṅgamūlānveṣaṇakathā tu - pūrvaṃ jagatkartṛtvaviṣaye
GSP33bbdip11u:1555_1: viṣṇuviriñcayorvivādo 'bhūt ahameva jagataḥ kartā na matto 'nyaḥ iti / etasminnantare
GSP33bbdip11u:1555_2: tayorgarvavināśāya tanmadhye kiñcana liṅgamudabhūt / tau tat dṛṣṭvā sarvadevasannidhau
GSP33bbdip11u:1555_3: parasparaṃ samayaṃ cakratuḥ / tatra brahmā viṣṇumāha - avayormadhye 'sya liṅgasya
GSP33bbdip11u:1555_4: yo 'ntamādiṃ ca gacchati sa bhavedadhiko loke,
GSP33bbdip11u:1556: lokakartā ca sa prabhuḥ / tasmāddhe viṣṇo tvaṃ liṅgasya mūlagaveṣaṇāyādhastādvraja,
GSP33bbdip11u:1557_0: ahamantagaveṣaṇāya ūrdhvaṃ gamiṣyāmi iti / evaṃ tau samayaṃ kṛtvā mārgamāṇau nirgatau /
GSP33bbdip11u:1557_1: tatra viṣṇurvarāharūpeṇādhastādgaveṣituṃ yayau / vāṇījānistu haṃsarūpeṇordhvaṃ yayo /
GSP33bbdip11u:1557_2: atha punarviṣṇuḥ svasthānaṃ samāgatya sarvadevasannidhau ahaṃ liṅgasyādimadrākṣamiti
GSP33bbdip11u:1557_3: satyam āha / brahmāpi samāgatya ahamantamadrākṣamiti chadmanā mṛṣā āha / atha liṅgarūpī
GSP33bbdip11u:1557_4: maheśvaraḥ tayorvacaḥ śrutvā he viṣṇo yatastvaṃ satyamevāvocaḥ ataḥ tava loke matsamā
GSP33bbdip11u:1557_5: pūjā bhaviṣyati / brahmaṇastu netyuvāca / tato brahmā he rudra mamānṛtoktikṛtāparādhastvayā
GSP33bbdip11u:1557_6: kṣantavya ityāha / tato rudro na mama vaco mithyā bhaviṣyati / tathāpi tvaṃ mithyoktikṛtadoṣaparihārārthaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:1557_7: gandhamādanagiriṃ vraja / tatra kratūn kuruṣva / tatastava śrautasmārtakarmasveva
GSP33bbdip11u:1557_8: pūjā bhaviṣyati / na tu devālayādiṣvityuktvāntaradhīyatetyādirūpā skāndapurāṇasthā /
GSP33bbdip11u:1558: teṣāṃ śivabrahmādipāramyaviṣayatvādityata āha - 'śaive ca'; iti / caśabdo 'pyarthassamuccaye,
GSP33bbdip11u:1566: tadaivācyuta yāntyeva yadaiva tvaṃ parāṅmukhaḥ // iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:1573: śvapacādapi śvānaṃ pacatīti śvapaco nīcaḥ tasmādapi 'kaṣṭatvaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1575_0: ityarthaḥ / asya tarkatvāttasya viparyayaparyavasāne brahmādīnāṃ viṣṇvadhīnatvam
GSP33bbdip11u:1575_1: atyantatadanugrahapātratvaṃ ca siddhyatīti na pramāṇavirodhaḥ / itiśabdasya 'iti
GSP33bbdip11u:1580: nāhaṃ na ca śivo 'nye ca tacchaktyekāṃśabhāginaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1589: ityatra śivaścānye ca ahaṃ ca vayaṃ tairityekaśeṣaḥ / tathā ca yadyapi vayaṃ 'tacchaktyekāṃśabhāginaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:1590: tasyācyutasya yā śaktiḥ sāmarthyaṃ tasyaikāṃśabhāgino na bhavāmaḥ tathāpi 'yadvat';
GSP33bbdip11u:1599: puruṣa iti vā / itiśabdasya iti brahmavaivarte ityanvayaḥ / 'skānde';
GSP33bbdip11u:1603: ityanenānvayaḥ / tathā ca teṣāṃ śaivāditve 'pi na virodhitvam,
GSP33bbdip11u:1604: tatrāpi viṣṇūttamatvāderapyuktyā svavirodhena śivādyutkarṣe 'prāmāṇyāt / na ca viparītaṃ kiṃ na syāditi vācyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:1606_0: tatraiva viṣṇūtkarṣoktau tatra prāmāṇyasya śivādyutkarṣādāvaprāmāṇyasya ca niścayena
GSP33bbdip11u:1606_2: teṣūpanyasyata iti na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:1609: na ca vaiṣṇaveṣu tathā / tacca “eṣa“mohaṃ ityuktam //
GSP33bbdip11u:1616: ata eva 'tathā'; śaivavat sarvottamatvādhamatvaviṣaye virodho netyarthaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:1617: yena svavirodhena svaviṣaye 'prāmāṇyaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ / tarhi vaiṣṇaveṣu rāmakṛṣṇādiviṣṇukartṛkaśivastutyādi kathamucyata ityata āha - 'tacca';
GSP33bbdip11u:1618: iti / castavarthaḥ / vacanādityanuvtate / tadityasyāvṛttiḥ / tathā ca - co yato vaiṣṇaveṣu yacchivastutyādyucyate tattu 'eṣa moham';
GSP33bbdip11u:1630: etadadhikaraṇapratipādyaṃ darśayati - 'brahmaṇaḥ'; iti / nirbādharūḍhibalāt jīva evedaṃ brahma,

GSP33bbdip11u:2243: smṛtikārairuktamityarthaḥ / gāruḍe ityanantaraṃ uktamiti śeṣaḥ / asyāpyavācyatvādikamityanenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2249_1: vyākhyāyāpavyākhyāṃ pratyākhyāti - na ceti / caśabdaḥ svasiddhamapi netisamuccaye /
GSP33bbdip11u:2251: aśabdaṃ hi tat / 'aśabdaṃ'; pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ neti vā, kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:2254: iti jagatkāraṇasyekṣaṇakartṛtvaśravaṇātpradhānasya cācetanatvena tadasambhavāditi sāṅkhyamatanirākaraṇaparatayā vyākhyāne prathamapratijñāyāṃ hetūkṛtam 'aśabdatvam'; aśrautatvam
GSP33bbdip11u:2260_0: yadvā - tattvapradīparītyā māyinā sāṅkhyaṃ prati hetutvenopanyastamaśabdatvaṃ māyītarasya
GSP33bbdip11u:2260_1: sāṅkhyasya na siddhaṃ nāpi sāṅkhyetaramāyisiddhamuktahetubhyāmeva / tathā cāsiddhiriti
GSP33bbdip11u:2260_2: na tadvyākhyānaṃ yuktamitibhāvaḥ / evamaśabdatvaṃ śrautatvaṃ brahmaṇassāṅkhyetaramāyisiddhaṃ na,
GSP33bbdip11u:2262: tasyekṣatisvarūpatvādityapi vyākhyeyam / tathā ca hetudvayamapi svapakṣapratikūlamiti na paravyākhyā yukteti bhāvaḥ tattvapradīpe tu 'naca';
GSP33bbdip11u:2264: māyisiddhamaśabdatvaṃ na śrutyarthaḥ uktanyāyena brahmaṇo vācyatvāt / evam 'aśabdatvam';
GSP33bbdip11u:2265_0: avācyatvaṃ brahmaṇa itarasya māyino 'pi na siddham / brahmaṇi vyavahārābhāvaprasaṅgāt
GSP33bbdip11u:2273: sattvādiguṇabaddho jīva evātastadanyathānupapattyā vācyo 'pi sa eva syānna nirguṇaḥ paramātmeti cet - na, kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:2278: na ca gauṇa ātmā dṛśyo vācyaśca na nirguṇa iti yuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2281: sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - na ceti / atra yato 'dṛśyaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:2283: jīvākhyo gauṇa eva atastadanyathānupapattyā vācyo 'pi sa eva syāt 'na nirguṇaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:2285: īkṣatiśruttyuktaḥ / gauṇagrahaṇe bādhakasyetarajñāpakasya cābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ / ato na sa vācyaḥ iti codyaṃ na yuktam / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:2286: 'ātmaśabdāt'; 'ātmanyeva'; iti vākye īkṣaṇīye tasmin ātmaśabdaśravaṇāddṛśyo nirguṇa eva,
GSP33bbdip11u:2287_0: ata evekṣatyā liṅgena vācyo 'pi sa eva bhavediti yojanā / yadyapi sudhāyāṃ gauṇapadaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2287_2: māyāśabalitaṃ vā guṇabaddhā jīvā vā dṛśyā vācyāśca,
GSP33bbdip11u:2297: nanvātmaśabdasadbhāve kuto 'yaṃ nirguṇo na gauṇa ityata āha - ya iti / yaḥ 'sarvataḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:2299_0: sattvādibhiḥ śūnyaḥ yaśca dukhakhādidoṣarahitaḥ yaśca heyopādeyarahitaḥ / bhāvapradhāno
GSP33bbdip11u:2301: apūrtyabhāvādupādeyamasya nāstīti vā tathoktaḥ / ya evaṃ bhūtassa ātmetyabhidhīyate / ya etadviruddhasvabhāvavān so 'nātmeti satāṃ mataṃ sammatamitythaḥ / kvacit 'hṛdi hyeṣa ātmā'
GSP33bbdip11u:2306: upacāraḥ paramamukhyavṛttyanyamukhyavṛttiḥ tatsahitastadvṛttika ityarthaḥ/ tuśabdo viśeṣārthaḥ / 'vāmane';
GSP33bbdip11u:2312: 'dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe ātmā caivānātmā ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:2313: tatra yaḥ sa ātmā sa nityaḥ śuddhaḥ kevalo nirguṇaśca /
GSP33bbdip11u:2314: atha ha yo 'nīdṛśaḥ so 'nātmā'; iti talavakārabrāhmaṇam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2317_0: parabrahmaṇaḥ rūpaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca rūpe / tatrādyo rūpaśabdaḥ svarūpaparaḥ dvitīyo rūpyate
GSP33bbdip11u:2317_1: jñāyate brahmākhyamiti vyutpattyā pratimāparaḥ / vāveti nipātasamudāyaḥ prasiddhidyotakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2325_0: sattvādiguṇābaddha ityarthaḥ / co viśeṣaṇasamuccaye / evaṃ prathamoddiṣṭātmaśabdārthaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2329: ityanantaraṃ yato nirguṇasya viṣṇorevātmatvaṃ vaktīti śeṣaḥ / asyāpi 'vāmane'; itivadanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2334: nanūpacāreṇāpyātmaśabdasya gauṇe prayogasadbhāvātsa eva śrutyukto dṛśya ātmā kiṃ na syādityata āha - na ceti / 'mukhye';
GSP33bbdip11u:2335_0: ātmapadamukhyārthe nirguṇe dṛśyatayekṣatiśrutipratipādye sambhavati sati amukhyārthagauṇagrahaṇaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2335_1: na yujyata ityarthaḥ / atra satītyanena mukhyasambhavākhyo heturuktaḥ / amukhyaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2335_2: na yujyata ityanena sādhyam / ubhayasamuccaye śaṅkāparihārasamuccaye vā caśabdaḥ // 6 //
GSP33bbdip11u:2340: nanu ātmaśabdo mukhyata eva gauṇātmaparaḥ kiṃ na syāt / na coktaśrutismṛtivirodhaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2341: tatrātmaśabdo nirguṇe viṣṇau mukhyo jīveṣvamukhya ityanukteḥ ātmanātmaśabdayoścetanācetanaviṣayatvasambhavāt / kiñca - ātmānātmaśabdayoḥ prasiddhacetanācetanaparatveśruterārjavaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2344_0: duḥkhādidoṣasyaupādhikatvena jīvasyāpi svabhāvato nirdeṣatayā śruteḥ svabhāvaviṣayatvopapatterityāśaṅkāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2344_1: parihartuṃ sūtraṃ paṭhati - oṃ tanniṣṭhasya iti // neti vartate / tathā ca - 'tanniṣṭhasya';
GSP33bbdip11u:2351: tanniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśe 'pi kuto 'yamātmā na gauṇa ityaprayojakatvamāśaṅkhyāha - na hīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2358: yasyānuvittaḥ pratibuddha ātmā asmin sandohe gahane praviṣṭaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2359: sa viśvakṛtsa hi sarvasya kartā tasya lokaḥ sa u loka eva
GSP33bbdip11u:2363: asiddhiśaṅkāṃ parihartuṃ ko 'sāvātmaniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśa ityatastaṃ darśayati - yasyeti / atra śrutiḥ svaprayuktamuśabdam eveti vyācaṣṭe / 'u';
GSP33bbdip11u:2364: ekaḥ pradhāna iti vā / tacchabdo viṣṇutajjñāniparaḥ / tathā ca - 'hi';
GSP33bbdip11u:2370: sanduhyate puruṣārtho aneneti vā kāryakāraṇasaṅkhātarūpatvādvā bhūtasamudāyarūpatvādvā sandohanāmake madhyadehe sthite 'gahane';
GSP33bbdip11u:2380: iti pāṭhe anekārthasaṅkaṭa ityarthaḥ / tattvapradīpe tu - sa viśvakṛt kṛtakṛtyaḥ / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:2381: yataḥ sa hi paramātmā prasannaḥ sarvaśaktiḥ sarvamasya jñāninaḥ kāryaṃ karotītyuktam / asmin pakṣe prathamaḥ prathamāntatacchabdo viṣṇujñāniparaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2383: sarvaśabdo jñānikāryaparaḥ / ṭīkākṛtpakṣe tu - prathamaḥ prakṛtaviṣṇuparaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2385: sarvaśabdo jagatpara iti bhedaḥ / pakṣadvaye 'pi dvitīyatṛtīyau viṣṇutallokapara/ 'iti';
GSP33bbdip11u:2388: / asya yata ityupadiśyate ato 'na gauṇa ātmā';
GSP33bbdip11u:2389: iti vakṣyamāṇapratijñayānvayaḥ / sūtrasya tu na gauṇa ātmaśabda iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ / ātmetyanena sautratacchabdo nātmaśabdaparaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2395: ātmaśabdo viṣṇāveva mukhyaḥ na jīveṣvityatra na kevalaṃ tanniṣṭhasyetyādinoktamanumānaṃ mānam,
GSP33bbdip11u:2396: kintu sūtrakṛdabhipretāḥ spaṣṭaśrutismṛtayaśceti bhāvena tāṃ tāścāha - ayamiti / brahmetyantasya upadiśyata iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ / 'ayamātmā';
GSP33bbdip11u:2404: cetanastu dvidhā prokto jīva ātmeti ca prabho /
GSP33bbdip11u:2412_1: advayaṃ samādhikaśūnyaṃ jñānasvarūpaṃ yattattvaṃ vadanti jñāninaḥ tat deśakālādiṣu
GSP33bbdip11u:2413: abhidhīyata ityarthaḥ / asyāpi pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ / tatraiva caturthaskandhe “dattam“ityanyadvākyam / etacca 'anasūyā tathaivātrerjajñe putrānakalmaṣān';
GSP33bbdip11u:2417: iti prakṛtena samuccayārthastathāśabdaḥ / tathā ca - anasūyākhyā atribhāryā atreḥ sakāśāt 'ātmeśabrahmasambhavān';
GSP33bbdip11u:2418: ātmā viṣṇurīśorudraḥ brahmā caturmukhaḥ ātmā ceśaśca brahmā ca te tathoktāḥ taissaha bhavantītyātmeśabrahmasambhavāḥ tān 'akalmaṣān';
GSP33bbdip11u:2419: apāpān yo dattaḥ durvāsāḥ somaścaitān putrān 'jajñe';
GSP33bbdip11u:2421_0: te ca ātmeśabrahmasambhavā iti vipariṇāmena vyākhyeyam / atra brahmāveśena sahotpanne
GSP33bbdip11u:2421_2: chatrinyāyenāmukhya iti draṣṭavyam / yadyapi “atreḥ patnyanasūyā trīn jajñe 'tiyaśasaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:2423: iti kasyacitsambodhanam / tatreti śeṣaḥ / ādyastuśabdo viśeṣārthaḥ / dvitīyo 'vadhāraṇe / tathā ca - 'jīvāḥ brahmādayaḥ proktāḥ ātmā tu';
GSP33bbdip11u:2428: paramamukhyavṛttyapekṣayā hīnavṛttiyukta iti jñānibhirabhidhīyata ityartaḥ / kutastasyaivātmatvaṃ nānyeṣāmityata āha - tasyeti / yataḥ 'tasya';
GSP33bbdip11u:2431: ityādau 'udāhṛtaḥ'; uktaḥ ato 'yamātmā nirguṇo viṣṇureva nānyaḥ / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:2433: anyeṣāṃ tadasambhavādityarthaḥ / ātmajñānānmokṣopadeśe 'pi kuto netareṣāmātmatvaṃ teṣāmapi mokṣadātṛtvasambhavādityata āha - saguṇā iti / turavadhāraṇe / tathāca - 'apare';
GSP33bbdip11u:2437: guṇabaddhātmavijñānāt guṇabandhanivṛttirūpamokṣāyāgāditi bhāvaḥ / nanu viṣṇāvapi nirguṇatvenāstu mokṣadātṛtvasambhāvanā,
GSP33bbdip11u:2438: tanniścayastu kuta ityata āha - paro hīti / 'hi';
GSP33bbdip11u:2453: yuktyantareṇātmaśabdādito na gauṇa ityāha sūtrakṛt - heyatveti / atra heyatvaṃ nāma mokṣārthaṃ prādhānyena jñeyatvenāvihitatvam / tathā ca - na kevalaṃ tanniṣṭhasya mokṣopadeśāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:2456: jīvasya ca “anyā vāco vimuñcatha“iti mumukṣubhirheyatvavacanācceti sūtravṛttimabhipretya sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - tamiti / he ṛṣayaḥ 'tam';
GSP33bbdip11u:2462: iti viśleṣo viṣṇoḥ sarvato vilakṣaṇatvapradarśanārthaḥ / vikaraṇavyatyayastu chāndasaḥ / amṛtasyetyekavacanaṃ samudāyavivakṣayā / tathā ca - 'amṛtasya';
GSP33bbdip11u:2468_0: ityanena caśabdasamucceyaṃ darśitam / sautranaño vyatyāsena anvayamabhipretya samucceyāntaramāha
GSP33bbdip11u:2468_1: - asya viṣṇoraheyatveti / caśabdaḥ samuccaye / sūtre gauṇasūtrādanuvṛttasya “na gauṇa
GSP33bbdip11u:2469: kintu nirguṇo viṣṇurevetyarthaḥ/ tathā ca - ātmaśabdādīkṣatiśrutyukto 'pi nirguṇa eveti siddham/ tasyekṣatyanyathānupapattyā vācyatvamiti bhāvaḥ // 8 //
GSP33bbdip11u:2477: sa devī bahudhā bhūtvā nirguṇaḥ puruṣottamaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2480: yuktyantareṇāpi nirguṇasya viṣṇorvācyatvamupapādayatsūtramupanyasyati - svāpyayāditi / sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe pūrṇamiti / 'ado';
GSP33bbdip11u:2487: udgacchati / tattvapradīparītyā amuṣmādidaṃ saṅkhyāmātreṇodacyate ekameva bahusaṅkhyaṃ bhavati viśeṣādeveti vā / pralaye mūlarūpaṃ 'pūrṇasya';
GSP33bbdip11u:2513: yoganidrāṃ karotītyarthaḥ / itītyasya iti śrutyuktatvāccetyadhyāhāreṇa 'vācyameva tat';
GSP33bbdip11u:2521_0: gauṇa eva kiṃ na syādityastatra sautraṃ hetuṃ sāvadhāraṇasvaśabdāvṛttyā yojayati
GSP33bbdip11u:2521_1: - svasyaiveti // evakāro bhinnakramaḥ / itiśabda āvṛtto 'trāpi yojyaḥ / vacanādityāvartate /
GSP33bbdip11u:2521_2: na gauṇa ityanuvartate / ayamiti śeṣaḥ / svāpyayapadaṃ pūrṇatvasyāpyupalakṣakam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2521_3: tathā ca pūrṇamiti śrutau svāpyayapadopalakṣitapūrṇatvasya vacanāt svasya svasminnevāpyayavacanācca,
GSP33bbdip11u:2522: sa iti spaṣṭaśrutāvapi ātmanyeva vilāpayīti svasya svasminnevāpyayavacanāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:2523_0: tasya ca nirguṇahariniṣṭhatāyāḥ smṛtau vacanācca ayaṃ nirguṇa eva na gauṇa iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:2523_1: vācyatve svāpyayasya sākṣāddhetutvābhāvāt sūtre bhāṣye ca caśabdābhāvaḥ / yadyapyatropalakṣaṇābhiprāyakaṭīkārītyā
GSP33bbdip11u:2524: śrutyuktatvāccetyadhyāhṛtahetau caśabdāvaśyaṃbhāvāt kathaṃ tadabhāva iti vācyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:2525: sūtraśrutahetau caśabdābhāva ityabhiprāyāt / ata eva ṭīkāyāṃ tatretyuktam / tathā cāyaṃ sūtrārthaḥ - na kevalaṃ nirguṇaviṣṇvākhyaṃ brahma īkṣaṇīyatvādvācyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:2526: kintvetacchrutyuktatvācca / śrutyuktaṃ nirguṇameva na gauṇamiti kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:2528_1: hetau sādhyasāmānādhikaraṇyopapādanāya ca śrutismṛtyorvacanādityuktaṃ bhāṣye / nanvayaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2530: yadyayaṃ svāpyayavān gauṇaḥ tarhyayaṃ nirguṇaścobhau pralaye 'nyatra layahīnau tiṣṭhataḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:2532: nādyaḥ “idaṃ vā agne naiva kiñca nāsīt“(tai.brā. 2-2-9-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:2534: atra pralaye dvitīyamātraniṣedhāt / dvitīye na tāvadgauṇasya nirguṇe layaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2535: tasya svāpyayavattayā avasthānābhyupagamāt / tathā ca nirguṇasya saguṇe layo vācyaḥ / sa ca na sambhavatītyāha - na hīti / 'gauṇātmani';
GSP33bbdip11u:2537: sattvādiguṇabandharūpadoṣahīnasya nirguṇasya viṣṇorlayo nopapadyata ityarthaḥ / hiśabdena “yatprayanti“(tai.u.3-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:2538_0: ityādiśrutivirodhāditi hetuḥ sūcitaḥ / tasmānnirguṇasya svasminneva layo vācya ityato
GSP33bbdip11u:2538_1: 'yamananyalīno nirguṇa eveti tasyaiva śrutyuktatvādvācyatvaṃ siddhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2539: na tu mukhyāsambhave gauṇāśrayaṇādityatreva nirguṇo 'yamityatreva vā mukhyārthaguṇahīnaviṣaya iti sūcanāya nirguṇasyeti vaktavyatve 'pi nirdeṣasyetyuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2544: sarve vedā yuktayaḥ supramāṇā brāhmaṃ jñānaṃ paramaṃ tvekameva /
GSP33bbdip11u:2545: prakāśayante na virodhaḥ kutaścidvedeṣu sarveṣu tathetihāse //
GSP33bbdip11u:2548_0: nanvastu nirguṇasya viṣṇorvācyatvopapattau satyāṃ kāraṇatvena śāstragamyatvam / taccopakramādibalāt
GSP33bbdip11u:2548_2: 'pi kāraṇatvena ucyatām / na ca tā na santi,
GSP33bbdip11u:2549: tāsāmānantyeneyattāniścayādityata āha - na ceti // co 'pyarthaḥ / tathā ca - 'kāsucit';
GSP33bbdip11u:2555: ityanena sūtre gauṇasūtrānnetyasyānuvṛttiḥ anyathetyadhyāhāraśca sūcitaḥ / 'tattu sam';
GSP33bbdip11u:2556_0: ityuktādanyathā netyarthaḥ / kuto netyatastatra hetutvena sūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe
GSP33bbdip11u:2556_2: yojanāmabhipretya asiddhiparihārāya tatsūtrasūcitāṃ śrutimāha - sarva iti / vedā
GSP33bbdip11u:2559: suṣṭhu pramāṇaṃ pramāṇānantaraṃ mūlabhūtaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥ 'yuktayaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:2569: kaścidapi viṣayakṛto vā prakārakṛto vā 'virodho na';
GSP33bbdip11u:2571_0: jñāpayantīti vā / śruteriti pañcamī tṛtīyārthe / gaterityasya vyākhyā jñānasyeti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2571_3: ucyate“iti tattvapradīpokteḥ kathyata iti śeṣaḥ / na tu viṣamatvamiti vā svayameva
GSP33bbdip11u:2571_4: sākṣānna tvanyamukheneti vā evaśabdārthaḥ / tathā ca - 'sarve vedā';
GSP33bbdip11u:2572_0: iti śrutyā svayameva sākṣādgateḥ sarvaśākhotpādyajñānasya sāmānyāt ekavidhatvokteḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:2572_1: na kāsucicchākhāsu anyathocyata iti sūtrārthaḥ / atra bhinnaviṣayaprakārakeṣvapi
GSP33bbdip11u:2572_2: jñāneṣu jñānatvena sāmyasattvātsāmyādityuktau viṣayaprakāraikyaṃ na siddhyatīti sāmānyāt
GSP33bbdip11u:2572_3: samānatvāt ekavidhatvāt ityuktaṃ sūtre / bhāṣyapadasyāpyayamevārtha eti dhyeyam // 10 //
GSP33bbdip11u:2579: iti na śabdaḥ śrūyate / na cāprasiddhaṃ kalpyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2582_0: itaśca nirguṇaṃ brahma vācyamityāha sūtrakṛt - śrutatvācceti / co hetusamuccaye /
GSP33bbdip11u:2582_1: tadaśabdaṃ neti vartate / tathā ca tadviṣṇvākhyaṃ nirguṇaṃ na kevalamīkṣatyādibhiḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:2583: svavācakanāmnā sākṣāduktatvāccetyartha ityāśayena sūtropāttaśrutiṃ paṭhati - eka iti / 'ekaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:2586: sarvaprāṇiṣu guptatayāvasthitaḥ / na kevalaṃ bhūteṣu sthitaḥ kintu 'sarvavyāpī';
GSP33bbdip11u:2587: ca deśataḥ kālato guṇataśca sarvaṃ vyāpnotītyarthaḥ / na kevalaṃ sarvabhūteṣu sthitimātraṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2589: sarvaprāṇināṃ antaḥsthitvā ā samyak tanniyantā ca mātā ceti vā / ādānādikartṛtvādvā tathoktaḥ / 'karmādhyakṣaḥ'; karmādhipatiḥ,

GSP33bbdip11u:2844_2: iti samāsaḥ kāryo na tadviparītaḥ pracura ānando 'smin sa pracurānanda iti / tathāpyāndamaya
GSP33bbdip11u:2844_4: itivat ānānandasyāpi prāptestadvāraṇāya pracurānanda iti viparītasamāsaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2846: tathāpi uktaprayojanābhiprāyeṇa pracurānandatvāditi sautravyāsavākyaviparītasamāsaḥ kṛta ityāhuḥ / tanna,
GSP33bbdip11u:2847_4: prācuryasya viśeṣaṇatāyāmanānandāprāpteḥ parairapi svīkṛtatvāt viśeṣyatāyāṃ tu tasya
GSP33bbdip11u:2847_6: vyākhyātavyatvāt tadabhiprāyeṇa pracurānandatvāditi vyākhyātaṃ bhāṣye ityuktaṃ candrikāyām /
GSP33bbdip11u:2854_1: annādivikārārthānnamayādiśabdaissaha paṭhitatvādityata āha - annādīnāṃ ceti // idaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2854_2: cāvartate / mayaṭchabda iti cānuvartate / tena samuccayārtha caśabdasyānvayaḥ / vācyavācakayorabhedavyapadeśaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2855: kintvannādīnāṃ sambandhimayaṭchabdo 'pi annādīnāṃ prācuryameva vaktītyarthaḥ / evaśabdo vikārārthatāvyāvṛttyarthaḥ / ādiśabdena prāṇādayo gṛhyante / pūrvam 'annamayatvādeśca'; iti,
GSP33bbdip11u:2861: ityasti / na kevalaṃ sahapāṭhavirodhābhāva iti cārthaḥ/ tathā cetthaṃ yojanā - 'tatprācuryam';
GSP33bbdip11u:2863_0: yatastatparamātmano yajyate / na cālpārthatvena māhātmyarūpatvābhāvātsa kathaṃ harau
GSP33bbdip11u:2863_1: yujyata iti vācyam / yato 'trānnaśabdena sudhoktarītyā bhāvapradhānena tattadbhūtādyatvabhūtāttṛtvarūpārthadvayameva yujyate,
GSP33bbdip11u:2864_0: ucyate na prasiddhānnam / ku etajjñāyate / “adyate 'tti ca bhūtāni / tasmādannaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2864_1: taducyata iti“vākyenānnaśabdasya vyākhyānāt / prasiddhānnasya bhūtāttṛtvāyogena tadgrahaṇāsambhavāditi /
GSP33bbdip11u:2866_0: saṃharati ca / tasmāttadviṣṇvākhyaṃ brahmānnamucyate vedeṣviti / evaṃ prāṇamanaśśabdayoḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:2875: ityanuvyākhyānānusāreṇādyatvamiti chedaḥ / tathā ca sudhoktarītyā gauṇyā vṛttyā upajīvyatvamevādyatvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2876: na tu carvyatvam / tacca brahmaṇyaviruddhamiti bhāvaḥ / tattvapradīpe tu - “na cānyānnaṃ sarvabhūtādyaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2877: na ca tatkasyāpi mukhyādyam / kintu tadgato viṣṇurevādanaphalabhūtatṛptituṣṭidātṛtvānmukhyādyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2881: iti ukteḥ“iti upajīvyatvasya mukhyārthataivoktā / na ca virodhaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2883: ityādāviva yathā kathañcidbrahmaparatvābhiprāyeṇa sudhāpravṛtteḥ / nanu kathamannamayaśabdaḥ tatprācuryārtho yujyate / “oṣadhībhyo 'nnam / annātpuruṣaḥ“(tai.u. 2-1-2.)
GSP33bbdip11u:2885: iti ya eva puruṣaḥ so 'nnarasamaya iti annavikārapuruṣaparāmarśādanuvādāt / anyathā tadvirodhaḥ syādityata āha - sa iti / 'avirodhaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:2886: ityākṛṣyate / tathāceti vākyena yasmādātmanaḥ ākāśādikamutpannaṃ sa eṣa puruṣa iti 'anyasya';
GSP33bbdip11u:2889: na parāmarśavirodhaḥ / kimarthamasau parāmṛśyate ityāśaṅkāpanodanāya parāmarśāditi vaktavye prārambhādityāha / pūrvamātmanaḥ ākāśādikāraṇatvamuktvā tasyaiva 'anyārtham';
GSP33bbdip11u:2892: iti śrutau vaiśabdo 'vadhāraṇe prasiddhau vā / annaśabdo bhāvapradhānaḥ/ rasatvamuttamatvaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2898: rūpasyānnamayaśarīrasya yataḥ sārabhūto viṣṇuḥ ato 'nnarasamayaḥ“iti annaśabdasyāvṛttyā rasaśabdasya kramavyatyāsena ca vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip11u:2903: nanvevaṃ mayaṭchabdasyobhayārthe prayogādatrāpyubhayapakṣe doṣadarśanātpañcānāṃ mayaṭāṃ prācuryamevārtho na vikāritvamityatra kiṃ niyāmakam?
GSP33bbdip11u:2905: ityādiśrutivirodhaḥ syāt ityata āha - ye 'nnaṃ brahmeti // atrādiśabdena 'ye prāṇaṃ brahmopāsate'; (tai.u. 2-3-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:2909: iti vākyajātaṃ gṛhyate / asti ānandarūpaṃ tadvacca / 'ityādi';
GSP33bbdip11u:2911: iti śeṣaḥ / brahmaśabdapadaṃ tacchravaṇopalakṣakam / evaṃ pradarśite hetudvaye 'dhyāhṛtahetudvārānvayayogye krameṇa sādhye āha - na vikāritvamiti / 'mayaṭāmartha iti niścīyate';
GSP33bbdip11u:2913: virodhābhāvaḥ / caśabdo 'pyarthaḥ / tathā cetthaṃ yojanā - 'ye 'nnaṃ brahma';
GSP33bbdip11u:2915_1: prācuryamevārthaḥ na vikāritvamiti niścīyate / ato na niyāmakākṣepo yuktaḥ / evamekasyaiva
GSP33bbdip11u:2924_0: atrānyaiḥ ānandamaya eva brahma / tadgatamayaṭa eva prācuryārthatā / annamayādayastu
GSP33bbdip11u:2924_1: kośāḥ / tadgatānāṃ mayaṭāṃ ca vikārārthatvamityuktam / tadayuktamityāha - na ceti //
GSP33bbdip11u:2925: arthadvaividhyakalpanā na yuktā / tataścānnamayādīnāṃ madhye ekasyaiva brahmatvakalpanā ca na yuktaiva,
GSP33bbdip11u:2926: prāyapāṭhavirodhena kliṣṭatvādityarthaḥ / yastu vādī annamayādīnāṃ pañcānāmapyabrahmatāṃ brūte,
GSP33bbdip11u:2927_0: sa tu sūtrakāreṇaiva pūrvapakṣīkṛta iti na tatpakṣaṃ pratyākṣipadbhāṣyakāraḥ / tattvapradīpe
GSP33bbdip11u:2927_1: tu - na ceti vākyaṃ na ca māyinā pṛthakkalpanā 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma'; (tai.u. 2-1-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:2929_0: ityatra brahmocyate / annamayādayaḥ pañcakośā mitho bhinnāḥ teṣāṃ brahmaśabdoktatve
GSP33bbdip11u:2929_1: 'pi abrahmatvam / antyapucchasyaiva brahmatvam / annamayādyatikramo mokṣaḥ / vakṣyamāṇānāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2932_0: ityādiko vākyaśeṣaḥ saguṇavākyaikavākyatāpannaḥ tatphalapratipādaka ityādikā yuktā /
GSP33bbdip11u:2932_2: iti vācyam / bhāṣyakāraḥ savistaraṃ viśiṣya na nirācakhyāviti ṭīkābhiprāyābhyupagamāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:2934: ityādau bhedasthala eva tathā prayogādityata āha - svarūpe ceti / caśabdo 'pyarthaḥ / itiśabdaḥ śabdapadārthaḥ / 'raviritivat';
GSP33bbdip11u:2937: ityasyāvṛttiḥ / tathā ca prakāśasvarūpe 'pi sūryabimbe viśeṣabalāt 'pracuraprakāśo raviritivat';
GSP33bbdip11u:2938: evaṃrūpavyavahāravat ānandādisvarūpe 'pi harau viśeṣeṇa tathā vyavahāro yujyata eveti na tadanupapattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:2943: yadeṣa ākāśa ānando na syāt'; (tai. 2-7.) iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:2946_0: hetvantararūpaṃ prācuryameva mayaḍartha ityatra ca hetuṃ pratipādayatsūtramupanyasyati
GSP33bbdip11u:2946_1: - taddhetviti // ānandamaya iti tattviti cānuvartate / tadityasyāvṛttiḥ / sa cāsau
GSP33bbdip11u:2946_2: hetuścetyapi vigrahaḥ / tathā ca na kevalaṃ brahmaśabdābhyāsāt / kintu 'taddhetuvyapadeśāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:2947_0: tasminnānandamayaprakaraṇe tasya viṣṇoḥ tasmin anandapūrṇatvenānandamayatve prācuryasyaiva
GSP33bbdip11u:2947_2: viṣṇureveti sūtravṛttimabhipretya tameva hetuvyapadeśaṃ darśayati - kohīti / 'yat';
GSP33bbdip11u:2949_0: āsamantātprakāśamāno viṣṇurānandaḥ pūrṇānando na syāt tadāsau lokaṃ na pravartayediti
GSP33bbdip11u:2949_1: śeṣaḥ / ānandodrekamantareṇa pravṛtto kāraṇāntarābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ / yadyasau na lokaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2950: ko vā janaḥ lokaṃ ceṣṭayet / 'kaśca prāṇyāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:2951_0: dharmādau ca kaḥ pravartayet / na ko 'pi / anyasyāsvātantryāditi taittirīyabhāṣyaṭīkārītyā
GSP33bbdip11u:2951_1: śrutyarthaḥ / sudhāyāṃ tu ṇyarthānandarbhāvena na ko 'pi lokikīṃ vaidikīṃ pravṛttiṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2958_0: yaduktaṃ brahmaśabdādānandamayādīnāṃ viṣṇutvamiti na tadyuktam / brahmaśabdasya aparabrahmaṇi
GSP33bbdip11u:2958_1: jīve 'pyupapatteḥ / tasya parabrahmaṇi mukhyatve 'pi viṣṇoḥ ānandamayāvayavatvoktyādinā
GSP33bbdip11u:2958_3: viṣṇutve yuktyantaraṃ vadan sūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - māntravarṇikamiti / yata ityādau yojyaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2959: 'na te'; iti pratijñānuvartate / tathā ca yataḥ 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma'; (tai.u. 2-1-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:2964_0: pratipādyate ato 'pyānandamayādayo nāpare / kintu parameva brahmeti yojanā / kuto
GSP33bbdip11u:2965: satyaṃ jñānamanantam ityevaṃrūpāṇām annamayādiśabdānāṃ ca arthānusandhānāt jātāt 'anusandhānāt'
GSP33bbdip11u:2966_1: parabrahmārthatājñaptirityata āha - brahmaviditi / pravṛtta iti śeṣaḥ / asya buddhyā
GSP33bbdip11u:2966_2: viviktena mantravarṇapadenānvayaḥ / tathā ca yato 'brahmavidāpnoti param'; (tai.u. 2-1-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:2967: iti / parabrahmatajjñānatatprāptīḥ sūcayitvā saṅkṣepeṇaktvā tatra prāptaśaṅkāpanodāya pravṛtto mantravarṇaḥ / tato 'tra lakṣitaṃ paraṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2969_0: ānandamayādistattviti cānuvartate / caśabdo yatha ityarthe yuktisayuccaye ca / tathā
GSP33bbdip11u:2969_1: ca na kevalaṃ brahmaśabdādevānandamayādiviṣṇvākhyaṃ parabrahmaiva nāparabrahmetyavasīyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:2970: iti vedavākyena lakṣaṇavattayā proktaṃ paraṃ brahamaivānnamayādiśabdaiḥ 'gīyate';
GSP33bbdip11u:2973_0: paramaṃ brahmāpnoti / parabrahmaprāptikāmaḥ parabrahma jānīyāt iti śruteḥ phalito
GSP33bbdip11u:2973_1: 'rthaḥ / kiṃ tadbrahmeti śaṅkāyāṃ satyamityādi pravṛttam / tatra satyaśabdenoktaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2973_4: iti satyādiśabdānāṃ annamayādiśabdānāṃ cakārthatvam anusandheyam / atra deśānantyaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2973_5: nāma anavadhikaparimāṇatvam / kālānantyaṃ nāma anavacchinnasattākatvam / vastvānantyaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:2984: brahmapucchamityukteḥ / avayavinaścāvayavatvavirodhādityata āha - na ceti / tasyetyātkṛṣyate / 'tasya';
GSP33bbdip11u:2985_0: viṣṇorānandamayatve tadavayavatvoktivirodho netyarthaḥ / avayavatve ca avayavitvasya
GSP33bbdip11u:2985_1: virodho 'pi neti caśabdārthaḥ / kuta ityato 'vayavina evāvayavatvasyāvayavitvasya
GSP33bbdip11u:2987: śiraḥ sa iti vā / evam uttaratrāpi vyākhyeyam / dvitīyāditacchabdāḥ smṛtyanusārātpradyumnādiparāḥ / 'pakṣo';
GSP33bbdip11u:2991_1: evaśabdenāvayavāvayavibhedo nivāritaḥ / evaṃ avayavasyāvayavitve na kevalamiyaṃ śrutiḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:2992: kintu - bhāṣye upalakṣaṇayā gṛhītā 'padaṃ pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā vai puruṣaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:2993: iti tattvapradīpodāhṛtaśrutirapi pramāṇatayā grāhyā / asmin pakṣe bhāṣyagatāvayavaśabdaḥ arśaādyajanto 'vayaviparaḥ //
GSP33bbdip11u:2996: śiro nārāyaṇaḥ pakṣo dakṣiṇassavya eva ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:2999: pucchaṃ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ proktaḥ eka eva tu pañcadhā //
GSP33bbdip11u:3005_0: avayavina avayavatvaṃ viruddhamityāśaṅkāṃ śrutyā parihṛtyātra smṛtiṃ cāha - śira
GSP33bbdip11u:3005_2: tathā nārāyaṇādipañcarūpāṇāṃ ekāvayavatvamucyate / ādyaścaḥ pakṣasamuccaye / rūpayoḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3005_3: parasparasamuccaye dvau / avayavibhūta eva nārāyaṇaḥ śira ityevaśabdānvayaḥ / evamavayavibhūtaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3005_4: pradyumno dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣo bāhuḥ / aniruddhaḥ savyaḥ / vāsudevaḥ 'sandoho';
GSP33bbdip11u:3006: madhyadeha ityanvayaḥ / apiveti nipātasamudāyaḥ pakṣāntare / pūrvasmin pakṣe nārāyaṇasya
GSP33bbdip11u:3007: śīrṣatvam / vāsudevasya madhyadehatvam / asmin pakṣe tu - tadaṃśe vaiparītyamityupāsanābhedena pakṣabhedoktiḥ/ saṅkarṣaṇastūbhayatra 'pucchaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3008: pādau prokta ityanvayaḥ / tuśabdena dvirūpatvaṃ suparṇarūpatvaviśeṣo vā jñāyate / tataḥ kimityata āha - eka iti / evaṃ 'puruṣottamaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3010: pañcadhā vibhaktaḥ eka evāyavaiḥ abhinna eva na tu bhinnaḥ / 'aṅgatvena';
GSP33bbdip11u:3012: avayavitvena prakāreṇa tadbhāvaṃ prāptaḥ krīḍata ityarthaḥ / itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇe tṛtīyā / nanvastavevaṃ tāvatā na virodhaparihāro jāta ityata āha - aiśvaryāditi / 'tasmin';
GSP33bbdip11u:3021_0: ekaikasyāvayavasya sarveśvaratvādityapi vyākhyeyam / evaṃ na virodha ityetat avayavāvayavinorabhede
GSP33bbdip11u:3021_1: 'yamavayavī ayam avayava iti bhedavyavahāravirodho 'pi netyapi vyākhyeyam / tatra
GSP33bbdip11u:3021_2: hetustu viśeṣabalācchaktivyaktibhāvāditi caśabdena sūcitaḥ / ata eva caśabdo 'nuktasamuccayārthaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3021_3: aiśvaryāccetyanveti / kiñca - kiṃ tarkānyapramāṇenāvayavino 'vayavatvamavayavasyāvayavitvaṃ ca viruddham?
GSP33bbdip11u:3022: uta avayavī nāvayavaḥ avayavitvāt / avayavo vā nāvayavī avayavatvāllokavaditi tarkapadoktānumānena?
GSP33bbdip11u:3023: nādyo 'siddhatvāt / na dvitīya ityāha - atarkya iti / 'hi';
GSP33bbdip11u:3027: sādhako bādhako vā netyarthaḥ / kiñca - loke parimitaśaktitva eva virodhadarśanāt viṣṇorvirodhopayogiparimitaśaktiśūnyatvāt tarkyatvāṅgīkāre 'pi na virodha
GSP33bbdip11u:3031: netyarthaḥ / tathā ca paroktatarkasya sopādhikatvenāpramāṇatvānna virodhitvamiti bhāvaḥ / anena 'atarkya';
GSP33bbdip11u:3032: ityasyāsattarkāgocara ityartha ityuktaṃ bhavati / iti bṛhatsaṃhitāyāmityasya 'tasyaivāvayavatvokteḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3039: nanu yaduktaṃ sa vā iti vākye 'sya paramātmana eva parāmarśaḥ na annātpuruṣaḥ ityuktadehasyeti tadayuktam;
GSP33bbdip11u:3040_1: kāraṇābhāvāt / kiñca - puruṣapadena prakṛtasyaiva puruṣapadenoktatvāt ātmanaśca tena
GSP33bbdip11u:3042: puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān //
