GSP33bbdip11u:3044: sa vā ityatra ca paramātmaivocyata iti vyavasthāṅgīkārāyogādityata āha - raseti // sa vā eṣaḥ iti vartate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3045: tadityāvartate / evamucyata iti ca / anyadvihāyeti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca sa vā iti vākyena cideva cinmātraṃ brahmacaitanyameva ucyate parāmṛśyate na dehaḥ / na ca tasya dūroktivirodhaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3047_1: brahmaiva sa vā iti parāmarśavākyenocyate / evaṃ tarhi puruṣapadena dvayorapi prakṛtatvādubhayaparāmarśo
GSP33bbdip11u:3047_2: 'yamastviti na ca vācyam / yataḥ tatsārabhūtaṃ puruṣasārabhūtaṃ cinmātraṃ brahmaivānyadehādikaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3047_3: vihāya saḥ iti parāmarśavākyenocyate / kuta ityata āha - raseti / rasaśabdaghaṭitānnarasamayaśabdena
GSP33bbdip11u:3047_5: mātrapadam / rasaśabdena rasaśabdārthena mukhyatvena viśeṣaṇāt viśeṣitatvāt annatvarūpaviśeṣaṇasyeti
GSP33bbdip11u:3047_7: iti sudhokteḥ / ṭīkāyāṃ caitanyamātraṃ brahmaivetyanvayaḥ / nanvanuvākāntare annamayaprāṇamayamanomayavijñānamayānandamayā
GSP33bbdip11u:3049: tattatsārabhūtaṃ tattatkośaniyāmakaṃ tadgataṃ brahmacaitanyameva ucyate / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:3051_0: ityādau raso vai saḥ ityante cānnamayādīnāṃ kośavyāvṛttyarthaṃ tadbhedārthameva rasaśabdena
GSP33bbdip11u:3051_1: viśeṣaṇāt viśeṣitatvādityarthaḥ / ādau viśeṣitatvaṃ ghaṭitatvam / tathā ca śabdāntaranyāyenānnamayādyapekṣayānnarasamayādīnāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3051_2: bheda iti bhāvaḥ / upalakṣaṇametat / vyavahitākāśādikāraṇātmaparāmarśinā tacchabdena
GSP33bbdip11u:3051_3: ca viśeṣaṇādityapi draṣṭavyam / nanu yadi paridṛśyamānadeha eva nānnamayaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3052: kintu brahmaiva tasyaiva ca saḥ ityādau parāmarśaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3054_0: iti pratyakṣanirdeśo nopapadyate / na ca vācyam upaniṣaddraṣṭā munirbrahmāparokṣīkṛtya
GSP33bbdip11u:3054_1: pratyakṣato nirdiśatīti / tathā sati tenāparokṣīkṛtaprāṇamayādāvapi tathā nirdeśaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3054_3: tadasyetyapi vyākhyeyam / tathā ca asya annamayabhagavacchiraḥpakṣādeḥ dṛśyamānapratyakṣasiddhadehaśiraḥpakṣādau
GSP33bbdip11u:3054_5: lakṣaṇayā brahmaśirasi idamiti nirdeśo yujyata iti yojanā / lakṣaṇābījaṃ śakyasambandhaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3054_6: darśayituṃ - dṛśyamāneti / tathā ca vastraprāvṛte varmāntargate vā jānunīdaṃ jānviti
GSP33bbdip11u:3054_7: vyavahāravadayamapi vyavahāro yujyata eveti na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3061: nanvannamayādīnāṃ pañcānāṃ brahmatānupapannā 'tasmādvā etasmādannarasamayāt / anyo 'ntara ātmā prāṇamayaḥ'; (tai.u. 2-2-2.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3062: iti parasparaṃ bhinnatvenoktatvāt / evamekasyaiva brahmaṇo bahurūpatvāt na 'ekameva';
GSP33bbdip11u:3063: iti śrutivirodhaḥ ityapyayuktamapramitatvādityata āha - ananya iti // apiryadyapītyadyarthe / tathāśabdaḥ samuccaye / tathā ca 'puruṣottamo bhagavānviṣṇuḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3065: abhinno 'pi anyo bhinna iti śabdena procyata / tathā yadyapyekastathāpi bahurūpavān bhavatītyarthaḥ / kathamityata ubhayaghaṭakamāha -
GSP33bbdip11u:3066_1: dharmāstadgatabhagavadrūpeṣūpacaryanta ityapi draṣṭavyam / ata eva tṛtīye 'sthānabhedādaiśvaryācca';
GSP33bbdip11u:3067_0: iti bhāṣye sthānabhedākhyaṃ hetvantaramabhihitam / taittirīyabhāṣye tu - bhedābhāve
GSP33bbdip11u:3074: nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyate'; (tai. ā. 3-12-7.) iti hyuktam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3076_0: nanu brahmaśabdasya sādhāraṇatvāt taddhetuvyapadeśasya viṣṇuniṣṭhatayā spaṣṭapratibhānāt
GSP33bbdip11u:3076_2: cābhāvādānandamayādayo viriñcādaya eva santviti śaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtramavatārayati
GSP33bbdip11u:3076_3: - na ceti // co 'vadhāraṇe / viriñcādaya ityanenānveti / tathā ca 'uktaprāptyā';
GSP33bbdip11u:3079_0: viṣṇureva tairucyate / na viriñcādirityarthaḥ / kuto neti hetvākāṅkṣāyāṃ sūtramupanyasya
GSP33bbdip11u:3080_0: viṣṇvanyaviriñcādijñānāt / yadyapyayaṃ netara ityuktasādhye na hetuḥ / tathāpi tasyānanyathāsiddhatvopapādakatvāddhetutvoktiḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3080_1: asya hetuvākyasya adhyāhṛtahetuvākyadvārā na ceti pratijñayānvayaḥ / anenānandamayādiḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3086: ayogāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / viṣṇujñānādeva mokṣo netarajñānādityetatkuta ityata āha - tamiti / 'hi';
GSP33bbdip11u:3088: iti śrutyā mokṣasya viṣṇujñānādanya upāyo nāstītyuktam / tasmādviṣṇoranyajñānānmokṣo nopapadyata ityarthaḥ / śrutyarthastu prāgevoktaḥ //
GSP33bbdip11u:3094: atha so 'bhayaṃ gato bhavati'; (tai. 2-7.) 'sa yaścāyaṃ puruṣe'; (tai. 2-8.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3097_0: hetvantareṇa brahmādīnāmānandamayatvaṃ parākurvatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe - bhedeti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3097_2: sūcanāt / tadvihāya sūtroktaṃ bhedavyapadeśaṃ darśayati - te ye śatamiti // ādiśabdaḥ 'ānandāḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3098: ityataḥ paro 'pi yojyaḥ / tatrādyena 'te ye śatam';
GSP33bbdip11u:3099: ityasya pūrvottarataittirīyavākyāni gṛhyante / dvitīyena 'yato vāco nivartante / aprāpya manasā saha / ānandaṃ brahmaṇo vidvān', (tai.u. 2-4-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3100: ityādi / yadvā sakṛcchruta eva sarvasaṅgrāhakaḥ/ anena nānandamaya itaro viriñcaḥ, kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:3103: ānandamayasya ca 'yato vācaḥ'; ityādināparimitānandatvokteḥ / evaṃ na rudraḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3108_1: sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / ete ca sarve vyapadeśāḥ taittirīyaśrutigatāḥ / tatra 'prajāpatiḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3114: ātmanaḥ ime ātmyāḥ jīvagīṇāḥ na vidyante ātmyāḥ yasmin so 'nātmyaḥ tasmin jīvaguṇavidhure / athavā - ātmanaḥ svāmino 'yamātmyaḥ svāmisambandhī sa netyanātmyaḥ tasmin,
GSP33bbdip11u:3138: nanvastvānandamayaḥ paraṃ brahma / tathāpi tena kathaṃ brahmādīnāṃ bhedaḥ sambhavati / tadbhedasya 'tattvamasi';
GSP33bbdip11u:3139_0: ityādi śrutiviruddhatvādityata āha - na ceti // bhedavyapadeśasyeti śeṣaḥ / caḥ samuccaye /
GSP33bbdip11u:3140_0: śrutyarthaḥ / dvatīyasyāstu ahaṃ brahmābhinno 'smīti / ādyam uddālakena śvetaketuṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3140_1: pratyupadiṣṭaṃ chandogavākyam / dvitīyaṃ bṛhadāraṇyake vāmadevoktam / atrobhayatrāpi
GSP33bbdip11u:3144_2: tvam / asanāt jagatsaṃharaṇādasiḥ / aheyatvāt haṃnāmakajīvabhinnatvādvā aham / pūrṇatvādbrahma /
GSP33bbdip11u:3145_0: tadbhinnaṃ pūrṇaṃ brahma asmītyucyata iti / jñānarūpatvāt nitarāṃ yantṛtvācca yaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3145_1: saraṇātsāratvācca saḥ / amuṣmin amuṣmin sthitatvātparokṣatvācca asāvasauśabdavācyaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3150: idaṃ hi viśvaṃ bhagavānivetaro yato jagatsthānanirodhasambhavaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3153: astu vā etacchrutīnāṃ aikyaparatvaṃ vākyānvayarītyā / tathāpi naikyaśrutivirodho bhedaśruteḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3154: bhagavataḥ sarvaikyaśruteḥ sarvasvāmitvanimittaikyaparatvādityāśayena tatra pramāṇatvena bhāgavatasmṛtiṃ paṭhati - idaṃ hīti // 'bhagavān';
GSP33bbdip11u:3159: ityādivacaneṣu / yathoktaṃ prathamatātparye - 'itaro 'pi bhagavānviśvamiva'; iti / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:3162_0: jagataḥ sthānaṃ sthitiḥ nirodho nāśaḥ sambhavaḥ utpattiḥ te yasmādbhavanti sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3162_1: yadvā - sthāpayati nirodhayati sambhāvyatyasmāditi tathoktaḥ / athavā - tiṣṭhatyasmāt
GSP33bbdip11u:3162_2: niruddhyate pralīyate 'smin sambhāvayatīti sa tathoktaḥ / tathā ca jagatsṛṣṭyādikartetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3162_3: evambhūtsya jagadbhedaḥ pramāṇasiddha iti jñāpanāya hiśabdaḥ / tattvapradīpe tu -
GSP33bbdip11u:3166_0: jagatsṛṣṭyādikamityuktam / atra ṭīkāyāṃ ca bhagavānidaṃ viśvamivetyanvayaḥ / svāmitvenaikyavyapadeśa
GSP33bbdip11u:3166_1: ityetadevāha - asarva iti / turaśrutiḥ / bhagavān sarvabhinno 'pi sarvasvāmitvāt
GSP33bbdip11u:3166_2: sarva ityabhedena vedādiṣūcyate ityarthaḥ / ityapīti śrutisthaḥ apiḥ samuccaye /
GSP33bbdip11u:3166_3: yata iti śeṣaḥ / asya ato 'pi na virodha ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3172_0: nanu bhedajñānasya mithyājñānatvātkathaṃ tadanusāreṇaikyaśrutayo yojyanta ityāśaṅkāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3172_1: bhāgavatavākyena pariharati - vidyeti // idaṃ ca kā vidyetyuddhavapraśnasyottaratvena
GSP33bbdip11u:3174: jīvādbhedajñānaṃ jīve vā yadīśvarādbhedajñānam / saiva vidyetyarthaḥ / na ca bhidāyā abodha iti vyākhyeyam,
GSP33bbdip11u:3175: ajñānasya vidyātvābhāvāt / nanu bhedajñānasya puruṣārthahetutvāt kathaṃ tasya vidyātvamityata āha - bhedeti / idaṃ ca bhāgavate tṛtīyaskandhagataṃ vākyam -
GSP33bbdip11u:3182: ityuttaravākyena ca saha yojanīyam / tatprakārastu - yaḥ 'sthiracarāṇāṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3187: abhito harermānena parameśvare bahumānena āgraheṇa ca 'niḥsaṅgena karmaṇāpi';
GSP33bbdip11u:3200: pūrvavat prajāyate sarvamuktādhipatirjāyate iti sudhāyāmuktaḥ / karmanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ tu - na kevalaṃ saguṇaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3203: tatparihārāya - puruṣarṣabhamiti / tadupapādanāya kartṛtvātsaguṇaṃ brahmeti viśeṣārtha uktaḥ / tattvapradīpe tu - abhimāneneti padaṃ abhito mānena viśeṣajñāneneti vyākhyāya,
GSP33bbdip11u:3211: guṇānāṃ sattvādīnāṃ vyatikare vaiṣamye jāte sati yathāpūrvaṃ jñānādiguṇatāratamyaṃ parasparabhedaṃ ca avihāya tadviśiṣṭa eva 'prajāyate';
GSP33bbdip11u:3212: prakarṣeṇa muktāvabhivyajyate / na tu tadabhinno bhavatīti vyākhyātam/ ayaṃ padacchedaṣṭīkākṛto 'pi sammataḥ / tatpakṣe 'guṇavyatikare kāle';
GSP33bbdip11u:3213: sṛṣṭikāle ityarthaḥ / ubhayatrāpi yathāpūrvamityasya saṃsāra ivetyartha / pūrvakalpe iveti vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3218: atraivārthe atharvaṇavākyaṃ pramāṇayati - juṣṭamiti // juṣṭaṃ sarvasevyam īśaṃ svatantram / ata eva anyaṃ jīvādbhinnaṃ viṣṇum iti tadetatsatyam (mu. 2-1-1-.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3219_0: ityādinā prāguktaprakāreṇa asya mahimānaṃ ca yadā paśyati / paśyo jīvaḥ tadā vītaśoko
GSP33bbdip11u:3219_1: mukto bhavatītyarthaḥ / tattvapradīpe tu - juṣṭaṃ devaiḥ asya jīvasya īśam anyaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3219_2: yadā paśyati mahimānaṃ mahimaguṇātmakaṃ tadā tadaiva vītaśoko bhavati na duḥkhaleśamapi
GSP33bbdip11u:3219_3: spṛśati jīvaḥ / na tu mahimaguṇavihīnam anyamanīśamasevitaṃ paśyan vītaśoko bhavatīti
GSP33bbdip11u:3220_0: ityatra ayamanyomārga ityukte prasiddhamārgādanyatvabodhavat anyamīśamityukte īśaśabditasya
GSP33bbdip11u:3221: nāpi īśatvamanyatve hetūkṛtam / tathāpi tat vyākhyānānantaramabhipretyeti na tadvirodhaḥ / ata eva dyubhvādinaye bhedavyapadeśāt (bra.sū. 1-3-5.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3225: 'asarvaḥ sarva ivātmaiva sannanātmeva pratyaṅparāṅivaika īyate bahudheyate'
GSP33bbdip11u:3228_1: tāḥ śrutismṛtibhyāṃ vyācaṣṭe - asarva iti / yadyapi asarvaḥ iti vākyam ātmaśabdasya
GSP33bbdip11u:3228_2: svāmitvārthatvamupetya svāmitvena nimittenaikyaśrutayaḥ pravṛttā ityatra pramāṇatayodāhṛtam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3228_5: pravṛttā ityubhayatrāpi asarvaḥ iti śrutiḥ pramāṇamityabhiprāyaḥ / na caivaṃ tattadantaryāmitvenāpi
GSP33bbdip11u:3229: atra padasamanyavābhiprāyapratīteriti vācyam / antaryāmitvenāpītyuktyā na kevalaṃ nāmāni iti śrutibalāttattacchabdapravṛttinimittatvena tattacchabdavācyatvaṃ viṣṇoḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3230_0: api tu antaryāmitvenāpītyetāvanmātrapratīteḥ atra padasamanvaye tātparyānavagamāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:3230_4: tadaiva padasamanvayaḥ / na tvekaikasya viṣṇuvācitva iti na virodhaḥ tathā cāntaryāmitvanimittena
GSP33bbdip11u:3230_5: tattvamasyādivākyagatatvamahamādipadānāṃ viṣṇuvācitve tvaṃ tvadantaryāmī tat brahma /
GSP33bbdip11u:3230_6: ahaṃ madantaryāmī brahmeti vākyānvayo draṣṭavyaḥ / na caivami asi asmi iti kriyāpadānvayāyogaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3230_9: yadyapi nimittakathanaprakaraṇe vidyātmani bhedadṛṣṭyā juṣṭaṃ yadā iti vākyatrayasyānvayābhāvaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3230_10: tathāpi svāmitvanimittenaikyavyapadeśa ityatra śrutismṛtyorupanyāne sati tatra prāptaśaṅkāparihārasyāvaśyakatvenāvasarasaṅgatyā
GSP33bbdip11u:3230_11: tadvākyatrayapravṛtteḥ / ityādeḥ ityasāyatrākarṣaṇena na virodhaḥ ityasyānukarṣaṇena
GSP33bbdip11u:3230_12: cānvayo draṣṭavyaḥ / śrutyarthastu - viṣṇuḥ asarvo 'pi sarvanātmako 'pi sarva iva
GSP33bbdip11u:3230_13: sarvātmaka iva sarvātmakatvena īyate / kuta ityatastatrāntaryāmitvaṃ hetutvenābhipretya
GSP33bbdip11u:3230_14: anantaryāmitvapratītyā tasyāsiddhimāśaṅkyāha - ātmaiveti / ātmaiva antaryāmyeva san
GSP33bbdip11u:3230_15: anātmeva anantaryāmitvena īyate jñāyate rāmakṛṣṇādirūpeṣu / tathā ca ajñānamūlā anantaryāmitvapratītiriti
GSP33bbdip11u:3230_16: bhāvaḥ / nanu viṣṇorantaryāmitve pratyaktvaṃ syāt taccānupapannaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3231_0: parāktvena pratīterityata āha - pratyaṅiti / bhagavān pratyaṅ dehāntargato 'pi parāṅiva
GSP33bbdip11u:3231_2: nanu viṣṇau viruddhānekadharmābhyupagame bhedāpattyā ekameva iti śrutivirodha ityata
GSP33bbdip11u:3231_3: āha - eka iti / eka eva bahudhā bahurūpeṇeyata ityarthaḥ / tathā caikasyaiva rūpabāhulyāt
GSP33bbdip11u:3231_4: sarvadharmopapattiriti bhāvaḥ / dvigrahaṇātsarvatra kriyāsambandhaḥ sūcitaḥ / tattvapradīpe
GSP33bbdip11u:3231_5: tu - pratyaṅ parāṅiva abhimukho 'pyanabhimukha iva eka eva bahudheyate jñāyate prāpyate
GSP33bbdip11u:3231_6: ca ityuktam / antaryāmitvanimittena sarvātmakatvena vyapadiśyamānaḥ kiṃ sarvajñaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:3233: ityata āha - sa puruṣa iti / anena puruṣa evedaṃ sarvam (tai.ā. 3-12.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3234: iti śrutimupādatte / sampūrṇaṣaḍguṇatvāt dehākhyapure śayanādvā puruṣasaṃjña ityarthaḥ / sthalāntaramāha - sa iti / anena sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma (chā. 3-14-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3235_0: iti śrutimupādatte / saḥ sarvātmakatvena vyapadiśyamāno bhagavān brahma sarvatra
GSP33bbdip11u:3235_2: kathaṃ ghaṭata ityata āha - sa īśvara iti / saḥ hariḥ yataḥ īśvaraḥ acintyaśaktyupetaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3239: eṣo 'haṃ tvamasau ceti na tu sarvasvarūpataḥ //
GSP33bbdip11u:3243: smṛtau kapratyayaḥ sarvadehagatasyāpi viṣṇorajñātatvamāha / yadvā - yāmo niyamanaṃ tatra bhava ityarthe ṭhak,
GSP33bbdip11u:3244: yato viṣṇuḥ sarvāntaryāmikaḥ sarvāntarniyāmakaḥ ata eva eṣa ātmeti hovāca (chā. 8-3-4.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3248_1: sarvamiti nāmnā cābhidhīyate / na tu sarvasvarūpatvādityarthaḥ / śreṣṭhavastvaikyārthatayāpi
GSP33bbdip11u:3248_2: aikyaśrutīḥ smṛtyā vyākhyāti - naitaditi / mokṣadharme hi vaiśampāyanaṃ prati he
GSP33bbdip11u:3248_3: brahman bhedavākyāt bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ pratipattavyāḥ / aikyavākyaṃ tu pradhānapuruṣaparamiti vā?
GSP33bbdip11u:3249: utāho aikyavākyāt eka eva puruṣaḥ, dvaitavākyaṃ tu vyāvahārikabhedaparamiti?
GSP33bbdip11u:3250: tathā - puruṣabāhulyamupetyaikyavākyasya śreṣṭhaparatvapakṣe 'pi ātmasu kiṃ sarve samāḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:3254: taṃ tathā ca bhavān vaktumarhatītyāśayena kṛtasya janamejayapraśnasya vaiśampāyanenoktamuttaram -
GSP33bbdip11u:3258_0: iti / asyārthaḥ - etanmataṃ necchanti vidvāṃsaḥ / etaditi kimityatastadvivṛṇoti -
GSP33bbdip11u:3258_1: puruṣamekamiti / tathā ca vedāḥ ekameva puruṣaṃ vadantītyetanmataṃ jñānino necchantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3258_2: yadvā - etasmin jagati ekaṃ puruṣaṃ necchanti,
GSP33bbdip11u:3259: kintu bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ santīti / tarhyadvaitaśrutivirodha iti na vācyam / yato bahūnāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ eka eva,
GSP33bbdip11u:3262_0: ityasyottaramāha - bahūnāmiti / he kurukulodvaha eteṣāṃ bahūnāṃ puruṣāṇām ātmānāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3262_1: madhye yā yoniḥ yaḥ kāraṇabhūtaḥ ekā śreṣṭhaḥ yathā ca śreṣṭha ucyate śrutyādau tathā
GSP33bbdip11u:3262_2: tena prakāreṇa taṃ viśvaṃ pūrṇaṃ guṇādhikaṃ puruṣam ākhyāsyāmi vyākhyāsyāmīti prameyadīpikāvyāsatīrthīyadiśā
GSP33bbdip11u:3262_4: yadekaṃ brahmatattvamasi tasmādatyavaro 'si atyavaro 'smīti śrutyartha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:3262_5: ityādeśca ityasya na ca tattvamasītyādivirodhaḥ ityanenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3269_1: śrutiṃ vinā prāptyabhāvāt / aprāptasya ca pratiṣedhāyogāt ityata āha - uktā ceti //
GSP33bbdip11u:3269_2: caḥ sādhyasamuccaye / co yato na ca tattvamasi ityādinā jīveśvaikyasya prāptiḥ śrutyarthāparijñānanimittā
GSP33bbdip11u:3269_4: 'pi bhedaśruteḥ brahmaiva san brahmāpyeti iti śrutivirodhastu bhaviṣyati / atra brahmaiveteyavakāreṇa
GSP33bbdip11u:3269_6: ityuktagaterasambhavādityata āha - brahmaiveti / apiḥ samuccaye / na kevalaṃ tattvamasītyādikamaviruddham /
GSP33bbdip11u:3269_7: kintu brahmaiva san iti bṛhadāraṇyavākyamapītyarthaḥ / kuta ityata āha - jīve eveti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3269_8: saptamīyaṃ viṣayārthe / tathā ca yato brahmaiva san iti vākye śruto 'yamādyo brahmaśabdaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3269_9: brahmāṇi jīvāḥ sarve 'pi iti śruterjīva eva,
GSP33bbdip11u:3271: yadvā - jīva iti prathamāntam / tathā ca iti vākye śrutādyabrahmaśabdokto jīva eva,
GSP33bbdip11u:3272: na parabrahmetyarthaḥ / tathā ca iti vākye śrutādyabrahmaśabdokto jīva eva,
GSP33bbdip11u:3273_0: na parabrahmetyarthaḥ / tathā ca saḥ muktajīvo brahmaiva san jīva eva san jīvabhāvamavihāyaiva
GSP33bbdip11u:3273_1: pralaye parabrahmāpnoti / apihitassan praviśatīti śrutyarthopapatteḥ noktabhedavyapadeśasyaitacchrutivarodha
GSP33bbdip11u:3275: prāpnoti paramaṃ brahma pralaye pralaye sadā / iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:3276: yadyapi muktāvabhede pareṇeyaṃ śrutirāśaṅkitā / tathaiva viṣṇutattvavinirṇayaṭīkokteḥ / tathā ca muktāviti vācyaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3277_0: na tu pralaya iti / tathāpi sarvajīvasādhāraṇyāya pralaya ityuktiḥ / nanu brahmaśabdasya
GSP33bbdip11u:3277_1: parabrahmaṇyeva mukhyatvānna jīve 'sau yujyata ityata āha - upapadyata iti / co 'pyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3277_2: tathā ca brahmaśabdo yadyapi parabrahmaṇi mukhyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3278_0: tathāpi virodhe svīyapūrvottaravākyavirodhe prāmāṇāntaravirodhe vā sati jīve 'pyupapadyata
GSP33bbdip11u:3278_1: ityarthaḥ / prakṛte ca brahmāpyeti ityuttarabhāvisvavākyena paramaṃ sāmyam iti pūrvavākyena
GSP33bbdip11u:3284_0: iti kaṭhaśrutivirodhaḥ / atra saṃsāre 'pi jīvasya muktatvoktyā tadanyathānupapattyā
GSP33bbdip11u:3284_1: parabrahmatvāvagamāt ityata āha - pramādeti // caśabdo 'pyarthe samuccaye ca / tathā
GSP33bbdip11u:3284_2: ca api - jīvasya parabrahmatvābhāve 'pi vimuktatvaṃ vimuktatvavacanaṃ ca yujyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3284_3: na kevalaṃ brahmaśabda upapadyate iti cārthaḥ / katham?
GSP33bbdip11u:3285_3: ato na tadvirodha iti bhāvaḥ / bandhasyājñānamūlatvaṃ ca -
GSP33bbdip11u:3290_1: he kṣatriyādya mṛtyuḥ saṃsāra tadabhāvarūpāmṛtatvaṃ cetyubhe api satye eva pravṛtte /
GSP33bbdip11u:3290_2: tayormadhye mṛtyuḥ mohaḥ ajñānādhīnastanmūlaḥ / tarhi mithyā syādityato netyāha -
GSP33bbdip11u:3290_3: pramādaṃ vā iti / ahaṃ mṛtyuṃ saṃsāraṃ pramādaṃ asvābhāvikaṃ bravīmi / amṛtatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3304_0: nanu bhedokteḥ śrutivirodhābhāve 'pi jīvo brahmābhinnaḥ cetanatvāt brahmavat / bhedo
GSP33bbdip11u:3304_1: mithyā bhedatvāt candrabhedavat / vimatāni śarīrāṇi madbhogāyatanāni śarītvāt maccharīravat /
GSP33bbdip11u:3304_2: ityanumānavirodhastu bhaviṣyatītyata āha - na ceti // co 'virodhasamuccaye / tathā
GSP33bbdip11u:3305: kintu tasyāḥ bhedokteḥ tenādvaitaparikalpitānumānena virodho 'pi netyarthaḥ / anena sautraścaśabdo vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3309: yathākāmaṃ hyanumātuṃ śakyate / ato na tattve pṛthaganumānamapekṣyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3318_0: yatheccham īśvaro na svatantraḥ cetanatvāt devadattavat / jaḍa ātmā vastutvādityādirūpeṇa
GSP33bbdip11u:3318_1: na tattve atattve 'pi anumātuṃ śakyate / ataḥ anena pratyakṣādiviruddhasyāpi pramāṇatve
GSP33bbdip11u:3318_2: cetanatvavastutvāderapi pramāṇatvaṃ syāt aviśeṣāditi vipakṣe bādhakatarka ukto bhavati / sūtre 'kāmāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:3319: ityekadeśotkīrtanena yathākāmāditi samagraśabdo lakṣyate jyotiśśabdena jyotiṣṭomaśabdavat ityāśayena yathākāmamityuktam / hītyanena pañcamī vyākhyātā / 'tattve';
GSP33bbdip11u:3326: ityaṃśo vyākhyātaḥ / smṛtyanusāreṇa sūtre bhāṣye ca tattvajñānāsādhanatvaprakaṭanāya parābhimatānumāne sādhanagocarecchāviṣayatvaniṣedhaḥ / tathā cāyaṃ sūtrārthaḥ - 'anumā';
GSP33bbdip11u:3329: na apekṣā yasyāṃ sā tathāktā tattvajñānakāraṇaṃ na bhavati / kuta etat?
GSP33bbdip11u:3330: yataḥ iyamanumā 'nānumā'; pratyakṣādiviruddhānumā / tadviruddhāpi sadanumā kiṃ na syāt?
GSP33bbdip11u:3333: asyāḥ / kāma icchā tadanusāripravṛttimattvāt / tathā ca pratyakṣādiviruddhāyā api prāmāṇye uktarītyā atattvaviṣaye pravṛttāyā anumāyā api prāmāṇyaṃ syāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:3334: aviśeṣāditi bhāvaḥ / yata evamato na dvaitaśruteranumānavirodho 'pīti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3341: atraiva smṛtisammatimāha - uktaṃ ceti // caḥ samuccaye / na kevalaṃ sūtrakṛtā,
GSP33bbdip11u:3342: skānde 'pyuktamiti / kimuktamityatastatpaṭhati - yatheti / padārthānativṛttyartho 'yaṃ yathāśabdaḥ / liṅgamārṣam / yadvā - nāyamavyayībhāvaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3343: kintvanatikrāntaḥ kāmo yayeti bahuvrīhisamāsaḥ / pravartata iti śeṣaḥ / apavṛttaṃ viruddhaṃ gaṃ gamanaṃ yasyāḥ sā apagā,
GSP33bbdip11u:3344: na apagā anapagā iti vigrahaḥ / tathā ca yasmāt 'anumā';
GSP33bbdip11u:3346: kāmamanatikramya pravartate / puruṣecchānusāreṇa pravṛttimatīti yāvat/ tasmāt 'śruteranapagā';
GSP33bbdip11u:3349: apakṣyate / na kevalamatīndriyārthatattvaniścayāyeti caśabdārthaḥ / kvacidanyathā cet yatra śrutyādyānukūlyaṃ tadavirodhaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3350: pūrvottarāvirodhāya tattvaniścayāya ca kāraṇatayeṣyate / nānyathā nānyā pṛthaganumā kvacidvākye 'pi / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:3351_0: yat sā anumā kevalānumā yathākāmā tasmāditi yojyam / yathākāmānumetyekaṃ padaṃ vā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3351_1: yathākāmā ca sānumeti vigrahaḥ / tathātve - yasmādeṣānapagā na tasmātsā noktaphalārthamapekṣyate / 'anyathā';
GSP33bbdip11u:3352: yuktiṃ vinā netyāvṛttyānvayaḥ / ata eva sudhāyāṃ 'yathāyogyākhilajñatā';
GSP33bbdip11u:3358: spaṣṭoktitvātprathamaṃ smṛtimupanyasyātraiva arthe śrutisammatiṃ cāha - naiṣeti / āpaneyetyatra ā apeti vicchedaḥ / viruddhārthayorupasargayoḥ krameṇa sambandhaḥ / tathā ca 'eṣā';
GSP33bbdip11u:3362: nirākāryā ca na bhavatītyarthaḥ / 'proktānyena sujñānāya preṣṭha';
GSP33bbdip11u:3363: iti vākyaśeṣaḥ / preṣṭheti naciketasaṃ prati yamasya sambuddhiḥ / 'anyena';
GSP33bbdip11u:3366: syādityarthaḥ / iti ceti caḥ samuccaye / tathā ca iti kaṭhaśrutau coktamiti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3369: asminn asya ca tadyogaṃ śāsti | BBs_1,1.19 |
GSP33bbdip11u:3375: nanvastvānandamayena brahmaṇā hiraṇyagarbhādijīvānāṃ bhedaḥ / tathāpi saḥ vyāvahārikaḥ saṃsāra evāsti,
GSP33bbdip11u:3376_1: pariharatsūtraṃ paṭhati - asminniti / atrāsyeti nānandamayaparāmarśaḥ / kintu netara
GSP33bbdip11u:3376_2: ityuktajīvasyetyāha - asyeti / asyānyasya ceti pratītinirāsāya caśabdaṃ vyākhyāti
GSP33bbdip11u:3376_3: yuktīti / astīti śeṣaḥ / kiṃ tadyogaśāsanamityata āha - so 'śnuta iti / kriyāviśeṣaṇametat /
GSP33bbdip11u:3376_4: luptavibhaktiko vā nirdeśaḥ / tathā ca 'ityādi śāsti';
GSP33bbdip11u:3377: ityādinā śāstīti vānvayaḥ / anena na kevalaṃ bhedavyapadeśādānandamayena jīvānāṃ bhedaḥ siddhaḥ / kiṃ nāma?
GSP33bbdip11u:3380: sambandhaṃ śrutiḥ śāsti ato 'pi / ato na tadaikyaṃ jīvānāṃ nāpi sāṃsārika eva bhedaḥ / na caitāvatā kathaṃ bhedasiddhiḥ / sambandhasya bhedasāpekṣatvāt / yadvā - yasmāt 'asmin';
GSP33bbdip11u:3384: pratipādayati phalatvena śrutiriti śeṣaḥ / tasmādānandamayo na jīvakośādiriti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3391: iti vākyaṃ tu prāgeva vyākhyātam / dehādutkrānto jīvaḥ 'etam';
GSP33bbdip11u:3408_1: kriyata iti śāstrādhyāyapādasaṅgatayaḥ siddhā ityāśayena pūrvādhikaraṇatadviṣayavākyasaṅgatī
GSP33bbdip11u:3409: iti vākye ānandamayasya kārtsnyenājñeyatvarūpamadṛśyatvamuktamityarthaḥ / tataḥ kimityata āha - tacceti / caśabda evārthe/ tathā ca yatpūrvoktamadṛśyatvaṃ tadeva 'antaḥpraviṣṭam';
GSP33bbdip11u:3410_0: iti vākye na vijānantītyanena kasyacidantasthasyocyate / devājñeyatvātkaimutyena
GSP33bbdip11u:3410_3: candramasyantarmanasā svecchayā carantaṃ sahaiva sthitam etaṃ devāstattvābhimāninaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3410_4: kārtsnyena na vijānantīti śrutyarthaḥ / pūrvapakṣe tviyamanyaparā / tatra sayuktikaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3410_5: pūrvapakṣamāha - sa ceti / caśabdo 'vadhāraṇe / anya ityāvartate / tathā ca so 'ntasstho viṣṇoḥ 'anyaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3412: 'indro rājā'; ityādivākyairyato 'nyo 'ntaḥsthatayā pratīyate ata iti yojanā / ādiśabdena
GSP33bbdip11u:3415: brahmendramagniṃ jagataḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ diva ātmānaṃ savitāraṃ bṛhaspatim /
GSP33bbdip11u:3417: ityādi varuṇatvaṣṭragnyādiprapakatattacchrutiliṅghaṭitataittirīyavākyāni gṛhyante / pūrvapakṣaphalamāha - tasmāditi / idaṃ cāvartate / prasajyata iti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca 'tasmāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:3420: indrādyanyatamaānandamayaḥ prasajyate na viṣṇuriti yojanā / rājā ya indro jagataḥ 'īśe';
GSP33bbdip11u:3421: īṣṭe jagadīśvaratvena vartata ityarthaḥ / yasmādīśe īṣṭe tasmājjagato rājeti vā / etaduttarasya 'saptahotā';
GSP33bbdip11u:3422: iti padasya sapta buddhīndriyāṇi viṣayeṣu jīvena juhotīti saptahotā / viṣayānandriyaiḥ jīvena vetyarthaḥ/ 'sapta yuñjanti';
GSP33bbdip11u:3426_0: sūryarathaṃ prati svātmānaṃ yuñjanti rathe yuktāni bhavantītyarthaḥ / saptacchando
GSP33bbdip11u:3427: iti tattvapradīpokteḥ / ata eva 'sapta yuñjanti .... eko aśvo vahati saptanāmā';
GSP33bbdip11u:3429_0: sadā dṛḍham arvaśabditebhyo vājibhyo dūrasthatvādanarvaṃ cakraṃ sūryarathasyāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3451: 'samudre antaḥ kavayo vicakṣate marīcīnāṃ padamicchanti vedhasaḥ'; (tai.ā. 3-11-11.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3455_0: kuto na mantavyamityatastatra hetutvena sūtramupanyasya vyācaṣṭe - antariti // sūtre
GSP33bbdip11u:3455_1: 'ntarityuddeśyabhāge apekṣitaṃ padamadhyāhṛtya darśayati - śrūyamāṇa iti / antassthatvena
GSP33bbdip11u:3456_1: hetvaṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - antariti / ityādīti / tasya dharmāstaddharmāḥ teṣāmupadeśo vacanaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3462: uktatvāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / upadeśādityantasya sūtrasya tasmādanya eveti na mantavyamityanenānvayaḥ / 'brahmā';
GSP33bbdip11u:3467: jñānakarmākhyadaśendriyeṣu viṣayahotāraṃ tattadviṣayasthāpakaṃ daśendriyāṇi jīvena viṣayeṣu juhvataṃ vā viṣṇum 'anvavindat';
GSP33bbdip11u:3472: iti chāndogyabhāṣyokteḥ / pramitaruktvanimittāt marīcipadoktānāṃ jīvānāṃ padam āśrayaṃ viṣṇum icchanti prārthayanti / tattvapradīparītyā 'kavayaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3475: jñānāya marīcīnāṃ padaṃ viṣṇum icchantītyekānvayo vā / kavayaḥ 'aṇḍakośaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3478: vīryaṃ tadupādānakamāhuriti śrutyarthaḥ / viriñcivākyasyāsya 'prāṇa ulbaṃ tena kḷpto amṛtenāhamasmi';
GSP33bbdip11u:3483: kḷpto 'smītyarthastattvapradīpe 'bhihitaḥ / kṣīrasamudrasthatvasya viṣṇuliṅgatvaṃ kuta ityata āha - sa hīti / 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3492: āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai narasūnavaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3493: ayanaṃ tasya tāḥ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ / iti vyāsasmṛteḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3496: tathāpi pralayārṇavasthatvasya brahmāṇḍavīryatvasya ca kuto viṣṇudharmatvamityatastayorviṣṇudharmatve pramāṇaṃ vaktuṃ pratijānīte - tasyeti / 'aṇḍakośo';
GSP33bbdip11u:3498_0: viṣṇorvīryamityarthaḥ / caśabdātsaḥ pralayasamudraśāyīti pratijñā sūcyate / tasyaivetyavadhāraṇe
GSP33bbdip11u:3498_1: vā caśabdaḥ / tathātve pratijñāntaramupalakṣaṇīyam / ata eva pralayābdhiśāyitve 'āpo nārāḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3499: iti paścātpramāṇopanyāsaḥ śrutāvaṇḍakośaśabdaśravaṇe 'pi pratyayasya svārthikatvāttattyāgenāṇḍakośa ityevānūditam / śrutāvapi tathaiva chedo vā / 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3512: svatantrāt hareḥ sākṣājjajñe ityarthaḥ / yataḥ āpo 'narasūnavaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3514: iti bhāgavatatātparyokteḥ / ato nārāḥ proktāḥ yena kāraṇena 'pūrvaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3516: āpaḥ tasya viṣṇoḥ ayanaṃ 'tena saḥ nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3521: aṇḍaṃ praviṣṭo yo viṣṇuḥ so 'ṇḍaṃ bhittvā prakāśitaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3523: iti bhāgavatatātparye cāṇḍasṛṣṭyanantaram apsṛṣṭirucyate / tathāpi sā bahiḥsṛṣṭeranyāntareti na virodhaḥ / itītyasya 'tasya ca vīryamaṇḍakośaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3524: sa hi pralayasamudraśāyī yataḥ'; iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3530: itaśca brahmāṇḍajanakavīryatvaṃ pralayasthatvaṃ ca tasyaiva jñāyata ityāha - ahamiti / 'tripuruṣaṃ māyābījamajāyata';
GSP33bbdip11u:3531: iti vākyaśeṣaḥ / taditi vyāptivacano 'sarvanāmaśabdaḥ / athavā sarvanāmaśabdaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3532: ata eva ṭīkāyāṃ tadaheyamiti vyutkramaḥ kṛtaḥ / tathā ca tatprasiddhaṃ vyāptaṃ vā 'aham';
GSP33bbdip11u:3533: aheyaṃ ratiḥ śaṃ ca mitamasyeti raśmirjīvaḥ tamindayati prerayatīti raśmīt jīvaprerakaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3534_0: inda preraṇe iti dhātoḥ ayaṃ dakārāntaḥ śabdaḥ / anukṛtyadhikaraṇe tu - indhī dīptāviti
GSP33bbdip11u:3534_1: dhātuvyākhyānāt raśmīt bhagavadapekṣayā raśmirūpāṇām alpānāṃ sūryāditejasāṃ prakāśakamiti vyākhyātam,
GSP33bbdip11u:3537: pūrṇaṣaḍguṇaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tadākhyaṃ brahma teja iti vā / 'agrataḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3542: jātamityasyobhayatra yathāyogyaṃ sambandhaḥ / janiśca yathā yogyā grāhyā / paścāt 'aṇḍaṃ ca';
GSP33bbdip11u:3545: prakṛtyupādānakam ajāyateti tattvapradīpadiśā śrutyarthaḥ / caturvedaśikhāyām ityasya vacanādityadhyāhāreṇa tasyetyanenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3556_0: tarhi tenāntassthena viṣṇunā indrādīnāmabhedo 'tra vivakṣito 'stu / indrādiprāpakakaśrutyāderapi
GSP33bbdip11u:3556_2: evaṃ ca pūrvottarapakṣadvaye anyonyaṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvaśūnye sati tadanyathānupapattyā
GSP33bbdip11u:3556_3: antaḥsthena viṣṇunendrādīnāmabhedaḥ prāpta ityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtraṃ paṭhitvā vyācaṣṭe
GSP33bbdip11u:3560: iti cetaraḥ / ādiśabdena 'amṛtaṃ devānāmāyuḥ prajānāmindraṃ rājānaṃ savitāram';
GSP33bbdip11u:3561: ityādikaṃ gṛhyate / vyapadeśādityasyānya iti sautrapratijñayānvayaḥ / anena sūtre vidheyasamuccayārthakacaśabdasya bhinnakrameṇa anvayena na kevalamantaśśrūyamāṇo viṣṇuḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3563: tasyendrādyantaryāmitvadantassthatvakathanena tebhyo bhedokteriti sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / atra śrutāvindraśabdo 'nyaparaḥ;
GSP33bbdip11u:3565: ityādau tu indrādiśabdāḥ paramamukhyavṛttyā viṣṇuparā eva,
GSP33bbdip11u:3566: bādhakābhāvāt / tathā ca mano vihāya pañcasu jñānendriyeṣu śabdādiviṣayahotā tairviṣayānubhāvakaḥ / indrasyātmā antaryāmī ādānādikartā vā / sarvahṛdayeṣu 'nihitaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3571: caturmukhaḥ devānāṃ hṛdyayanāt sthiteḥ pravartanādvā hṛdayaṃ viṣṇum 'anvavindat';
GSP33bbdip11u:3577: 'ko hyevānyātkaḥ prāṇyāt / yadeṣa ākāśa ānando na syāt'
GSP33bbdip11u:3578: (tai. 2-7.) iti ākāśasyānandamayatve heturuktaḥ na tu viṣṇoḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3580_1: kriyate / phalakathanena pūrvapakṣaḥ sūcito bhavatītyāśayena pūrvapakṣaphalamāha
GSP33bbdip11u:3582: lokaceṣṭakatvarūpaḥ / tuśabdārthaivakāravyāvartyamāha - neti / anena viṣṇubhinnabhūtākāśasyaiva chandogaśrutyuktākāśaśabdavācyatvamiti pūrvapakṣe 'ko hi';
GSP33bbdip11u:3583: iti taittirīyaśrutyukto 'pi sa eveti taduktahetunā tasyaivānandamayatvaṃ sidhyati,
GSP33bbdip11u:3584: na viṣṇoriti phalamuktaṃ bhavati / pūrvasaṅgatistvadhikāśaṅkāṃ kṛtvātra pūrvanyāya evātidiśyata ityātideśikī draṣṭavyā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3590: ityatra bhūtākāśasya prāptiḥ / na cāsau yujyate, kintu, viṣṇureva /
GSP33bbdip11u:3594: siddhāntayati - itīti // kuto na mantavyamityāśaṅkāyāṃ tatra hetutayā sūtramupādatte / yata iti / idaṃ cāvartate / tatrādyasya 'yataścodeti';
GSP33bbdip11u:3595: itivat kuta ityarthaḥ / 'yacchabdastu parāmarśe praśnārthe 'pi bhaṇyate';
GSP33bbdip11u:3596_0: iti bhāgavatatātparyokteḥ / dvitīyastu na mantavyamiti pratijñāyāṃ sūtrārthasya hetutvadyotakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3597: vākye pratipādyatvasyeti śeṣaḥ / co 'pyarthaḥ / yadyapi tathāpītyarthe / 'asau';
GSP33bbdip11u:3599: ityasyārtho viṣṇureveti / ityādīti / luptavibhaktiko nirdeśaḥ ādiśabdāt 'sarvāṇi bhūtāni';
GSP33bbdip11u:3600: ityādijagatkāraṇatvapratipādakaṃ vākyaṃ gṛhyate / yathoktaṃ tattvapradīpe - “sarvāṇi bhūtāni';
GSP33bbdip11u:3601: ityādinā udīryamāṇaṃ jagadutpādakatvādikamādiśabdādupādadīta“iti / liṅgapadaṃ śrutyupalakṣakam / tathā cetthaṃ yojanā-yadyapi 'asya lokasya';
GSP33bbdip11u:3602: iti chandogavākye bhūtākāśasya śrutyādibalādasti pratipādyatvasya prāptiḥ / tathāpi nāsāvatra vākye ākāśapadena vācyo yujyate,
GSP33bbdip11u:3606: tasya viṣṇorliṅgamasādhāraṇadharmaḥ parovarīyastavādiḥ / tasya tasminnākāśe śravaṇāduktatvāt / yata evaṃ talliṅgāt asau
GSP33bbdip11u:3609: iti taittirīyavākye 'pyasāveva pratipādyata iti tasyaivānandamayatve heturukto na tu bhūtasya/ ato bhūtākāśasyānandamayatve heturuktaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3610: na tu viṣṇoriti na mantavyamiti / anena sūtrayojanā darśitā/ asyetyāderayamarthaḥ - 'asya'; pratyakṣasiddhasya
GSP33bbdip11u:3612_0: āśraya iti śilakena pṛṣṭaḥ pravāhaṇo rājā ādīptatvādākāśanāmako viṣṇuriti pratyuvāca /
GSP33bbdip11u:3612_1: kathamityākāṅkṣāyāṃ tadupapādanāya tasyākāśasya mahimānamāha - 'sarvāṇi havā imāni
GSP33bbdip11u:3612_2: bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyante ākāśaṃ pratyastaṃ yanti ākāśo hyevaibhyo jyāyānākāśaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3612_3: parāyaṇaṃ sa eṣa paro varīyānudgīthaḥ sa eṣo 'nantaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3613: iti / atra vaiśabdasya prasiddhidyotakasya sannihitasarvabhūtānvaye vā,
GSP33bbdip11u:3615_0: ityabhidhānādavadhāraṇārthatvaṃ vā draṣṭavyam / bhūtaśabdo bhūtākāśa evātrocyate
GSP33bbdip11u:3615_1: iti pūrvapakṣe ākāśavyatiriktabhūtaparaḥ / siddhānte tu sarvabhūtaparaḥ / brahmādisarvajagatparo
GSP33bbdip11u:3616: pramitāni ākāśādibhūtāni brahmādijagadvā ākāśādeva samutpadyante / 'havai'; prasiddhaṃ hi /
GSP33bbdip11u:3617: ākāśaṃ 'pratyastam'; adarśanaṃ 'yanti'; tatraiva pralaye muktau ca līnāḥ bhavanti / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:3618: 'hi'; yasmādākāśa eva 'ebhyo'; brahmādibhyo 'jyāyān'; adhikottamaḥ / kuta etat?
GSP33bbdip11u:3620: uttamāśrayaḥ naitasmāduttamaṃ vastvāśaṅkyamiti bhāvenāha - sa iti / 'sa eṣaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3622: parasmāduttamaṃ proktaṃ paro iti tataḥ param /
GSP33bbdip11u:3624_0: iti sāmasaṃhitāvacanānusāreṇādau para iti śabdāntarasya madhye varaśabdāntarasya
GSP33bbdip11u:3624_1: ca āvāpena vṛttivākye subādeśasya sorulopena rutvotvaguṇeṣu samāne pare optaśabdadvayasya
GSP33bbdip11u:3625: uccatvena gīta ukto vedena / takārasya thakāro vyatyayāt / 'sa eṣaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3627: deśakālaguṇairaparicchanna iti / chāndogyabhāṣye tu 'uccatvādgīthatvātsarvasthānasthatvādudgītho bhagavān'; iti vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3630: 'viṣṇornu kaṃ vīryāṇi pravocaṃ yaḥ pārthivān vimame rajāṃsi'; (ṛ. 1-154-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3635: ityuktānantatvasyāparimitatvasya viṣṇuniṣṭhatvaṃ kuto jñāyata ityata āha-viṣṇoriti/ viṣṇorvīryāṇi 'kaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3641: ityuktasarvottamatvasya viṣṇudharmatvaṃ kuta ityata āha - para iti / atra 'na te mahitvamanvaśnuvanti';
GSP33bbdip11u:3642: iti uttaravākyāduktārtho jñāyate / ata evādiśabda ubhayānvayī / tatrādyo 'viṣṇornu vīryagaṇanāṃ katamo 'rhatīha yaḥ parthivānyapi kavirvimame rajāṃsi';
GSP33bbdip11u:3643_0: iti smṛtigrāhī / vyākhyāteyaṃ śrutirjanmanaye / ityādinā vākyeneti śeṣaḥ / yadyapi
GSP33bbdip11u:3643_1: śrutyanusārātsarvottamatve prathamaṃ pramāṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ na tu anantatve / ata eva
GSP33bbdip11u:3643_2: ṭīkāyāmādau sarvottamatvaṃ gṛhītam / tathāpi anantatvasya sāvakāśatvaśaṅkāviṣayatvātprathamaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3643_3: tatra pramāṇopanyāsaḥ / ata eva tatraivottaratra smṛtyā sāvakāśatvaśaṅkāparihāraḥ / 'tasya';
GSP33bbdip11u:3646: dharma ityavagatam/ ato na hetuviśeṣaṇāsiddhiriti vākyaśeṣaḥ / evakārapāṭhe nānaikāntyamiti śeṣaḥ / uttaratrānvayo vā/ yadyapi 'anantaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3656: ataḥ sāvakāśatvātkathaṃ viṣṇoreva talliṅgamityataḥ smṛtimāha - ananta iti / ānandeti luptavibhaktiko nirdeśaḥ/ viṣṇurevaiko mukhyatayā procyata iti sambandhaḥ / 'pareṣāṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3658: svasvasamīpagataparamātmasambandhādeva vācyateti śeṣaḥ / iti brāhma ityasya tasyaiva talliṅgamityuktamiti pūrveṇānvayaḥ / anenaivakāro liṅgasya niravakāśatvajñāpaka iti sūcitam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3663: nanu śrutyā pūrvapakṣite kathaṃ liṅgena nirṇayaḥ / liṅgasya śrutito durbalatvādityataḥ ākāśaśrutirviṣṇau sāvakāśeti śrutyā darśayati - nāmānīti / 'co';
GSP33bbdip11u:3666: ato liṅgena śruterbādhayā nirṇayo yukta iti yojanā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3673_1: samanvayaḥ kriyate / sarvatrādau sūtraṃ pāṭhyam / paścātsaṅgatyādikaṃ vaktavyamiti
GSP33bbdip11u:3676: tadvai tvaṃ prāṇo abhavaḥ mahān bhogaḥ prajāpateḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3677: bhujaḥ kariṣyamāṇaḥ yaddevān prāṇayo nava (tai. ā. 3-14.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3680: viṣayavākyodāharṇapūrvakaṃ pūrvādhikaraṇena saṅgatiṃ viṣayasaṃśayau ca sūcayati - taditi // atra yattadorāvṛttiḥ / bhujyata iti bhogaḥ ānandaḥ / tena tadvānupalakṣyate,
GSP33bbdip11u:3681: dharmādharmiṇorabhedavivakṣā vā / tathā ca he viṣṇo 'yat';
GSP33bbdip11u:3687: pūrṇānandavānabhavaḥ/ svasya mahābhogābhāve parasmai taddānānupapatteḥ / yasmācca pāyuguhyaikyena navendriyābhimānino devān tvaṃ 'prāṇayaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3688_0: aceṣṭayaḥ / idamapyupalakṣaṇaṃ - ceṣṭayasi ceṣṭayiṣyasi ca / tasmāttvaṃ prāṇaḥ prāṇaśabdavācyo
GSP33bbdip11u:3688_1: 'bhava iti siddhāntarītyā śrutyarthaḥ / pūrvapakṣe tvetatsarvaṃ mukhyaprāṇe yojyam / itīti / 'iti';
GSP33bbdip11u:3693_0: iti padadvayātmakavākyena ca prāṇasyoktamiti yojanā / anena prāṇākhyo viṣayaḥ / tasya
GSP33bbdip11u:3693_2: saṅgatiḥ / saḥ vāyuruta viṣṇuriti saṃśayaśca sūcito bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:3698_0: sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ darśayati - sa ceti // tacchabda āvartate / caśabdo 'vadhāraṇe /
GSP33bbdip11u:3698_1: vāyurityanena sambadhyate / ānandamayaśceti samuccaye vā / tathā ca paramānandatvaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3700: prāpnoti / ata evānandamayo 'pi sa evetyāpatati / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:3701_0: prasiddheḥ prāṇaśruteḥ tasyāśca tasminvāyau prasiddhe rūḍhatvāt / prāṇapadapravṛttinimittasya
GSP33bbdip11u:3701_1: jīvanāḍihetutvasya ca śarīre sati mukhye jīvanādikaṃ sambhavati nāsatītyanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3705: yato viṣṇureva prāṇaḥ, ata eva 'śrīśca te lakṣmīśca patnyau /
GSP33bbdip11u:3708: siddhāntayati - na ceti // evaṃ prāṇasya vāyutvaṃ ānandamayatvaṃ ca na yuktamityarthaḥ / kuto
GSP33bbdip11u:3709_0: naivamityāśaṅkāyāṃ tatra hetutayā sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe - yata iti / sūtrārthasya hetutvadyotako
GSP33bbdip11u:3709_1: 'yaṃ yataśśabdaḥ / sūtre 'nuvṛttasya tattvityasyārtho viṣṇureveti / tathā ca yato
GSP33bbdip11u:3709_2: 'yaṃ prāṇo viṣṇoreva ato naivamityanvayaḥ / kuto 'yaṃ prāṇo viṣṇurevetyataḥ sautraṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3709_3: hetumanūdya vyācaṣṭe - ata eveti / ityādīti / ityādinoktaṃ yadviṣṇuliṅgaṃ tasmādevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3709_4: kathaṃ śrutyā pūrvapakṣite liṅgena nirṇaya ityato liṅgasya niravakāśatvajñāpanāyaivakāraḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3709_5: tathā ca sāvakāśaśruterniravakāśaliṅgena bādha iti bhāvaḥ / he viṣṇo 'te';
GSP33bbdip11u:3710_0: tava śrīśca lakṣmīśceti dve patnyau staḥ / vakṣasthalāśritā śrīḥ aṅkasthitā lakṣmīriti
GSP33bbdip11u:3710_1: sampradāyavidaḥ / tattvapradīpe tu - aṅkasthitā śrīḥ vakṣasi lakṣmabhūtā lakṣmīrityuktam / 'ahorātre';
GSP33bbdip11u:3712: pārśvasthitāvityarthaḥ / divārātramete pārśvagate iti vā / yadyapīdam 'adbhyaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3715: ityuttarānuvākagatam / tathā ca nānayorliṅgaliṅgibhāvo yujyate / tathāpi 'śrīśca te';
GSP33bbdip11u:3717_1: mukhato grahaṇaṃ yuktam / ādiśabdena 'hariṃ harantamanuyanti devāḥ / viśvasyeśānaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3718: iti tattvapradīpodāhṛtamanuvākāntarasthaṃ gṛhyate / sarvabuddhiniyantāraṃ jagatpatiṃ sarvasaṃhartāraṃ hariṃ devāḥ anugacchantītyarthaḥ / candrikāyāṃ tu - 'bhartā san';
GSP33bbdip11u:3721: iti pāṭhaḥ / tathāpi vājasaneyaśākhābhiprāyeṇa evamudāhṛtamiti dhyeyam / sūtrārtastu spaṣṭaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3727: tacca guhānihitam / 'vi me karṇā patayato vicakṣurvī3daṃ jyotirhṛdaya āhitaṃ yat /
GSP33bbdip11u:3728: vi me manaścarati dūra ādhīḥ kiṃ svidvakṣyāmi kimu nūmaniṣye'
GSP33bbdip11u:3731_2: viṣayasaṃśayau ca darśayati - yo vedeti // tataḥ kimityata āha - tacceti / co 'vadhāraṇe /
GSP33bbdip11u:3732: iti vākyena guhānihitaṃ vastūktaṃ tadevānandamayādyākhyamityuktam / tadeva 'vime karṇā';
GSP33bbdip11u:3734_1: saṅgatiḥ sūcitā bhavati / jyotirviṣayaḥ kimagniruta viṣṇuriti sandehaśca sūcito bhavati / 'vi me';
GSP33bbdip11u:3736: dhātoreva vicaraṇābhidhāyakatvam / upasargāstu dyotakāḥ na vācakāḥ / ata eva sūtre caraṇābhidhānāt ityevoktam/ bhāṣye tu 'vicaraṇābhidhānāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:3737: iti spaṣṭārthamuktam / ata eva tattvapradīpe 'spaṣṭatvāya vicaraṇābhidhānāt ityuktam';
GSP33bbdip11u:3740_0: ityasya ekapadatve 'pi avagrahadarśanena dvikhaṇḍatvādvibhajyānvayaḥ / āṅ īṣadabhivyāptyubhayārthakaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3740_1: vartata iti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca yato me karṇau jyotiṣo viruddhaṃ patayataḥ patataḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3740_2: svārthe ṇic / cakṣuśca viruddhaṃ patatīti vipariṇāmenānvayaḥ / yathā karṇāderjyotirvidūratvaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3740_3: evaṃ jyotiṣo 'pi karṇādividūratvamityāha - vīdamiti / kampo 'tyantamityarthe / tathā
GSP33bbdip11u:3741_0: ā samantāt sthitaṃ jyotistadatyantaṃ karṇādiviruddhaṃ vartate / evaṃ me manaḥ jyotiṣo
GSP33bbdip11u:3741_1: dūre vicarati atīva taddarśanaviruddhaṃ vartate / manaścaraṇasya tattvaniṣṭhāvirodhitvaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3744: kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi / kimu kiṃ vā nu idānīṃ 'maniṣye';
GSP33bbdip11u:3745: cintayāmīti mantrārthaḥ / tattvapradīpe tu - ā samantāddūrasthabuddhirahamityekānvayena vyākhyātam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3750_0: atha sayuktikaṃ pūrvapakṣayati - tacceti / cassamuccaye / taditi cāvartate / agniśabdo
GSP33bbdip11u:3750_1: bhūtataddevatāparaḥ / dvitīyacaśabdo bhinnakramaḥ / tathā ca tajjyotirguhānihitaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3752: jyotiśśrutestasyāśca tasminnagnāveva prasiddheḥ rūḍhatvāt / na kevalaṃ śruterevedaṃ jyotiragniḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3754_0: agniprakaraṇagatatvācceti yojanā / ata eva pūrvapakṣopasaṃhāraṭīkāyāṃ śrutiprakaraṇayorbalavatvāditi
GSP33bbdip11u:3754_1: prasiddhapadalakṣitāyāḥ śruteḥ prathamamuktiḥ / ata eva candrikāyāṃ bhāṣye agnisūktasthatvācceti
GSP33bbdip11u:3761_0: siddhāntayatsūtramavatārayati - ata iti // yataḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ prāpto 'taḥ uttaraṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3761_1: sūtramāha bhagavānbādarāyaṇa ityarthaḥ / tadeva sūtraṃ paṭhati jyotiriti / sūtre
GSP33bbdip11u:3761_2: tattvityasya anuvṛttiṃ vipariṇāmaṃ cābhipretya pratijñāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - viṣṇureveti / 'jyotiḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3762: tacchabdavācyo viṣṇureva bhavediti yojanā / kuta ityataḥ prāptaṃ 'caraṇābhidhānāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:3763_0: iti hetvaṃśaṃ caraṇaśabdasya vicaraṇārthatvaṃ karṇādīnāmityasya adhyāhāraṃ cābhipretya
GSP33bbdip11u:3763_1: vyācaṣṭe - karṇādīnāmiti / atra vākye karṇādīnāmetajjyotiḥprati viruddhacaraṇokteḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3764: na tu karṇādividūratvamātram / tadviṣaye tasyāsambhavāt / abhidhānaparyantadhāvanaṃ hetvasiddhiparihārāyeti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33bbdip11u:3771: tāvatā tasya viṣṇutvaṃ kuta ityataḥ karṇādividūratvasya viṣṇvekaliṅgatve śrutimudāharan tatpratijānīte - sa hīti // evetyanuṣajyate / ādiśabdena 'na te viṣṇo';
GSP33bbdip11u:3776: na vā hetuviśeṣaṇāsiddhirityadhyāhāreṇa yojanā / anena 'jyotiḥ'; tacchabdavācyaṃ brahmaiva / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:3778: karṇādividūratvaliṅgaśravaṇāt ittyāvṛttyadhyāhārābhyāṃ sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / māpayati jñāpayati viṣayāniti vā mīyante viṣayā aneneti vā mātrā indriyagaṇaḥ tayā tatastvaṃ 'paro';
GSP33bbdip11u:3779_0: dūro 'sīti he viṣṇo anyamahimnaḥ paramantaṃ sīmānaṃ te mahimānaṃ ko 'pi śrotrādinā
GSP33bbdip11u:3779_1: nāpeti ca prakṛtānuguṇyena śrutirvyākhyeyā / atra tattvapradīpasannyāyaratnāvalīkārayoḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3785: chando 'bhidhānān neti cen na tathā ceto'rpaṇanigadāt tathā hi darśanam | BBs_1,1.25 |
GSP33bbdip11u:3787_1: sūtramevādau paṭhati - chanda iti // atra chanda ityāvartate / tacca vyastaṃ samastaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3792: kintu chanda eva / yato gāyatrī na viṣṇuḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3794: ato jyotirapi na viṣṇuḥ kintu chandaḥ / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:3795: 'chando 'bhidhānāt'; chandasā gāyatryā tadaikyābhiprāyeṇa jyotiṣo 'bhidhānāt upakramāditi cet - na,
GSP33bbdip11u:3798: gāyatrīpadena viṣṇorevābhidhānāt / gāyatryādipadairviṣṇorevābhidhānaṃ ca tadabhedavidhānārthaṃ kintu tathopāsanārthamevetyāha - tatheti / 'tathā';
GSP33bbdip11u:3802_1: vyarthamiti śaṅkā parihṛtā / nanu bhavedgāyatrīśabdavācyatvena viṣṇorjyotiśśabdavācyatvasādhanam,
GSP33bbdip11u:3803: yadi gāyatrīśabdavācyatvaṃ viṣṇoḥ pramitaṃ syāt / tadeva kuta ityata āha - tathā hīti / 'hi';
GSP33bbdip11u:3806: dṛśyate jñāyate 'rtho yayeti vyupattyā 'gāyati ca trāyati ca'; (śākhāntaram)
GSP33bbdip11u:3813: tasmānna viṣṇuriti cet - na, tathā cetor'paṇārthaṃ hi nigadyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:3816: śrutyādisaṅgativiṣayavākyaviṣayasaṃśayapūrvapakṣatatphalāni sūcayan sūtre pūrvapakṣāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - atheti // uktasyetyāvartyate / tathā ca 'hṛdaya āhitaṃ yat';
GSP33bbdip11u:3818: punaḥ 'atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate viśvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣu sarvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣu anuttameṣūttameṣu lokeṣu / idaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnantaḥpuruṣe jyotiḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3822: yato 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ vāgvai gāyatrī vāgvā idaṃ sarvam';
GSP33bbdip11u:3825: upakramaḥ kṛtaḥ ata iti yojanā / tataḥ kimityata āha - tasmāditi/ idaṃ cāvartate / jyotirgāyatrīti ca śeṣaḥ / chanda iti cānuṣajyate / tathā ca yasmādgāyatryā samārambhaḥ kṛtaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3827: tasmādidaṃ jyotirgāyatryeva bhavet / sā ca gāyatrī virṇasamāveśalakṣaṇamantrātmakachanda eva bhavet, na viṣṇuḥ / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:3828: tasmāt gāyatrīśabdasya chandasyeva rūḍhatvādvāktvābhidhānācceti yojanā / anena 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam';
GSP33bbdip11u:3829_1: viṣṇvanyatvāpattyā tata eva agnisūktagatajyotiṣo 'pi tadanyatvameva bhavet / ata
GSP33bbdip11u:3829_2: evānandamayatvamapi anyasyaiva bhavenna viṣṇoriti pūrvoktākṣepeṇa etadadhikaraṇotthānātpūrveṇāsyākṣepikī
GSP33bbdip11u:3829_3: saṅgatiḥ / evaṃ gāyatrī viṣayaḥ / kiṃ chandoviśeṣaḥ uta viṣṇuriti sandehaḥ / tathā
GSP33bbdip11u:3830_0: tacchabdasya tatra rūḍhatvāditi sayuktikaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ / tathā tasmāt jyotirapi chanda
GSP33bbdip11u:3830_1: eveti tasyaiva guhānihitatvamāndamayatvaṃ ceti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ ca sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:3831: sarvamapi vākyaṃ tanmāhātmyaparatayā yojanīyam/ siddhānte tu 'atha';
GSP33bbdip11u:3838: tṛtīyaṃ satyaloke ca sadanaṃ trividhaṃ matam //
GSP33bbdip11u:3841: na vidyate uttamo loko yebhyasteṣu pratyavareṣviti vā / 'uttameṣu';
GSP33bbdip11u:3844: 'tat'; dīpyamānaṃ tejaḥ 'idaṃ vāva'; idaṃ khalu/ idaṃ ca kim?
GSP33bbdip11u:3847_0: tacchabditaṃ brahmāsti tattenaikībhūtamityarthaḥ / yo gāyatrīnāmā gāyatrīsaṃsthaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3847_1: strīrūpo hayaśīrṣākhyo bhagavān tadidaṃ prathamaṃ rūpamityāśayena tasya dvitīyaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3847_2: rūpaṃ vaktuṃ gāyatrītyādivākyaṃ pravṛttam / 'yadidaṃ kiñca bhūtaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3850: gāyatrīnāmā bhagavāneva / vai prasiddham / tasyaiva tṛtīyaṃ rūpamāha - vāgiti / gāyatrīnāmā bhagavān 'vāgvai';
GSP33bbdip11u:3851: vāṅnāmako viṣṇureva / kuto 'sya viṣṇutvamityatastallakṣaṇayogādityāha - vāgvā iti / 'idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3853_1: - neti / nigadyata ityatrāpi sambadhyate / tathā ca jyotiḥśabdena viṣṇureva nigadyata
GSP33bbdip11u:3853_2: ityarthaḥ / kuta ityato nigadāditi hetuṃ yojayati - hi nigadyata iti / gāyatrīśabdeneti
GSP33bbdip11u:3855: abhīdhīyate tasmādityarthaḥ / viṣṇorgāyatryādiśabdairabhidhānaṃ ca na tadabhedavidhānārthaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3856_3: prasiddhasya gāyatrīpadasya viṣṇau prayoge prayojanamatra vadatā sūtrakṛtā pūrvatrottaratra
GSP33bbdip11u:3856_4: cāgnyādipadasya viṣṇau prayoge prayojanaṃ sūcitamiti darśayitum / na ca gāyatryādipadābhyāmeva
GSP33bbdip11u:3858_0: na tūbhābhyām / bhinnajātīyānekaśabdagrahaṇārthaṃ śabdadvayottarādipadam / ata eva
GSP33bbdip11u:3859: ityuktam/ kecittu bhāṣyagatahiśabdo jñānārthamatha dhyānārthamiti pramāṇaprasiddhidyotakaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3860: adhikaraṇāntare 'pyasya nyāyasyānusandheyatvajñāpakaścetyāhuḥ / ceto 'rpaṇārthamiti sāvadhāraṇam / tathā ca 'asau';
GSP33bbdip11u:3863: na tadabhedavidhānārthamityarthaḥ / itītyantena tathāśabdārtha uktaḥ/ anenāprasiddhagāyatryādipadena viṣṇorabhidhānasya vaiyarthyaśaṅkā parihṛtā /
GSP33bbdip11u:3866: tathā hi darśanaṃ 'gāyati trāyati ca'; (chāṃ. 3-12-1.) ityādi /
GSP33bbdip11u:3868_1: viṣṇuḥ syāttadeva kuta ityato gānatrāṇakartṛtvaliṅgādityāśayena tasyāsiddhiparihārāya
GSP33bbdip11u:3873: tathāpi śākhāntaramevedamityadoṣaḥ / ādipadena 'yā vai sā gāyatrī iyaṃ vāva sā yeyaṃ pṛthivyasyāṃ hīdaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ pratiṣṭhitametāmeva nātiśīyate'; (chāṃ. 3-12.2.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3874: ityādikaṃ gṛhyate / śrutyarthastu - yato gāyatrīvācyo bhagavān vedān 'gāyati';
GSP33bbdip11u:3877: prasiddhā gāyatrī tannāmā viṣṇuḥ 'sā iyaṃ vai';
GSP33bbdip11u:3880: tannāmā bhagavān / kathaṃ pṛthivī viṣṇurityataḥ tallakṣaṇayogādityāha - asyāṃ hīdamiti / 'asyāṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3891_0: nanu gāyatryādiśabdasya anyatra rūḍhatvātkathaṃ liṅgamātreṇa viṣṇutvaniścaya ityato
GSP33bbdip11u:3891_1: gāyatryādiśruteḥ sāvakāśatvāditi bhāvena gāyatryagnipṛthivyādiśabdāḥ na kevalaṃ śrutyuktayogena viṣṇau sāvakāśāḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3892: api tu paurāṇikarūḍhyā gāyatryāḥ bhagavadadhīnatvādapītyāśayena tatra smṛtimāha - sarveti / 'eṣaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3897: viṣṇuḥ sarvalokavācakapṛthivyādiśabdavācya ityarthaḥ / kuta ityataḥ chanda ādīnāṃ bhagavadadhīnatvāditi pratyekaṃ hetutrayasūcanāya hiśabdatrayaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3898_0: vedaprasiddhijñāpānāya vā / chandasāṃ lokānāṃ ca pratyakṣatvāt devānāṃ ca parokṣatvādeṣo
GSP33bbdip11u:3898_1: 'sāviti vicitroktiḥ / kathaṃ tarhyanyatra vyavahāra ityata āha - teṣāmiti / chandodevalokānāmityarthaḥ / 'tat';
GSP33bbdip11u:3907_0: hetvantareṇāpi gāyatryāḥ viṣṇutvaṃ sādhayatsūtramupanyasya tadgṛhītāṃ śrutimudāharati
GSP33bbdip11u:3907_1: - bhūtādīti / itiśabdasya bhūtādītyanenānvayaḥ / sūtre bhūtaṃ viśvamādiḥ prathamoddiṣṭaṃ yeṣu te bhūtādayaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3908: te pādāḥ yasya gāyatrīpadārthasya sa bhūtādipādaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:3909_0: tasya vyapadeśaḥ tatpratipādakaṃ vākyaṃ tasyopapatteḥ yuktatvāditi vigrahaḥ / pādaśabdo
GSP33bbdip11u:3909_1: bhāvapradhānaḥ / ata eva bhūtādipādatvasyetyuktaṃ ṭīkāyām / evamityasya cobhayatrānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3909_2: tathā ca 'pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni / tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi'; ityevaṃ gāyatryāḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3910_1: gāyatrīśabdavācyo viṣṇureva bhavedityarthaḥ / caśabdasya vyapadeśapadenānvaye gāyatryā
GSP33bbdip11u:3910_2: viṣṇutve sādhye pūrvasūtre darśanapadoktahetoḥ etatsūtroktahetudvayasya ca samuccaye
GSP33bbdip11u:3910_3: saḥ / yathāśrutānvaye tu bhūtādipādatvasya viṣṇuliṅgatvaṃ na kevalaṃ viṣṇorevopapatteḥ siddham,
GSP33bbdip11u:3911: kintu puruṣasūktoktatvācceti hetusamuccaye sa iti jñeyam / chāndogye hi 'saiṣā catuṣpadā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī'; (chā. 3-12-5.)
GSP33bbdip11u:3912_0: iti vākyena yaiṣā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī sā catuṣpadetyevaṃ gāyatrīnāmakasya bhagavataḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:3912_2: catuṣpādatvaṃ vidhāya svoktārtha eva puruṣasūktamantraḥ samākhyārūpatvenodāhṛto brāhmaṇena
GSP33bbdip11u:3921: pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi'; (chāṃ. 3-12-6.) iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:3932: adhikamāhātmyopeta ityarthaḥ / jyāyastvameva darśayati - pādo 'syetyādinā / 'sarvā bhūtāni';
GSP33bbdip11u:3935: pādavatpādo bhinnāṃśaḥ / yadyapi tattvapradīpe - viśvabhūvidhirbhāti / tathāpi ṭīkāyāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyasyaikaḥ pāda iti pādavidhānadarśanāt;
GSP33bbdip11u:3939_0: trayāṇāṃ pādānām aṃśānāṃ samudāyo nārāyaṇavāsudevavaikuṇṭhasaṃjñaṃ triṣu rūḍhyā dyotamānatvācca
GSP33bbdip11u:3947: pādaṃ ṣaḍḍhoturna kilā vivitse (tai.ā. 3-11.) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:3948: pāda iti ekadeśaparimitaṃ caturbhāgabala itivadbhinnaṃ ca /
GSP33bbdip11u:3950: nanu gāyatryāmiva viṣṇāvapi bhūtādipādatvoktiranupapannā / tasya bhūtabhinnatvādityata āha - suvarṇamityādi // 'suvarṇam';
GSP33bbdip11u:3955: viśvamiti ca śeṣaḥ / pāda iti cāvartate / caśabdaevārthe hetau ca / ekadeśaparimitamiti hetugarbhamāvartanīyam / tathā ca 'co';
GSP33bbdip11u:3956: yataḥ śrutisthena pāda iti śabdena na bhūtānāmityamṛtapādatrayavatsvarūpāṃśatvamucyate/ yenānupapattiḥ syāt / kintu,
GSP33bbdip11u:3957: yajñadattasya caturbhāgabalo devadatta iti vadbhinnameva viśvam / yataḥ 'parimitam';
GSP33bbdip11u:3958_0: viṣṇupādaparimitasāmarthyam ataḥ pāda iti viṣṇupādatvenocyate ityarthaḥ / asyāto
GSP33bbdip11u:3958_2: harirityāgatamityato 'pyāha - pāda itīti / tathā ca yataḥ śrautapāda iti padena caturbhāgabala
GSP33bbdip11u:3958_3: itivat na viśvaṃ viṣṇusāmarthyasya caturthāṃśaparimitamityucyate / kintu,
GSP33bbdip11u:3960: viṣṇusāmarthyaikadeśaparimitamiti ato noktadoṣa ityarthaḥ / kuta etat jñāyata ityata āha - suvarṇaṃ kośamiti / 'śruteḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3963: ityuktaṃ ṭīkāyām / evaṃ ca tattpradīpaṭīkayorekavākyatayā / pādamityāvartate / tatraikaṃ bhāvasādhanam / na kileti dīrghaḥ sāṃhitikaḥ / tathā ca ekasmin kapāle 'suvarṇaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:3975: pādaśabdenācakṣate vadanti puruṣasūktādyāgamā iti śeṣaḥ / na kila atra pādaśabdenāṅghri vadanti,
GSP33bbdip11u:3979_0: na lebhe kileti śrutyarthaḥ / sattarkadīpāvalyām - pādaṃ na vivitse iti / pādasāmyaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:3979_1: na lebhe ityuktam / atra pakṣadvaye 'pi puruṣavyatyayastulyaḥ / ṭīkākṛtpakṣe lakāravyatyayaśca /
GSP33bbdip11u:3979_2: yadvā - liṅgavyatyayasya chāndasatvaṃ kośamityasya dvitīyāntatvaṃ copetya strīliṅgapadānāmapi
GSP33bbdip11u:3986: syādetadevaṃ yadi 'tāvān'; ityasyāmṛci viṣṇurabhidhīyate ityatra pramāṇaṃ syāt,
GSP33bbdip11u:3988_0: ato liṅgamanyaniṣṭhaṃ bhaviṣyatītyataḥ sautracaśabdena bhūtādipādatvasya viṣṇuliṅgatve
GSP33bbdip11u:3988_1: sādhye puruṣasūktoktatvāditi yadanumānaṃ sūcitaṃ tasyāprayojakatvamāśaṅkya pariharati - sa hīti // 'hi';
GSP33bbdip11u:3991_0: tatpratipādyaḥ tasmātsa eva puruṣasūktoktabhūtādipādo 'pīti yojanā / anyathā bhūtādipādatvasya
GSP33bbdip11u:3991_1: viṣṇudharmatvābhāve puruṣasūktapratipādyatvaṃ na syāditi bhāvaḥ / yadvā - gāyatryā
GSP33bbdip11u:3991_5: prāpnotīti bhāvaḥ / puruṣasūktoktasya viṣṇutvaṃ kuta ityata āha - yajñeneti / devāḥ 'yajñena';
GSP33bbdip11u:3994: apūjayanniti śrutyarthaḥ / iti yajñaśabdāditi / iti vākye yajñaśabdaśravaṇādityarthaḥ / yajñaśabdaḥ kathaṃ viṣṇutvaniścāyaka ityato vidvadrūḍhyetyāha - yajña iti / 'hi';
GSP33bbdip11u:3995: yataḥ yajña iti padena viṣṇvākhyā devatācyata ityarthaḥ / yadyapi 'yajño vai viṣṇuḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4004_0: kintvanyaprakaraṇameva / na ca yajñaśrutivirodhaḥ / paśurūpānyaprakaraṇe tadanyaviṣṇuśruteḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4004_1: ayogāditivācyam / tasyāḥ prāsaṅgikatvasambhavāt / na ca tata eva bhūtādipādatvasya
GSP33bbdip11u:4005_0: iti śruterbhūtādipāde yajñaśruterabhāvādtyataḥ puruṣasūktoktasya viṣṇutve smṛtiñcāha
GSP33bbdip11u:4005_1: - tasminniti // mahārājeti kasyacitsambodhanaṃ rāmaviśeṣaṇaṃ vā / tathātve dīrghassyāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4006: tretāyuge sarvaiḥ puruṣanāmabhī rāma evābhidhīyate ityarthaḥ / ata evāṃśādhikaraṇe -
GSP33bbdip11u:4011_0: iti skānde ityuktaṃ tattvapradīpe / atra dṛṣṭāntamāha - yatheti / yathā kṛtsne pauruṣe
GSP33bbdip11u:4011_1: sūkte viṣṇureva na tvanyaḥ / paśuḥ naraḥ prāsaṅgikatayābhidhīyate ityarthaḥ / anena
GSP33bbdip11u:4011_2: siddhasyaiva dṛṣṭāntatvātpuruṣasūktasya viṣṇuparatvaṃ siddhamiti bhāvaḥ / skānda
GSP33bbdip11u:4011_3: ityantaraṃ etaduktamiti śeṣaḥ / asya sa hīti purvavākyenānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4014: upadeśabhedān neti cen nobhayasminn apy avirodhāt | BBs_1,1.27 |
GSP33bbdip11u:4017: tasmānnekaṃ vastvatrocyate iti cet - na, trisaptalokāpekṣayā ubhayasminnapyavirodhāt //
GSP33bbdip11u:4022: virodhāt na dvayorviṣṇvākhyam ekaṃ vastu pratipādyaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4025: avirodhāt / trisaptalokāpekṣayā saptamīpañcamyoḥ ekārthatvena virodhābhāvāditi sūtrayojanāmabhiprayannākṣepāṃśaṃ tāvadvyācaṣṭe - tripāditi / 'pūrvopadeśaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4027_0: paścāttanaḥ uttara upadeśastadbhinno 'stīti śeṣaḥ / virodhasphoraṇāya pañcamyanta
GSP33bbdip11u:4027_1: ityādyuktiḥ / upakramagatasya prābalyopapādanāya pūrva ityuktiḥ / tataḥ kimityata
GSP33bbdip11u:4027_2: āha - tasmāditi / yasmādevaṃ bhinnopadeśadvayamasti tasmādatropadeśadvaye gāyatrījyotiśśabdābhyāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4030: anekaṃ vastudvayamucyate iti yojanā / siddhāntayatsūtrāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - neti / nātra vastudvayamucyate ityarthaḥ / kiṃ tvitiśeṣaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4031: ekaṃ vastūcyate iti anuṣajyate / ubhayasminniti sādhyāntargatam / apiśabdo na kevalamekatra,
GSP33bbdip11u:4032_0: kintūbhayatrāpīti samuccaye / tathā ca kintūbhayasmin apyupadeśe ekameva viṣṇvākhyaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4032_1: vastūcyate iti yojanā / virodhātkathametadyujyate ityata āha - trisaptalokāpekṣayeti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4033: ubhayatrāpyekavastvabhidhāne virodhābhāvādityarthaḥ / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - yadā bhūrbhuvassvariti lokatrayavivakṣā,
GSP33bbdip11u:4034_0: tadā lakṣayojanocchritāntarikṣākhyabhuva uparitanasya sarvasyāpi dyutvāt śvetadvīpānantasanavaikuṇṭhānāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4034_2: rūpatrayaṃ divitiṣṭhatītyucyate iti na saptamyantopadeśavirodhaḥ / na ca
GSP33bbdip11u:4037_2: tu na pṛthivīsthānyoccatvayogovyāvartyate / kintu pṛthivīsthoccatvāyogaḥ / yadā tu
GSP33bbdip11u:4039: divīndrasadanaṃ caiva tatpare tu divaḥ pare //
GSP33bbdip11u:4040_1: divaḥ paratā / evaṃ sūryamaṇḍalasyāpi dyutvāttaduccasyoparisthatvena tatsajātīyasya
GSP33bbdip11u:4040_2: bhūmeḥ kiñcidantaritasya sarvargasamonnatasya śvetadvīpasyāpi divaḥ paratvamastīti
GSP33bbdip11u:4041_0: ityanenaiva uktatvāt svargatyāgenendrasadanasya dyutvoktiḥ / na ca lokatrayavivakṣayaivānantāsanādīnāmapi
GSP33bbdip11u:4041_1: mervādiparatvena divaḥ paratvasyāpi siddheḥ saptalokavivakṣā vyartheti vācyam / tathā
GSP33bbdip11u:4046: iti pramāṇabalena citprakṛtyātmakānantāsanaśvetadvīpavaikuṇṭhākhyasthānatraye saptamyanto dyuśabdo dyotamānatvanimittena yaugikaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4047: svargādau tu rūḍha iti upadeśayoravirodha iti prakārāntareṇa virodhaparihāraḥ kṛtaḥ // 11 //
GSP33bbdip11u:4053: tatra 'tā vā etāḥ śīrṣan chriyaḥ śritāścakṣuḥ śrotraṃ mano vākprāṇaḥ'; (ai.ā. 2-1-4.)
GSP33bbdip11u:4057_0: atrādhikaraṇe lokato 'nyatra prasiddhaprāṇanāmno viṣṇau samanvayaḥ pratipādyate /
GSP33bbdip11u:4058: iti vākyoktaprāṇo viṣṇurityuktamityarthaḥ / tataḥ kimityata āha - tatreti / uktamityanuṣajyate / tasyāvṛttivipariṇāmau / evaṃ tatretyapyāvartanīyam / tathā ca 'tatra';
GSP33bbdip11u:4059: tadvai tvamiti vākye uktasya prāṇasya viṣṇutvaṃ na vidyate na yujyate / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:4063_0: ityaitareyavākye uktasya śrutasya prāṇasya viṣṇutvaṃ na vidyata iti yojanā / kuto
GSP33bbdip11u:4063_1: na vidyate ityata āha - indriyaissahābhidhānāditi / indriyaissaha paṭhitatvāt indriyagaṇe
GSP33bbdip11u:4063_3: saṅgatiruktā bhavati / aitareyaprāṇākhyo viṣayaḥ / prāṇo 'nya uta viṣṇuriti saṃśayaśca
GSP33bbdip11u:4063_4: sūcitaḥ / tathā vāyvādiranya eveti pūrvapakṣaḥ / indriyagaṇe gaṇitatvākhyatatsādhakaliṅgaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4064: ityetacca caturmukhaśirasi śiraśśabdapravṛttinimittakathanāya pravṛttam / vaiśabdaḥ prasiddhau / tathā ca yataḥ 'tā etāḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4066_0: śīrṣṇi śiraḥsaṃjñikamūrdhni śritāḥ / ata eva śrayaṇācchriya iti siddhānte śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4066_1: anena cakṣurādibhiḥ śritatvaṃ śiraḥpadapravṛttinimittamityuktaṃ bhavati / pūrvapakṣī
GSP33bbdip11u:4066_2: tu prāṇaśabdamanyamātraparaṃ manyate / siddhāntayatsūtramavatārayati - ata iti /
GSP33bbdip11u:4066_3: yataḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ prāptaḥ ata uttaraṃ sūtramāha bhagavān bādarāyaṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4075_0: sūtraṃ paṭhitvā tatrānugamāditi hetvaṃśaṃ śrutyudāharaṇena vyācaṣṭe - prāṇa iti //
GSP33bbdip11u:4076: anuvṛtterabhyāsādityarthaḥ / ādipadena 'prāṇo hyevaiṣa ya eṣa tapati';
GSP33bbdip11u:4077: iti sūryamaṇḍalasthatvapratipādakavākyaṃ gṛhyate / tathā 'sarvāṇi bhūtānyāpipīlikābhyaḥ prāṇena bṛhatyā viṣṭabdhāni';
GSP33bbdip11u:4083: sautraṃ tathāśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe - atrāpīti // śruta iti śeṣaḥ / na kevalaṃ 'tadvai tvam'; ityatra,
GSP33bbdip11u:4084: kintvaitareye 'pīti samuccaye 'piśabdaḥ / sūtre anuvṛttasya tattvityasyārthamāha - viṣṇureveti / anena yathā
GSP33bbdip11u:4085: 'tadvaitvam'; iti śrutyuktaprāṇo viṣṇuḥ tathaitareyokto 'pi viṣṇureva, na tvanyaḥ / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:4091: prakarṣeṇa śiṣyapraśiṣyadiṣu nītavantaḥ upadidiśurityarthaḥ / anena viṣṇoḥ sarvadevopāsyatvamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4092: 'sa eṣo 'suḥ sa eṣa prāṇaḥ sa eṣa bhūtiḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4093: ityādyanyakhaṇḍagataṃ vākyam / anena bhūtitvādinā devādyupāsyatvamucyate / 'sa eṣaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4094: bhagavān duṣṭanirasanādasuḥ prakṛṣṭānandarūpatvātprāṇaḥ devānāṃ bhūtiśabditajñānādyaiśvaryapradatvādasurāṇām ajñānādyanaiśvaryahetutvācca bhūtyabhūtiśabdavācya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4095: tatraiva 'tā vā etāḥ sarvā ṛcaḥ sarve vedāḥ sarve ghoṣā ekaiva vyāhṛtiḥ / prāṇa eva prāṇa ṛca ityeva vidyāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:4096: iti anyadvākyam / atra prāṇasyasarvavedoktatvamucyate / yāstāḥ etāḥ sarvā ṛcastāsāṃ 'ekaiva vyāhṛtiḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4098: prāṇo viṣṇureva / kiñca ye sarve vedāḥ teṣāmapi prāṇa eva pratipādyaḥ/ api ca ye samudrādighoṣāḥ teṣāmapi,
GSP33bbdip11u:4099: kimu vedānām / tatra ṛcastu viśeṣata indrādināmavato viṣṇorguṇān alpajñānāmapi prakāśayantīti,
GSP33bbdip11u:4101_0: tatpratipādikā eveti jānīyādityarthaḥ / aitareyabhāṣye tu - prathamaprāṇapadamapi
GSP33bbdip11u:4101_1: viṣayasaptamyantatayā vyāhṛtiśabdaṃ ca vyāharaṇaparatayā vyākhyāya ekameva vyāharaṇaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4102: atha devarathaḥ 'tasya vāguddhiḥ śrotre pakṣasī cakṣuṣī yukte manaḥ saṅgṛhītā tadayaṃ prāṇo 'dhitiṣṭhati';
GSP33bbdip11u:4103_0: iti vākyāntaraṃ atra prāṇasya deharathatvamucyate / prameyāntarakathanārambhārtho
GSP33bbdip11u:4103_1: 'thaśabdaḥ / ucyata iti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca devasya viṣṇoḥ vāyoḥ adhyātmamadhidaivataṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4103_2: ca ratha ucyate ityarthaḥ / tasyādhyātmaṃ dehākhyarathasya 'vāk';
GSP33bbdip11u:4104: vāgākhyā umā uddhiḥ dhāraṇarajjurūpā adhidaivaṃ viṣṇurathasya prasiddhasyandanasya ca nāgākāromā uddhiḥ 'śrotre';
GSP33bbdip11u:4110: sārathiḥ evam adhidaivaṃ prasiddhasyandanasyāpi rudraḥ sārathiḥ / sa cāsāvayaṃ ca tadayamityekaṃ padam / tattvapradīparītyā
GSP33bbdip11u:4111_0: bhinnapadatve 'pi taditi rathatayoktaṃ śarīraṃ parāmṛśyate / liṅgavyatyayena taṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4111_1: rathamiti vā / ayaṃ prāṇo viṣṇuḥ vāyuścādhitiṣṭhatītyarthaḥ / liṅgena pūrvapakṣite
GSP33bbdip11u:4118: nanu bāhulyena balavataḥ saiddhāntikaliṅgādapi pūrvavādyuktaliṅgameva balavat / niravakāśatvena svabhāvato balavattvāt / na cāviśeṣeṇanirṇayaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4122: iti / ataḥ kathaṃ tairviṣṇutvaniścaya ityato devatopadeśyatvādiliṅgānāṃ niravakāśatvamapi smṛtyā sādhayati
GSP33bbdip11u:4123: - viṣṇumiti / devāḥ viṣṇumeva prādhānyena śiṣyādiṣu jñānasampradāyapravartanena 'ānayan';
GSP33bbdip11u:4124: upādiśan / bhūtimuddiśya viṣṇumevopāsate / bhūtimiti vidheyaviśeṣaṇaṃ vā / tathā ca viṣṇuṃ bhūtiṃ bhūtirjñānādyaiśvaryarūpa ityupāsate ityarthaḥ / 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4127_0: viṣṇoreva rathaḥ / atraivakārasya dvirgrahaṇātsarvatrānuṣaṅgaḥ sūcitaḥ / tena sarvaliṅgānāmapi
GSP33bbdip11u:4133: yadā bahutvaniravakāśatvākhyaprakāradvayenāpi durbalaliṅgasyobhayathāprabalaliṅgato bādhasambhavena tainaiva prāṇasya viṣṇutvasiddhiḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4134: tadā kimu vācyaṃ niravakāśabrahmaśabdābhyāsāditi bhāvenānugamapadaṃ prakārāntareṇa vyācaṣṭe - brahmeti // asmin prakaraṇe 'etadbrahma'; (ai.ā. 2-1-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:4139_1: ayaṃ jīvo brahmaṇaḥ parasyāśrayaḥ / imaṃ puruṣaṃ caturmukhaṃ parabrahma prāpadyata /
GSP33bbdip11u:4139_2: vāyuryatra sthita urveva garaṇaṃ stavanaṃ cakre tatsthānamudaraṃ tadgatamityarthaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4142: na vaktur ātmopadeśād iti ced adhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmā hy asmin | BBs_1,1.29 |
GSP33bbdip11u:4144: padeśādindra eveti cet - na, 'prāṇastvaṃ prāṇaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni'
GSP33bbdip11u:4147: uktamākṣipya samādadhatsūtraṃ paṭhitvākṣepāṃśaṃ tāvadvyācaṣṭe - neti // prāṇa ityanuvartate / tathā ca prāṇo viṣṇuriti na yuktam / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:4149: iti vākyena bṛhatīsahasravakturviśvāmitrasyendreṇa prāṇatayā ātmanaḥ svasyaivopadeśādityarthaḥ / prāṇa indra eveti phaloktiḥ / na tūktahetoḥ sādhyoktiḥ / 'prāṇo vāhamasmyṛṣe';
GSP33bbdip11u:4150: iti vākyaṃ tu 'tamindra uvāca ṛṣe priyaṃ vai me dhāmopāgāḥ varaṃ te dadāmīti / sa hovāca tvāmeva jānīyāmiti / tamindra uvāca';
GSP33bbdip11u:4154_0: he ṛṣe me priyaṃ dhāmopāgāḥ prāpnuhi / te varaṃ dadāmīti / vaiśabdo 'vadhāraṇe prasiddhau
GSP33bbdip11u:4155: viśvāmitraḥ indrāviṣṭena hariṇā varaṃ te dadānīti punaruktassan uvāca / kimiti?
GSP33bbdip11u:4156: tvāṃ sāmānyataḥ pūrvam ahaṃ jāne / adhunā kīdṛśastvamiti viśeṣato jānīyāmiti / evamuktaḥ 'indraḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4158_0: he ṛṣe ahaṃ prakṛṣṭānandarūpatvātprāṇaśabdavācyo 'smīti / atra vākyasamanvayapakṣe
GSP33bbdip11u:4158_2: ahamitīndrāntaḥsthena hariṇā svātmano nirdeśādasmīti uttamapuruṣopapattiḥ / pūrvapakṣirītyā
GSP33bbdip11u:4158_4: bhagavati samanvayapakṣe tu na tadanupapattiriti dhyeyam / nañadhyāhāreṇa siddāntāṃśaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4158_5: vyācaṣṭe - neti / anugamādityanuvartate / netyāvartate / hiśabdo yata ityarthe /
GSP33bbdip11u:4158_6: asyoktamiti śeṣaḥ / tathā cetthaṃ tattvapradīpaṭīkoktā yojanā - nāyaṃ prāṇa indraḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4162: yato 'tra prakaraṇe svasthitasyaiva prathamaṃ 'prāṇo vā ahamasmyṛṣe';
GSP33bbdip11u:4163: iti vākyena paramātmatvamuktamindreṇa / tarhyaikyoktivirodha ityapi na / yato 'tra tasyaiva prāṇākhyaparamātmanaḥ 'prāṇastvaṃ prāṇaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni';
GSP33bbdip11u:4166: asti natvaikyamata iti / sūtroktasambandhabāhulyaṃ sambandhini paryavasyatītyāśayena
GSP33bbdip11u:4167_0: bahvityuktam / bhūmaśabdasya bhāvavācitve 'pi bhāvabhavitrorabhedāt bhavitari prayogaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4167_1: sūtre tu paranipāta ārṣaḥ / athavā - adhikaścāsāvātmā cādhyātmā tasya sambandhaḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4170_0: bahulaḥ paramātmasambandhaḥ sannidhiviśeṣo vidyata ityarthaḥ / vidyata ityanantaraṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4170_1: tadapekṣayāyam upadeśo na svāpekṣayeti śeṣaḥ / tathācendre tātkālikeśvarasannidhānaviśeṣābhiprāyā
GSP33bbdip11u:4171: na svāpekṣayeti nopadeśavirodha iti bhāvaḥ / kuto na svāpekṣayetyataḥ prāṇastavamityādyāha / yojanā tu - hi yasmāt 'prāṇastvam';
GSP33bbdip11u:4173_1: na caitadatra jīvaviśeṣendre vidyate yujyate tasmāditi / prathamapakṣe 'yasyātmā
GSP33bbdip11u:4175: kintu indra eveti cet - nendro 'yaṃ prāṇaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4177: anugamāt prāguktabalatamaliṅgādeḥ / na copadeśavirodhaḥ / yato 'yamindragatādhyātmaviṣaya eva / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:4178_1: vartamānamiti / adhiścāsau ātmā ceti dehaḥ paramātmā cocyate / tathā ca yasmādadhyātmano
GSP33bbdip11u:4178_2: viṣṇorindraviśvāmitrādidehasambandha ukto 'sti tasmāt / athavā - hi yasmāt asminnindre
GSP33bbdip11u:4178_4: bhūmā bāhulyaṃ vidyate tasmādupadeśasya sannihitaparamātmaviṣayatvopapteriti bhāvaḥ / tadapi kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:4179: hi yasmāt asmin prakaraṇe 'dhyātmasambandhabhūmoktaḥ tasmāditi sūtrārtha ukto bhavati /
GSP33bbdip11u:4185_0: nanu yadi prāṇaśabdenendreṇāpi viṣṇureva svātmādisarvagatatayocyate tarhi mayi prāṇa
GSP33bbdip11u:4185_1: iti nirdeśaḥ syāt / na tvahamiti / viṣṇāvahamityādirūpopadeśāyogādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharatsūtraṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4186: yatha ityarthe smṛtisūcakaśca / yujyata iti śeṣaḥ / tathā ca yato 'pi prāṇasya viṣṇutve 'pyupadeśaḥ prāṇo vāham ityevaṃrūpo yujyate,
GSP33bbdip11u:4188: yato 'yamupadeśaḥ 'śāstradṛṣṭyā'; śāsti sarvamiti śāstraṃ antaryāmī bhagavān,
GSP33bbdip11u:4189: taddṛṣṭyā tadapekṣayaiva pravṛtto na tvaikyena / na cāntaryāmiṇi ahamādiprayogādarśanāt tadayogaḥ / yato 'vāmadevavat';
GSP33bbdip11u:4190: tatkartṛkaprayogavat / yathā vāmadevo nāma ṛṣiḥ antaryāmivivakṣayā 'ahaṃ manurabhavam';
GSP33bbdip11u:4191_0: iti svasmin ahaṃmanvādiśabdān prayuyuje / tathā ayamapyupadeśo yujyate ata iti sūtrayojanāmabhiprayan
GSP33bbdip11u:4191_1: sautraśāstrapadaṃ vyācaṣṭe - śāstramiti / viṣṇuriti śeṣaḥ / tathācāntaryāmī viṣṇariha
GSP33bbdip11u:4191_2: śāstrapadenokta ityarthaḥ / antaryāmīti prakṛtābhiprāyeṇa / yadvā - śāsti prerayati
GSP33bbdip11u:4191_3: sarvāniti vyutapattyā antaryāmītyetadeva śāstramityasya vyākhyānaṃ bhavatīti
GSP33bbdip11u:4192: nāpadārthatvaśaṅkāvakāśaḥ / ata eva bhāgavate dhyeye 'ntaryāmiṇyeva śāstraśabdaprayogaḥ/ aitareyabhāṣye 'śāsturantaryāmiṇaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4194: tadanusāreṇa ca tattvapradīpe śāsturantaryāmiṇo viṣṇoriti vyākhyānepi nāsya tadvirodhaḥ śaṅkyaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4195_1: vyākhyāyate / yadvā - śāstraśabde śāstṛ a ityavayavavibhāgamabhipretya śāstrityaṃśasyāntaryāmiṇa
GSP33bbdip11u:4196: atra tu avayavavibhāgamavivakṣitvā śāstramityakhaṇḍapadasyāntaryāmiti vyākhyānāt tadanukūlatayā 'saṃvicchāstram';
GSP33bbdip11u:4202: antaryāmiṇo viṣṇoḥ śāstrapadavācyatve pramāṇamāha - saṃviditi // prathamaskandhe vyāsaṃ prati nāradavākyamidam /
GSP33bbdip11u:4206_0: svapnaḥ / agrahaḥ jāgratsvapnaviṣayajñānarahitā śayyā suṣuptiḥ nāmarūpakriyāsu śabdārthakarmasu
GSP33bbdip11u:4206_1: vṛttirvyāvṛttiryanyāḥ sā / ābhāsaḥ pratyayaḥ saṃjñādiviṣayajñānarūpo jāgracca / āhatyaitadavasthātrayaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4209: paraṃ uttamaṃ padaṃ sadbhiḥ prāpyaṃ brahma aham acintayamiti / bhāgavata ityanantaraṃ 'prayogāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:4217: nanvantaryāmiṇi ahamādiprayogaḥ kathaṃ sambhavatītyāśaṅkyāṃ tatra tuśabdasūcitāṃ smṛtimevāha - tattaditi/ viṣṇuḥ 'tattannātmā';
GSP33bbdip11u:4218: anyaparatvena prasiddhāhamādināmnocyate iti / anena tasyāntaryāmiṇi viṣṇau vidvadrūḍhirdarśitā / 'sarvaśāstṛtvahetutaḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4219: sarvaniyantṛtvanimitteneti / anena mahāyogo darśitaḥ / tatra tasya svātantryanimittokteḥ / anena paramata ivāsmanmate 'pi lākṣaṇikatvaṃ parihṛtam 'puruṣottamam';
GSP33bbdip11u:4224: vācakatayā nāstīti / anena harau paramamukhyatā anyatra kevalamukhyatā coktā / anyathā na kvāpīti sāmānyaniṣedhāyogāt / atrāhamādiśabdāḥ pratyagādivācitvena prasiddhāḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4226_0: tānavivekenājñāḥ kevalajīvādau prayuñjate dahati śabdamiva kāṣṭhe / prājñāstu mukhyāmukhyavivekavanto
GSP33bbdip11u:4227: ityanantaram 'antaryāmiṇyahamādipadānāṃ mukhyatvokteḥ śāstradṛṣṭyā ahamādyupadeśo yukta eva'; iti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4232: nanvantaryāmiṇi ahamādiprayogādarśanāt tadayoga ityāśaṅkāṃ sūtroktadṛṣṭāntavivaraṇena pariharati - ahamiti // 'ahaṃ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4233: vāmadevasaṃjñakaṛṣyantaryāmī tattadantaryāmitayā manuḥ sūryaścābhavamiti ṛṅmantrārthaḥ / ādipadena 'ahaṃ kakṣīvānṛṣirasmi vipro 'haṃ kutsam'; (ṛ.4-26-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:4237: jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgān neti cen nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvād iha tadyogāt | BBs_1,1.31 |
GSP33bbdip11u:4239: iti jīvaliṅgaṃ prāṇasaṃvādādimukhyaprāṇaliṅgaṃ tasmāt neti cet -
GSP33bbdip11u:4241: punaruktamākṣipya samādadhatsūtramupanyasya ākṣepāṃśaṃ tāvadvyācaṣṭe - jīveti // anusandhīyate
GSP33bbdip11u:4242_0: uktamiti ca śeṣaḥ / saṃvādo vivādaḥ kalahaḥ prāṇasya prāṇaissaha saṃvāda iti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4242_1: tathā ca yasmādatra prakaraṇe 'taṃ śataṃ varṣāṇyabhyārcat tasmācchataṃ varṣāṇi puruṣāyuṣo
GSP33bbdip11u:4243: ityanena yacchatasaṃvatsaraparyantaṃ prāṇasya jīvadehe 'vastānahetukaṃ śatāyuṣṭvarūpaṃ jīvaliṅgamuktaṃ tat 'tāvanti śatasaṃvatsarasyāhnāṃ sahasrāṇi bhavanti';
GSP33bbdip11u:4244: ityādinā bahuṣu sthaleṣu anusandhīyate / yasmācca 'tā ahiṃsantāhamukthamahamukthamasmi'; (ai.ā. 2-1-4.)
GSP33bbdip11u:4245_0: iti vākyena prāṇasya prāṇairindriyaiḥ saha saṃvādarūpamukhyaprāṇaliṅgamuktam / yasmāccādipadagṛhītaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4245_1: 'prāṇo vaṃśa iti sthaviraḥ śākalyastadyathā śālāvaṃśe sarve 'nye vaṃśāḥ samāhitāssyuḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4245_2: evamasmin prāṇe cakṣuśśrotraṃ mano vāgindriyāṇi śarīraṃ sarva ātmā samāhitaḥ'; (ai.ā. 3-2-1-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:4246: iti vākyena sarvajīvendriyadehadhārakatvarūpaliṅgaṃ coktamasti tasmādayaṃ prāṇo na viṣṇuḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4247: kintu jīvamukhyaprāṇāveveti yojanā / yadyapi 'tasmācchataṃ varṣāṇi puruṣāyuṣo bhavanti'; (ai.ā. 2-2-1.)
GSP33bbdip11u:4250_0: iti vākyam / tathāpi liṅgasya bahuṣu sthaleṣu anugamo 'stīti jñāpanāyopaniṣado jīvaliṅge
GSP33bbdip11u:4251: bṛhatīsahasragatākṣarāṇāṃ vācyāni puṃrūpāṇi yāvanti sahasrāṇi tāvanti / tathā ca tāni ṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇi sampannāni bhavanti / 'tāḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4259: parihārāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - neti // prāṇo viṣṇurneti na,
GSP33bbdip11u:4262: na coktajīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgavirodha ityatastatrahetutvena yataḥ śāstradṛṣṭyā tvayamupadeśaḥ ityasyānuṣaṅgaṃ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4263: kimarthamantaryāmīti praśnasyāntarupāstyarthamiti parihāraṃ cābhipretya na copāsane 'vāntarabhedābhāva iti codyottaratvena pravṛttam 'upāsā';
GSP33bbdip11u:4264_0: iti sūtrāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe - antariti / gatatvenetyasyāntarbahissarvaśabdaiḥ pratyekaṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4264_1: sambandhaḥ / itiśabdaḥ prakārārthaḥ / tathā ca dehāntargatatvena tadbahirgatatvena
GSP33bbdip11u:4265: bhagavadupāsanasya trividhatvādityarthaḥ/ nanu tathāpi kathanaṃ vyarthaṃ vastuta upāsanātraividhyasyehānuktasyāntaryāmikathanāprayojakatvādityataḥ pravṛttam 'āśritatvāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:4266: ityaṃśaṃ caśabdādhyāhāreṇa vyācaṣṭe - iheti / etatprakaraṇe uktatvādityarthaḥ / upāsātraividhyasyeti vipariṇāmenātrānvīyate / co
GSP33bbdip11u:4275: atropāsanātraividhyamucyata ityatrāpi kiṃ liṅgamityata āha - sa iti / 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4279: prāptaḥ / caturmukhahṛdayamiti śeṣaḥ / anena bhagavato dehāntaḥpraveśokteḥ ukteścopāsanārthatvāt antarupāstiruktā bhavati / 'saḥ';
GSP33bbdip11u:4281: vyāsakṛṣṇakapilādirūpamātmānam ātataguṇaṃ svasvarūpabhūtamādānādikartāraṃ vā / tatamaṃ 'lopaḥ samāne';
GSP33bbdip11u:4282: iti sūtrāttalopaḥ / tamabarthe mapratyayo vā / tathā ca tatamaṃ atiśayena vyāptaṃ niravadhikavyāptimantaṃ 'brahma'
GSP33bbdip11u:4284: tadguṇakatayā tadrūpaṃ dadarśetyarthaḥ / kecittu - takāra eva vyāptyabhidhāyaka ityāhuḥ / anena sarvagatatvaṃ tathopāsanārthamuktam / 'tadetat';
GSP33bbdip11u:4286: jānannaitareyaḥ itarāyā apatyaṃ pumān viśālasaṃjñāt ṛṣeḥ utpannaḥ aitareyaḥ / 'mahidāso';
GSP33bbdip11u:4287_0: mahino mahātmāno devāḥ dāsabhūtāḥ yasyāsau bhagavānāhetyarthaḥ / hasmavaiśabdāḥ prasiddhidyotakāḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4287_1: atra bahirupāstyarthaṃ mahidāsa āheti bahirupāstiruktā bhavati / na ca vācyamatra
GSP33bbdip11u:4290: itivanmahidāso 'pi ṛṣitvenocyatāmiti cenna / asyāḥ upaniṣadaḥ aitareyasaṃjñayaivetarāputrasya mahidāsasya ṛṣitvasiddhyā taduktervyarthatvāt /
GSP33bbdip11u:4297: tathāpi mahidāsasya viṣṇutvaṃ kuto jñāyata ityata āha - mahidāseti // 'jajñe';
GSP33bbdip11u:4301: iti chāndogyabhāṣye anantaroktabhagavadanyaḥ tatsaṃjñaketarāputraḥ ṛṣiratra na vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP33bbdip11u:4309: tadavatārabhūtaḥ pūrvoktaḥ sa evātra vivakṣita ityāha - sākṣāditi/ brahmāṇḍe purāṇa ityasyāśritatvādityanenānvayaḥ / mahidāsasya viṣṇutvoktiriti tadarthaḥ / tena caśabdānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4315_0: iti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe - tattaditi // upāsanetyanena puruṣāṇāmityanena ca tadityasyāvṛttiḥ
GSP33bbdip11u:4315_1: sūcitā / caḥ samuccaye / tathā ca teṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ manuṣyarṣigandharvadevākhyādhikāriṇāṃ
GSP33bbdip11u:4315_2: teṣu trividhopāsaneṣu madhye tattadupāsane yathākramaṃ bahirantarvyāptirūpaikaikopāsana
GSP33bbdip11u:4315_3: eva yogyatayā yogyatvena hetunetyarthaḥ / asyopāsātraividhyādityanenānvayaḥ / tathā
GSP33bbdip11u:4322: puruṣāṇāmuktānekavidhopāsanayogyatā kuto jñāyata ityataḥ kartṛviśeṣānanupādāya sāmānyataḥ upāsakatraividhyapratipādikāṃ smṛtiṃ paṭhati - keṣāñciditi // 'puruṣottamo';
GSP33bbdip11u:4327: manuṣyottamānāṃ tu bahirevopāsya ityarthaḥ / prācuryādevamuktiḥ / iti brāhma ityasya tattadupāsanayogyatayā tadviśiṣṭatvena puruṣāṇāmāśritatvāduktatvāditi pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33bbdip11u:4343: sarvasthāneṣūpāsya ityarthaḥ / atrāgnau pratimāsviti vākyadvayena bahirmātropāsanopalakṣyate / ata eva sthānadvayoktiḥ / yathāśruteḥ sūryādau
GSP33bbdip11u:4345_0: iti śruteḥ / sarvatreti sarvagatopāstiriti jñātavyam / na cātra “yeṣāṃ bahirupāsanena
GSP33bbdip11u:4345_2: mocayati“iti nyāyavivaraṇena ca virodhaśśaṅkyaḥ / agnāviti vākye 'nyaniṣedhābhāvena
GSP33bbdip11u:4345_5: prakaraṇasyāgnāviti vākyena vyavasthayā pratipādanācca / iti ceti / caḥ samuccaye /
GSP33bbdip11u:4345_7: puruṣaviśeṣāṇāmuktatvāditi tadarthaḥ / ato na tadyogāditi hetvasiddhiḥ śaṅkyeti bhāva /
GSP33bbdip11u:4346: anena nātroktaprāṇo viṣṇuḥ, kintu jīvamukhyaprāṇāveva / kutaḥ?
GSP33bbdip11u:4353: teṣāmantaryāmiviṣayatvopapatteḥ / yataśśāstradṛṣṭyāyam upadeśa iti vā / kimarthamatrāntaryāmikathanamiti cet,
GSP33bbdip11u:4355: antarādibhedena bhagavadupāsanasya trividhatvāt / na ca tathāpi kathanamayuktam / vāstavatraividhyasyehānuktasya kathanāprayojakatvāditi vācyam / 'iha';
GSP33bbdip11u:4356: prakaraṇe tatraividhyasyāśritatvāduktatvāt / na caikavidhopāsanayā sarveṣāṃ brahmāparokṣasambhavāt kimupāsātraividhyeneti vācyam / 'tadyogāt';
GSP33bbdip11u:4357_0: teṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ tasmin tadupāsana eva yogyatvāt / anekavidhopāstiyogyatāvatāṃ ca
GSP33bbdip11u:4357_2: sūtrārtha ukto bhavati / na ca vivādakartṛtvaliṅgasyāntaryāmiviṣayatve 'udāsīnau
GSP33bbdip11u:4367: cakre vedataroḥ śākhā dṛṣṭvā puṃso 'lpamedhasaḥ // śrīmadbhāgavatam, 1-3-21
GSP33bbdip11u:4368: 1. taduktam īśāvāsyabhāṣyaṭīkāyāṃ - 'brahmādīnām aprāptajñānamutpadyate śriyastu sarvadā vidyata iti vivekaḥ'; iti/
